Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited and irritable when stomach is empty; anxious about health; feels weak and “all gone” at the epigastrium with constant desire to eat, yet food does not truly satisfy
General_Themes: Gastric and uterine remedy; chlorotic and debilitated states; ravenous hunger with rapid sinking and weakness; tendency to uterine displacement with bearing-down and backache; suited to thin, overworked or growing subjects who overtax digestion
Key_Local_Symptoms: Gnawing, hungry, faint feeling at epigastrium, soon after eating or when stomach is supposedly full; craving for pickles, sour things and coarse food; distension and discomfort after overeating; sense of uterine weight and soreness in women, with dragging lumbar pains; haemorrhoids and constipation in the bilious
Worse_From: Overeating or irregular meals; tea and tobacco; cold, damp weather; exertion after meals; prolonged standing in uterine cases
Better_From: Light, frequent meals; warm, simple food; rest after eating; gentle exercise when digestion has settled; supporting garments in pelvic weakness
Notes_Sphere: Gastric and female pelvic sphere; ravenous but unrefreshing appetite, faint “all gone” stomach, and uterine bearing-down in thin, chilly, overworked or chlorotic patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Gloomy, anxious and hypochondriacal; old people especially feel despondent and worried over digestion; irritable and sleepless from constant sense of weight in stomach
General_Themes: Marked dyspepsia remedy, especially in elderly; slow, weak digestion with cardiac sympathy; feeling as if a hard lump or load remained in stomach after eating; gastric catarrh of tea- or tobacco-users and those who eat late, heavy suppers
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sensation as if a hard-boiled egg, stone or great weight were lodged in stomach, especially after meals and at night; pressure and pain radiating to chest and shoulders with palpitation or oppression; eructations, heartburn and sour risings; restless sleep, wakes with distress at epigastrium; constipation with dry, knotty stools
Worse_From: Late, heavy suppers; tea, coffee and tobacco; eating quickly or overeating; lying down soon after meals, especially at night
Better_From: Light, early evening meals; simple, easily digested food; gentle walking after eating; sleeping with head and shoulders raised
Notes_Sphere: Gastric and cardiac sphere; “lump in stomach” dyspepsia of elderly, tea- and tobacco-users with night aggravation and reflex heart symptoms

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, peevish and cross, especially children; may be cruel, strikes or abuses others; great anxiety about health with fear of death in wasting states; restless and discontented
General_Themes: Acts on nutrition, mesenteric glands and serous membranes; marasmus, especially of lower extremities; alternation or metastasis of diarrhoea and rheumatism or other complaints; ill-effects of checked discharges or haemorrhoids
Key_Local_Symptoms: Marked emaciation, particularly of legs and about wrists, though appetite may be ravenous; chronic diarrhoea with undigested, offensive stools; metastasis of rheumatism to bowels or vice versa; abdominal distension with hard, knotty mesenteric glands; haemorrhoids suppressed then followed by serious internal complaints
Worse_From: Checking or suppression of diarrhoea, haemorrhoids or skin eruptions; cold air and drafts; night and early morning; emotional upsets in already debilitated patients
Better_From: Return of original discharge or eruption; warm, dry climate; nourishing but digestible food in small, frequent amounts; gentle, non-fatiguing movement
Notes_Sphere: Nutritional and metastatic sphere; marasmus of children or chronic adults with ravenous appetite, alternation of bowel and rheumatic symptoms, and ill-effects of suppressed discharges or haemorrhoids

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Very nervous and easily exhausted; anxiety from the least effort; irritable and oversensitive to pain and disturbance
General_Themes: Rheumatic remedy for small joints, especially wrists and fingers; slight exertion causes disproportionate fatigue, trembling and palpitations
Key_Local_Symptoms: Tearing, tingling, drawing pains in small joints; joints swell, red and very tender from trivial use (writing, light work); wrist rheumatism with great weakness of hands
Worse_From: Slight motion or exertion; touch; changes in weather; cold and damp
Better_From: Rest; keeping the joint still and supported
Notes_Sphere: Small-joint rheumatism where swelling, pain and fatigue are out of proportion to effort

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low vitality with dull, depressed mood; anxiety about the heart and circulation
General_Themes: Acts on heart and kidneys; weak, irregular or slow pulse with cardiac insufficiency; tendency to dropsy with swelling of legs, abdomen or chest
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sense of precordial oppression and tightness in heart region; shortness of breath on exertion, needs to sit up; scanty urine with oedema of lower limbs
Worse_From: Exertion; lying flat; hurrying or climbing
Better_From: Rest; sitting up; regulated activity and fluid intake (supportive)
Notes_Sphere: Cardio-renal remedy for failing cardiac compensation after rheumatism, influenza or kidney disease (always coordinated with medical care)

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Excitable, anxious, restless; may swing between collapse and over-stimulation
General_Themes: Acts on sympathetic nervous system and circulation; sudden rises in blood pressure; vasoconstriction with pallor; states of circulatory failure or shock-like collapse
Key_Local_Symptoms: Palpitations and rapid pulse with precordial anxiety; breathlessness and chest tightness; dryness of mucous membranes; dilated pupils; cold sweat
Worse_From: Sudden stress, fright or emotional shock; over-exertion; stimulant abuse
Better_From: Rest; lying down; quiet, dark environment
Notes_Sphere: Highly specialized remedy for cardio-vascular and endocrine states; use only under supervision of a qualified practitioner

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Gloomy and despondent; irritable and easily angered
General_Themes: Acts strongly on lower bowel and venous system; portal congestion and venous stasis; heaviness and fullness rather than acute inflammation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Large, purple, congested haemorrhoids with much pain and little bleeding; sensation of sticks or splinters in rectum, worse after stool; constant dull aching in sacrum and low back, as if it would give way; dry, burning, raw mucous membranes of rectum and throat
Worse_From: Standing or walking long; after stool; cold drafts; exertion
Better_From: Rest; lying down; cool applications to rectal area (supportive)
Notes_Sphere: Classic remedy for haemorrhoidal and pelvic venous congestion with sacral backache

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Inability to think or fix attention; mental confusion and stupor; anxious, staring expression in children who seem vacant or out of touch
General_Themes: Acts on brain and gastro-intestinal tract, especially in infants and children; violent vomiting and diarrhoea with great prostration
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intolerance of milk: child vomits curdled milk soon after feeding and then becomes drowsy and collapsed; greenish, watery, offensive stools with colic; face pale, pinched, with blue rings around eyes, looks prematurely old; convulsions during dentition or from digestive upsets
Worse_From: Milk (especially cow’s milk); summer heat; overfeeding; dentition
Better_From: Vomiting and stool may temporarily relieve pains; cool air; careful regulation of feeds (supportive)
Notes_Sphere: Picture of digestive collapse in infants and children with characteristic milk intolerance and mental dullness; severe cases are medical emergencies

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable and sensitive; often seen in chronically ill, scrofulous children
General_Themes: Blend of Sulphur and Mercury qualities; chronic low-grade glandular and skin conditions; reduced resistance
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronic eye problems such as scrofulous ophthalmia with red, inflamed, discharging eyes; ear discharges (otorrhoea), often offensive and longstanding; painful, itching, scabby eruptions on scalp and skin; enlarged glands
Worse_From: Cold and damp; at night; getting chilled; suppression of discharges
Better_From: Warmth (sometimes); maintaining open discharges under supervision
Notes_Sphere: Chronic scrofulous, glandular, skin–ear–eye conditions in weakened or tainted constitutions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: States vary between silly, loquacious, goofy behavior and confusion or delirium; may fear death yet be reckless; oversensitive to noises and touch
General_Themes: Acts on brain, spinal cord and circulation; tremors, twitchings, choreic movements and jerking of muscles; marked chilliness and sensitivity to cold and frost
Key_Local_Symptoms: Twitching of facial muscles and eyelids; spasms and jerky, uncertain gait; sensations as if needles of ice were piercing the skin; chilblains and frostbite with burning, itching, bluish-red hands, feet and ears; headaches and neuralgias in nervous or alcoholic patients
Worse_From: Cold, especially before or during storms; cold, damp weather; mental exertion; alcohol abuse
Better_From: Gentle movement; gradual, steady warming rather than sudden heat
Notes_Sphere: Nervous system remedy for twitching, chorea-like movements and frost-bite or chilblain states

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable and low-spirited; may feel poisoned, overworked or very run-down
General_Themes: Acts on blood, gums and lower limbs with scurvy-like picture; also touches urinary and sexual organs
Key_Local_Symptoms: Stomachache with poor appetite and constipation; painful erections in gonorrhoeal states; burning urethral symptoms and strangury; scurvy-type signs with pale face, swollen bleeding gums and legs covered with dark-purple, hard, painful blotches; general weakness and heaviness in limbs
Worse_From: Standing or walking; sexual excess; poor hygiene and nutrition
Better_From: Rest; better hygiene and improved diet (supportive)
Notes_Sphere: A rare remedy showing gastric upset plus scurvy or vascular changes with some gonorrhoeal urinary symptoms

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Melancholy and hypochondriacal mood; fear of impending illness or death; loss of self-confidence with mental dullness and forgetfulness
General_Themes: Acts strongly on the sexual sphere in both sexes; picture of premature old age from sexual excess or abuse with profound exhaustion
Key_Local_Symptoms: Impotence with absence of erections and sexual desire; genitals cold and flaccid; history of repeated gonorrhoea with lingering weakness; in women, decreased libido, scanty menses and sometimes agalactia (poor milk flow) with sadness; gnawing itching of eyes and body; occasional sprain or strain complaints
Worse_From: Sexual excess or long-standing sexual strain; dwelling on sexual failure; depression
Better_From: Emotional support; relief from sexual over-stimulation and strain (general)
Notes_Sphere: Classic remedy for sexual debility with mental and nervous exhaustion, especially in men

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Sluggish, tired children; tendency to droop physically and mentally
General_Themes: Pronounced catarrhal remedy with relaxed tissues and proneness to colds; reacts to cold winds with repeated ENT issues
Key_Local_Symptoms: Obstruction of nostrils from adenoids, leading to mouth-breathing; recurrent sore throats and tonsillar enlargement; chronic throat catarrh; throat deafness from Eustachian catarrh; general tendency to glandular swelling in throat and neck
Worse_From: Exposure to cold winds; damp, chilly weather; getting chilled after heat or exertion
Better_From: Shelter; warm, dry environment; careful protection of throat and head
Notes_Sphere: Often thought of in children with adenoids, chronic nasal blockage and throat deafness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dull, stuporous, half-conscious states with muttering or low delirium; great anxiety in toxic fevers; may be indifferent, difficult to rouse
General_Themes: Low, septic, zymotic states such as malignant throat infections and toxic scarlatina-type pictures; rapid sinking, great prostration, offensive discharges
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dusky, mottled, livid rash that may be imperfect or receding; throat dark, swollen, with foul, ulcerated or sloughing patches and very offensive breath; thin, dark, sometimes bloody discharges from nose or throat; profound weakness out of proportion to local signs
Worse_From: Malignant scarlet-fever or diphtheria-type illnesses; septic blood states; rapid exhaustion from toxemia
Better_From: Cool fresh air in a well-ventilated room; careful fluid support and nursing (general support, not remedy-specific)
Notes_Sphere: Picture of collapse in malignant scarlatina, diphtheria and septic states with dusky rash, foul ulceration and great prostration

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Tired, despondent, especially worn-out women; mental and physical weariness with little endurance; feels unable to cope
General_Themes: Marked anaemia and relaxation of the female organism; chronic weakness with uterine debility and tendency to prolapse or miscarriage; general lack of tone
Key_Local_Symptoms: Great uterine weakness with bearing-down in pelvis and small of back; tendency to repeated miscarriages; leucorrhoea with exhaustion; want of appetite, least food distends the stomach; faint, weak spells in connection with menstrual or uterine disorders
Worse_From: Exertion; pregnancy or menstruation; uterine strain; loss of blood
Better_From: Rest; lying down; careful nourishment and support (general); improvement of anaemic state
Notes_Sphere: Female remedy for anaemic, relaxed states with uterine debility, prolapsus and tendency to abortions, especially when weakness and gastric distension accompany pelvic complaints

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low, depressed mood from exhaustion; nervousness, neurasthenia; feels run down but revives as nutrition improves
General_Themes: Acts on nutrition via the sympathetic system; tones appetite and digestion, improving mental and physical vigor with gain in weight; useful in malnutrition, nervous exhaustion, convalescence
Key_Local_Symptoms: Improves appetite with better assimilation; gradual weight gain in thin, undernourished patients; helps deficient lactation, increasing quality and quantity of milk in nursing mothers; may lessen urinary phosphates or excessive urine in some cases
Worse_From: Overwork, worry, insomnia and poor diet; prolonged illness leading to wasting
Better_From: Rest; good food; regular small meals; supportive environment (general); remedy helps restore nutrition and vitality
Notes_Sphere: Nutritive tonic-type remedy for malnutrition, nervous exhaustion, underweight and deficient lactation, helping rebuild strength and weight

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, dull and heavy during coryza; may feel confused and unable to think; children fretful with colds
General_Themes: Acute catarrhal remedy; especially colds in damp cold weather; strong tendency to watery coryza and laryngeal irritation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Copious, acrid, burning nasal discharge that excoriates the upper lip, with bland, watery eye discharge; frequent sneezing; nose and upper lip raw and sore; cough or laryngitis worse in warm room, better in open air; neuralgic pains like a fine thread along nerves after injuries or amputations
Worse_From: Warm room; evening; being indoors; damp cold exposures that start coryza
Better_From: Open, cool air; moving about outside; gentle fresh air in the room
Notes_Sphere: Acute remedy for colds, hay fever and laryngeal catarrh with acrid nasal, bland eye discharge and marked aggravation in warm room, relief in open air

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Often gloomy or despondent from chronic digestive troubles; may be irritable and oversensitive about health; can be obsessed with food or digestion
General_Themes: Acts strongly on intestinal mucous membranes, increasing peristalsis; suits fleshy, high-living, meat-eating subjects with dyspepsia, colitis and catarrhal states; also touches circulation and respiration
Key_Local_Symptoms: Great hunger yet weak digestion; slightest dietary error upsets digestion; burning eructations and gastric pains; colicky, distended abdomen with noisy flatus; tendency to chronic intestinal catarrh or colitis; chest complaints and cough often aggravated after eating; sometimes used in low blood pressure and vascular weakness
Worse_From: Overeating, especially meat and rich foods; bad water; errors of diet; cold damp exposure in weakened subjects
Better_From: Sitting bent forward pressing with hands over epigastrium; simple, light food; avoiding heavy meat and alcohol (general diet measures)
Notes_Sphere: Digestive and intestinal remedy for high-living, meat-eating patients with chronic dyspepsia, colitis and catarrhal states, sometimes with circulatory or chest involvement

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, chronically ailing; may feel dragged down by long-standing skin or glandular problems
General_Themes: Chronic, scrofulous states; alterative action on skin, glands and mucous membranes; used where nutrition and elimination are sluggish
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronic skin eruptions and glandular enlargements in scrofulous constitutions; leucorrhoea with erosions of cervix that bleed easily; amenorrhoea with burning pains from back to pubes; occasional urinary issues such as haematuria or gravel
Worse_From: Cold, damp climate; chronic neglect of health; suppression of eruptions or discharges
Better_From: Warmth; open outlets for chronic discharges under supervision; long-term constitutional care
Notes_Sphere: Chronic alterative remedy for scrofulous skin eruptions, glandular swellings and pelvic mucous membrane problems, sometimes as a follow-on where Phosphorus seems indicated but incomplete

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dissatisfied, easily angered about his complaints; may be indolent, weary, averse to mental or physical effort; hypochondriacal with much focus on rectum and abdomen
General_Themes: Acts on portal system, liver and rectum; marked venous congestion in pelvic and portal circulation; suits lax, sluggish, sedentary people, often with abdominal fullness and haemorrhoids
Key_Local_Symptoms: Constant sense of uncertainty in rectum: cannot trust flatus, may pass stool with gas; sudden urging to stool, must hurry, with gurgling and much flatus; stools often watery, jelly-like or mixed with mucus; large, hot, sore haemorrhoids that protrude and are very tender; fullness, heat and weight in lower abdomen and pelvis
Worse_From: Early morning (about 5 a.m.) urging; after eating or drinking; standing or walking; heat; sedentary habits
Better_From: Cool applications; lying down; after evacuation of bowels (temporarily)
Notes_Sphere: Rectal and portal-congestion remedy par excellence, with early-morning diarrhoea, insecurity of rectum, abdominal fullness and large, painful haemorrhoids in sluggish, sedentary patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Listless, indifferent and depressed from chronic weakness and diarrhoea; irritable and anxious about health when attacks recur; mental apathy from malarial cachexia and loss of fluids
General_Themes: Marked action on mucous membranes of stomach and intestines; chronic diarrhoea and dysentery with great debility and anaemia; after-effects of malarial fever or abuse of quinine; weakness and sinking at stomach with loss of appetite and weight
Key_Local_Symptoms: Diarrhoea with loose, foetid, gushing stools, often worse after eating or drinking; frequent, painless evacuations with great prostration and sinking at epigastrium; enlarged, tender spleen in malarial subjects; tongue coated with bad taste; abdomen distended with flatus and rumbling
Worse_From: After eating or drinking; cold food or drinks; damp, marshy climates; night and early morning; during or after malarial attacks; long-continued diarrhoea
Better_From: Rest; warm drinks and simple food; dry, warm climate; lying quietly after stool
Notes_Sphere: Gastro-intestinal and malarial sphere; chronic diarrhoea, dysentery and post-malarial weakness with anaemia, enlarged spleen and profound prostration from loss of fluids or quinine abuse

Mental_Emotional_Themes: No very marked mental keynote given; may be irritable or anxious from chronic eye disease and disfigurement
General_Themes: Acts chiefly on eyes and skin; produces intense local inflammation, ulceration and granuloma formation; useful in chronic destructive conditions of lids and adjacent tissues
Key_Local_Symptoms: Epithelioma, lupus and chronic ulceration affecting skin and mucosa; granular lids with intense redness and thickening; purulent conjunctivitis where inflammation may spread to face and neck; granular ophthalmia and keratitis with marked photophobia and discharge
Worse_From: Exposure to irritants; neglected eye disease; local misuse or overuse of strong applications
Better_From: Gentle local care; protection of eyes from light and wind; appropriate ophthalmic supervision (general support)
Notes_Sphere: Primarily an ophthalmic and dermatologic remedy for epithelioma, lupus, ulcers and granular lids with purulent conjunctivitis extending to face and neck

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Hallucinations, frightful visions, kleptomania; loss of memory for recent events; wants nothing to do with anybody and may be brutal or violent; marked nervous excitement and sleeplessness
General_Themes: Produces a perfect picture of epileptiform seizures; strong action on brain and spinal cord with cerebral irritation, spasms and convulsions; nervousness and tremors, especially in children or after toxic influences (e.g. mushrooms, alcohol)
Key_Local_Symptoms: Nervous tremors preceding epileptiform attacks; sudden severe vertigo with tendency to fall backward; jaws fixed, bites tongue, foaming, blue face during spasms; bloated abdomen with flatulent colic; constant desire to urinate with strong-smelling, deep-yellow urine; sense of heart thumping, action heard in back
Worse_From: Cold air; checked secretions; toxic or exciting influences (alcohol, mushrooms, emotional strain)
Better_From: Motion often relieves flatulent colic; warm, quiet environment; careful removal of exciting causes (supportive)
Notes_Sphere: Remedy for epileptiform seizures, spasms and nervous excitement with hallucinations, loss of memory and post-ictal confusion; also used in nervous children with tremors and sleeplessness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally dull and weak from chronic illness; may be anxious or low from persistent cough and haemorrhage
General_Themes: Marked action on alimentary canal and respiratory organs; indicated in incipient phthisis with progressive emaciation, great morning weakness and haemorrhages, but often little or no fever
Key_Local_Symptoms: Hard, racking cough with bright red, frothy or dark haemoptysis, especially in early tuberculosis; haemorrhage from lungs or bowels, typically worse in morning; great weakness on rising, gaining some strength as day advances; diarrhoea or other pathological haemorrhages with notable morning aggravation
Worse_From: Morning (especially on waking); exertion; chill or damp in delicate, consumptive patients
Better_From: Relative rest; warm, dry air; cautious management of exertion and exposure (general)
Notes_Sphere: Haemorrhagic and early-phthisis remedy with morning-worse cough and bleeding, great morning weakness, progressive emaciation and action on lungs and bowel

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, weak, often despondent from profound debility and wasting; may be restless or fearful in advanced disease states
General_Themes: Produces profound anaemia and debility with emaciation and oedema; acts on blood, stomach, intestines and kidneys; shows hectic fever, drenching night sweats and dropsical tendencies in advanced chronic disease
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense thirst for large quantities of cold water; sour eructations and vomiting with burning from stomach to throat; chronic diarrhoea with wasting; oedema of face and limbs or general dropsy; hectic flush with red spot on one cheek and profuse night sweats; dyspnoea with sense of sinking in abdomen, rests easier lying on belly
Worse_From: Exhausting diseases (cancer, diabetes, chronic diarrhoea, nephritis); loss of fluids (sweats, diarrhoea); deficient nutrition
Better_From: Cool drinks may temporarily relieve burning; lying on abdomen may ease dyspnoea and sinking sensation; careful, frequent, small feedings (general support)
Notes_Sphere: Deep-acting remedy for profound anaemia, emaciation and dropsy with great thirst, sour vomiting, chronic diarrhoea and hectic fever in advanced or cachectic states

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Faintness with a strange enlarged sensation of the head; may feel mentally unsteady or morally “off” in toxic states; anxious or collapsed from circulatory weakness
General_Themes: Strong depressing action on heart, respiration and blood-pressure; lowers temperature; increases susceptibility to cold; destroys red blood corpuscles leading to pallor, cyanosis and collapse
Key_Local_Symptoms: Enlarged, “huge” head sensation with tendency to faint; pallor and cyanosis of face and lips; weak, irregular heart with blue mucous membranes; albuminuria with oedema of feet and ankles; eyes show pallor of optic discs, contracted visual field, shrinking retinal vessels and dilated pupils
Worse_From: Cold exposure; exertion when circulation is weak; previous drug or toxic overuse (antipyretics etc.) as a maintaining cause
Better_From: Rest; warm, quiet environment; careful medical management of circulatory and blood issues (supportive)
Notes_Sphere: Deep-acting remedy reflecting toxic/iatrogenic collapse with cyanosis, heart weakness and blood destruction; use reserved for skilled homeopathic and medical supervision, not casual self-prescribing

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Sudden intense anxiety and fear, especially fear of death, after shock, fright or exposure; restless, cannot sit still; predicts the exact hour of death and is sure they will die; mind focuses on present danger rather than past or future
General_Themes: Acute, violent onset of complaints after dry cold wind, shock or fright; high fevers with dry, hot skin and great thirst; marked vascular excitement and congestion; first stage of many inflammatory diseases before exudation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sudden high fever with burning heat, red hot dry skin and great thirst; intense restlessness, tossing about in anguish; palpitations and tightness of chest with fear of suffocation; neuralgic or rheumatic pains that are acute, stitching and intolerable; croupy or bronchial attacks shortly after exposure to cold dry wind
Worse_From: Sudden shock or fright; exposure to dry cold wind or drafts; night, especially before midnight; strong emotions, excitement or fear; being in a warm, stuffy room
Better_From: Rest in a quiet, cool room; open fresh air; gentle reassurance and company; perspiration breaking out; lying with head raised
Notes_Sphere: Acute nervous and vascular sphere; early stages of sudden inflammatory or febrile illnesses with high fever, great restlessness and intense fear after shock, trauma or cold exposure

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dullness and mental paresis; slow to comprehend or respond; may feel apathetic or weakened in mind along with bodily paralysis or constriction
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes and muscles with marked dryness, constriction and tendency to induration; especially affects bowels, rectum, throat and old people with chronic catarrhs
Key_Local_Symptoms: Constipation of the most obstinate kind: no desire for stool for days, violent ineffectual urging, no power to expel, hard marble-like masses yet rectum still feels full; itching and smarting in anus with haemorrhoids; haemorrhage from bowels in typhoid or low states; burning weight on top of head; throat relaxed, red, swollen with enlarged indurated tonsils, frequent throat colds and constriction of oesophagus, especially to liquids
Worse_From: Cold; catching repeated colds that settle in throat; long sitting and inactivity; low fevers and debilitating diseases
Better_From: Warmth; gentle pressure on head; regular, carefully managed bowel habits (general); constitutional treatment over time
Notes_Sphere: Deep-acting remedy for obstinate constipation with rectal inertia and haemorrhage, dryness and constriction of mucous membranes, and tendency to induration of tongue, rectum, uterus, especially in old or debilitated patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Excessively shy, embarrassed and self-conscious; cannot perform natural functions in presence of others (stool, urine, cough, etc.); nervous, easily excited by company or music; sleepless from crowding thoughts
General_Themes: Great nervous weakness in thin, delicate, often elderly or prematurely aged people; hysterical and spasmodic tendencies; over-sensitivity to external impressions like music or conversation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dry, hacking, nervous cough worse when others are listening or in company; asthma or dyspnoea in presence of others or on talking; constipation with hard, crumbling stool passed with much difficulty; tendency to spasms, twitching, and trembling from the least emotion
Worse_From: Company, especially strangers; music; talking; after sleep; mental excitement
Better_From: Gentle motion in open air; being alone; quiet surroundings
Notes_Sphere: Nervous remedy for shy, bashful, over-sensitive patients (often elderly or prematurely aged) with cough, asthma or bowels aggravated by embarrassment and presence of others

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, miserable during hay-fever season; cannot focus because of incessant sneezing and eye/nose irritation
General_Themes: Strong hay-fever remedy; acts on mucous membranes of eyes, nose and chest; late summer and autumn allergies, especially ragweed-type
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent, almost constant sneezing; profuse, watery, burning coryza; intense itching, burning and watering of eyes; nose and upper lip excoriated; asthmatic breathing or tight chest during attacks; may have urticarial or itchy skin eruptions with the coryza
Worse_From: Exposure to pollen, dust and late-summer air; being outdoors in ragweed season; night and early morning
Better_From: Staying indoors away from pollen; washing eyes and nose with cool water; cool, clean air (general)
Notes_Sphere: Key remedy for hay fever and ragweed-type allergies with violent sneezing, burning coryza, itching eyes and sometimes associated asthma or nettle-rash

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, drowsy and oppressed from chronic chest trouble; feels smothered and weighed down
General_Themes: Acts on bronchial mucous membranes and lungs; especially chronic bronchitis and asthma in old or weak patients; mucus tough, gluey, difficult to raise
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronic bronchial catarrh with abundant, thick, tenacious mucus forming plugs that are hard to expectorate; rattling in chest yet little comes up; shortness of breath, oppression and suffocative attacks, especially in elderly or emphysematous patients
Worse_From: Cold, damp air; fog; lying down; exertion that increases breathing effort
Better_From: Sitting up and leaning forward; warmer, drier air; gradual expectoration of mucus
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory remedy for chronic bronchitis, asthma and emphysema with tough, gluey mucus, oppression of chest and great difficulty in expectoration, especially in older people

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, depressed, tired from chronic gouty or urinary trouble; may feel old and worn-out before time
General_Themes: Acts on kidneys, joints and heart; uric-acid and gouty states with offensive urine and cardiac symptoms; rheumatic and gouty heart disease
Key_Local_Symptoms: Urine dark, brownish, very strong-smelling (like that of a horse); gouty, swollen and painful joints; wandering rheumatic pains; dyspnoea or palpitation in gouty subjects; sometimes oedema around ankles with heart involvement
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; exertion; suppression of gout or eruptions; dietary excesses that increase uric acid
Better_From: Rest; warmth; free action of kidneys and skin (general)
Notes_Sphere: Gouty-kidney-heart remedy with very offensive, dark urine, gouty and rheumatic joints and cardiac dyspnoea in uric-acid subjects

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous, excitable, easily startled; anxious from suffocative attacks or chronic respiratory trouble
General_Themes: Acts on larynx, trachea and mucous membranes; spasmodic and catarrhal affections; useful in croupy or whooping cough type states with much mucus and laryngeal irritation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Spasmodic, barking or croupy cough, especially at night; great laryngeal irritation with hoarseness or loss of voice; tough, stringy mucus in larynx and trachea; attacks of suffocation with cyanosis in children; sometimes acne or pustular eruptions in bromine-sensitive patients
Worse_From: Night; cold air on throat; talking; excitement; lying down
Better_From: Sitting up; warm drinks; steam inhalation (general relief)
Notes_Sphere: Laryngeal and respiratory remedy for spasmodic, croupy coughs and laryngeal irritation with tough mucus and threatening suffocation, especially at night in children

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, irritable, easily offended; depressed, weary of life but fears death; great aversion to exertion or effort; confused, sleepy, sluggish mind
General_Themes: Profound weakness with venous stasis, cyanosis and tendency to asphyxia; fat, flabby, chilly patients who easily collapse from slight exertion; great sensitivity to cold and damp; imperfect oxidation of blood
Key_Local_Symptoms: Shortness of breath and palpitation on the least exertion or going upstairs; must have window open yet feels chilly; tendency to nosebleed or epistaxis; bluish lips and face; fainting in closed rooms or from washing; early, profuse, dark, clotted menses with weakness; swollen glands and slow ulceration of skin
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; slightest exertion; ascending stairs; washing or bathing; being in a warm, stuffy room
Better_From: Warm, dry air; lying quietly; open, cool air in moderation; gentle stimulation (smelling salts, etc.)
Notes_Sphere: Deep-acting remedy for weak, flabby, chilly patients with asphyxic tendencies, dyspnoea on slight exertion, venous stasis, early exhausting menses and faintness in closed or heated rooms

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, fearful, restless in acute attacks; may feel he is suffocating or will choke; mind dull in severe poisoning-type states
General_Themes: Caustic, corrosive action on mucous membranes of mouth, throat, larynx and oesophagus; intense burning, swelling and danger of necrosis; also affects kidneys and circulation with great prostration
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent burning from mouth to stomach; painful, oedematous throat and larynx with danger of oedema glottidis; extreme hoarseness or complete aphonia; difficult or impossible swallowing, especially of liquids; strangling, suffocative attacks; albuminous urine with kidney irritation after caustic injuries
Worse_From: Cold air on throat; attempts to swallow, especially liquids; sudden exertion; inhaling irritant fumes
Better_From: Warmth to throat and chest; absolute rest; careful, slow sips if swallowing possible (supportive)
Notes_Sphere: Severe caustic-chemical remedy for intense burning and oedema of throat and larynx, aphonia and danger of suffocation after caustic injuries or laryngitis—strictly under medical supervision

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, restless, often depressed from chronic glandular or chest disease; may be irritable and driven
General_Themes: Strong action on glands, respiratory tract and heart; scrofulous, syphilitic or tubercular constitutions with enlarged glands and chronic catarrhs; wasting despite fairly good appetite
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronic nasal and bronchial catarrh with profuse, acrid, irritating discharge; hoarseness and laryngeal catarrh in speakers and singers; enlarged cervical and other glands, sometimes goitre; emaciation with night sweats; heart irritability with palpitations in chronic chest sufferers
Worse_From: Cold, damp air; drafts; overuse of voice; exertion in chest cases
Better_From: Warm, dry air; moderate gentle exercise in open air; perspiration (general)
Notes_Sphere: Chronic glandular and respiratory remedy for scrofulous or tubercular patients with enlarged glands, acrid catarrhs, hoarseness and wasting, often with irritable heart

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Sad, discouraged, very sensitive to criticism; feels isolated or slighted; may brood over troubles silently
General_Themes: Acts markedly on mucous membranes, liver and portal system; fat, sluggish, catarrhal subjects, often women with pelvic and haemorrhoidal troubles; tendency to hardened glands and secretions
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronic nasal catarrh with blocked nose at night and thick, gluey, difficult mucus by day; much postnasal dropping; cough with great rattling yet difficult expectoration; large, sore haemorrhoids with burning and smarting; sciatica or stiffness in limbs, worse sitting and at rest, better walking; menstrual irregularities with pelvic congestion
Worse_From: Sitting still; rest; damp, cold weather; early morning; rich food
Better_From: Walking about; continued gentle motion; warm, dry surroundings
Notes_Sphere: Catarrhal-portal remedy for fat, sluggish women with chronic nasal and bronchial catarrh, haemorrhoids, pelvic congestion and sciatic or stiff pains worse sitting, better walking

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, despondent, mentally tired; worries about chronic joint or nerve troubles; may be indifferent from long suffering
General_Themes: Acts on joints, nerves and metabolism; uric-acid and gouty states; nodosities and deposits about joints; also on spinal nerves and sciatic pains
Key_Local_Symptoms: Gouty and rheumatic arthritis with nodosities, stiffness and cracking in joints; chalky or uric-acid deposits; sciatica (often right-sided) with sharp, shooting pains down limb; thick, stringy mucus in throat or chest; obesity with weakness in gouty constitutions
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; exertion; dietary excesses (meat, alcohol) that increase uric acid; getting chilled
Better_From: Warmth; rest; light, non-stimulating diet; gentle stretching and movement once acute pain subsides
Notes_Sphere: Gouty-rheumatic remedy for uric-acid constitutions with nodular joints, sciatica and thick, stringy catarrh, often in overweight but weak patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally dull, heavy and tired; nervous, irritable from prolonged study or overwork; feels brain-fagged and worn out
General_Themes: Acts chiefly on brain, spine and blood in malarial and neuralgic states; suited to students, overworked persons and those with malarial influences; produces bilious and congestive headaches
Key_Local_Symptoms: Severe bilious or malarial headaches located in occiput and mastoid region, often extending over head; headaches from mental exertion or hot sun; neuralgic pains and malarial neuralgia; whooping-cough with marked head symptoms
Worse_From: Mental overwork and prolonged study; hot sun or heat; malarial influences; exertion during convalescence
Better_From: Rest from mental work; cool applications to head; open, fresh air
Notes_Sphere: Remedy for malarial fever and neuralgias, especially bilious occipital headaches from overwork or sun, in worn-out, brain-fagged patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Highly nervous, hysterical, easily excited; insomnia from nervous erethism; sensitive, irritable and restless
General_Themes: Acts on nervous system and heart; remedy for nervous, hysterical people with neuralgic headaches, insomnia and functional tachycardia
Key_Local_Symptoms: Neuralgic headaches with great nervous agitation; insomnia from nervous excitement; palpitation and functional heart disturbance, tachycardia, especially in nervous women; fluttering and precordial anxiety without structural heart disease
Worse_From: Emotional excitement; mental strain; noise; rich food or stimulants in sensitive subjects
Better_From: Quiet, dark room; rest; gentle reassurance and regulation of lifestyle (general)
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and cardiac remedy for hysterical, highly strung patients with neuralgic headaches, insomnia and functional palpitations or tachycardia

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited and weak from chronic disease; may feel anxious about health from long-standing dropsical or throat problems
General_Themes: Acts on kidneys, serous membranes and mucous membranes; notable in renal dropsies, hydrocele and chronic hoarseness in scrofulous or debilitated patients
Key_Local_Symptoms: Renal dropsy with swelling of legs and possibly hydrocele; chronic hoarseness and laryngeal catarrh in scrofulous or weakened subjects; choleric or cholera-like diarrhoeal symptoms in some cases
Worse_From: Chronic kidney or liver strain; cold, damp weather; exertion in debilitated patients
Better_From: Rest; dry, warm environment; improved elimination under medical care (general)
Notes_Sphere: Rare remedy used for renal dropsies, hydrocele and chronic hoarseness in scrofulous or debilitated people, sometimes with choleric diarrhoea

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, weak and nauseated; mental state coloured by persistent vomiting or gastric upset; may be anxious about chronic nausea
General_Themes: Acts on stomach, eyes and urinary tract; valuable in vomiting of various kinds, especially morning sickness; also affects urinary tract with ischuria and haematuria
Key_Local_Symptoms: Persistent vomiting of various kinds including pregnancy-related morning sickness; nausea with inability to retain food; irritation of eyes with smarting and watering; urinary difficulties such as ischuria and haematuria or other haemorrhagic tendencies
Worse_From: Pregnancy and motion in sensitive women; rich or unsuitable food; exertion during vomiting attacks
Better_From: Small, frequent sips of cool fluids; rest; simple bland diet (general)
Notes_Sphere: Gastric and urinary remedy for vomiting (especially morning sickness), eye irritation and urinary troubles including ischuria and haematuria

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, fearful, feels something dreadful is going to happen; sudden flushes of fear with sense of suffocation; panicky, restless
General_Themes: Powerful vasodilator acting rapidly on blood vessels and heart; causes flushing, throbbing, palpitation and tendency to collapse; useful in angina pectoris, vasomotor flushes and spasmodic vascular constriction
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sudden flushing of face and head with intense heat and throbbing; bursting headache, especially in vertex; violent palpitation and painful clutching in cardiac region; angina-like pains with sense of impending suffocation, needs to sit erect and keep very still; constriction of throat and chest with dyspnoea, asthmatic feelings
Worse_From: Emotion or excitement; warm, closed rooms; exertion that strains heart; menopausal flushes or vasomotor disturbances
Better_From: Cool fresh air; sitting upright and still; loosening clothing; open windows (general)
Notes_Sphere: Acute, short-acting remedy for vasomotor storms with flushing, throbbing, angina and suffocative feelings arising from sudden arterial dilatation or spasmodic vascular constriction

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Marked inner conflict and duality, as if two wills or voices were opposing each other; feels as if there is a good and bad influence fighting within; great irresolution, cruelty or hardness on one side and timidity or remorse on the other; loss of self-confidence with fear of being criticised or despised
General_Themes: Acts on mind, nervous system and digestive tract; neurasthenic, worn-out people with weak memory, brain-fag and gastric disturbance; characteristic sensations of a plug or band in various parts (throat, rectum, chest, spine)
Key_Local_Symptoms: Loss of memory, especially for names, what was just read or intended; feels as if mind is blank between perception and recognition; sensation of plug in rectum causing constant ineffectual desire, stool partly expelled then slips back; gastric symptoms better while eating but return soon after; skin eruptions and itching from contact with poisonous plants of same family
Worse_From: Mental exertion; contradiction; humiliation or being scolded; fasting or going too long without food
Better_From: Eating relieves many complaints temporarily; occupation and mental engagement; warm surroundings
Notes_Sphere: Important constitutional remedy for neurasthenic, divided, irresolute patients with weak memory, inner conflict and characteristic plug sensations in rectum and other parts

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless, somewhat excited or fidgety; may be low in spirits from chronic skin disorders; disturbed sleep with late falling asleep and unrefreshing rest
General_Themes: Marked action on skin and mucous membranes; promotes expulsion of foreign bodies and splinters; has been used in warts, ill-conditioned ulcers and dropsical states
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense itching and tingling of skin all over; dry, bran-like tetters in rings; warts and softening of hardened tissues; promotes expulsion of splinters from skin; ill-conditioned ulcers and swellings on joints
Worse_From: Scratching; warmth of bed; local irritation or friction
Better_From: Cool applications; airing the skin; gentle cleansing of affected parts
Notes_Sphere: Skin remedy with great itching and tingling, ring-like tetters, warts and tendency to help expel splinters and improve ill-conditioned ulcers and swellings

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Sad, restless, suspicious or even homicidal impulses described in some provings; mental disturbance linked with chronic skin disease or epilepsy; may be loquacious or quarrelsome
General_Themes: Skin remedy of high order, producing vesicular and pustular eruptions; also has action on nervous system with epileptiform convulsions and on mucous membranes of nose and chest
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intensely itching, burning eruptions that may resemble lepra or chronic eczema; ulcerations and fissures; episodes of epileptiform convulsions beginning with sadness, restlessness, hiccough and gastric burning, progressing to loss of consciousness and violent movements; fluent coryza with burning nostrils and lachrymation
Worse_From: Heat; mental excitement; suppressed eruptions; cold, damp weather aggravating rheumatic and skin symptoms
Better_From: Warm, dry applications; free expression of skin eruptions under supervision; rest after convulsive episodes
Notes_Sphere: Deep-acting remedy for chronic, sometimes leprous-like skin disease and epileptiform states with intense itching, burning eruptions and mental disturbance

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, dull and listless during fevers; disinclined to move; may feel depressed and heavy from hepatic and digestive trouble
General_Themes: Bitter liver and fever remedy; acts on liver, digestive tract and blood; intermittent or remittent fevers with burning heat and chilliness; hepatic enlargement and jaundice; abdominal and chest burning
Key_Local_Symptoms: Fever with chilliness and burning heat over body, often around 11 a.m. or 7–8 p.m.; intense thirst and headache during fever; liver enlarged and tender, jaundice with dark, thick urine; heaviness and burning in abdomen, no hunger; burning in chest with cough or oppression
Worse_From: Fever paroxysms; exertion during febrile or hepatic states; hot, confined rooms
Better_From: Cool air application to head; rest; careful regulation of diet and fluids (general)
Notes_Sphere: Rare but useful remedy for fevers with hepatic involvement, jaundice, abdominal heaviness and burning, and burning in chest, especially in tropical or malarial regions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally dull, heavy and tired from chronic catarrh; feels stupefied and oppressed in head; may be irritable from constant stuffiness and discharge
General_Themes: Mucous membrane medicine; acts on nasal, pharyngeal, urinary and intestinal mucosa; chronic inflammation of Schneiderian membrane with relaxation and profuse discharge; also used as diuretic and in some malarial states and injuries
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronic catarrhal colds with full, stuffy sensation in head and throat; profuse mucous or serous nasal and pharyngeal discharge; chronic nasal and pharyngeal catarrh with postnasal drip; catarrhal diarrhoea and urethritis with mucous discharges; useful in cuts, bruises and sprains as a local application; may aid kidney function as mild diuretic
Worse_From: Wet weather; frost and winter; chronic exposure to damp, cold conditions; neglected catarrhal states
Better_From: Dry, warm climate; keeping nose and throat warm and protected; steam inhalations and gentle local care (general)
Notes_Sphere: Mucous-membrane remedy for chronic nasal and pharyngeal catarrh with stuffy head and profuse discharge, and for some catarrhal diarrhoeas, urethritis and minor injuries, especially from damp, cold conditions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Altered consciousness with loss of sense of time and space; brilliant coloured visions and dream-like states; may feel detached, lazy, content, or confused and fearful; mind over-stimulated yet unable to think clearly
General_Themes: Acts powerfully on brain and special senses; produces hallucinations, megrim, brain-fag and insomnia; affects heart and respiration with nervous trembling and motor incoordination
Key_Local_Symptoms: Headaches with visual phenomena—moving, many-coloured geometric or fantastic images; pupils dilated, vertigo, sense of brain tired and buzzing; hyperacute hearing and exaggerated echo of sounds; insomnia from vivid inner pictures and racing impressions
Worse_From: Mental overstrain; sensory overload (light, sound); excitement; sometimes after use of intoxicants or drugs
Better_From: Quiet, dark environment; rest; withdrawing from stimulants and sensory input
Notes_Sphere: Psycho-sensory remedy for hallucinations, coloured spectra, disordered perception of time and brain-fag states, sometimes useful in migraine or insomnia with rich inner imagery

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, low and confused in toxic states; mental weakness from profound anaemia and poor oxygenation; may be dull, apathetic, with a sense of impending illness
General_Themes: Coal-tar derivative acting on blood and circulation; marked destruction of red cells leading to cyanosis, profound anaemia and weakness; also affects urinary tract and skin
Key_Local_Symptoms: Marked giddiness and bursting headache; face and lips bluish or purplish; swelling and pain in penis and scrotum; tumours or irritation of urinary passages; gastric disturbances with anorexia; general skin swelling or oedema with livid discolouration
Worse_From: Exertion; further toxic or drug exposure; cold; lack of fresh air in anaemic states
Better_From: Rest; warm, quiet surroundings; careful medical management of anaemia and toxins (supportive)
Notes_Sphere: Toxic-anaemic remedy representing drug effects of coal-tar products with cyanosis, urinary-tract involvement and profound blood weakness—reserved for expert supervision

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Fretful, colicky, especially infants with regular-time abdominal pains; older patients irritable and tired from chronic flatulence or catarrh
General_Themes: Acts on digestive tract and respiratory mucosa; flatulent colic in babies and adults; “three-month colic” that recurs at set hours; catarrh of trachea and stomach, especially in old drunkards or asthmatics
Key_Local_Symptoms: Much rumbling and distension of abdomen with flatulent colic; infant colic at fixed times of day; characteristic pain near third rib close to sternum (usually right side) often associated with cough; purulent tracheal and gastric catarrh in heavy drinkers; vomiting and sometimes epileptiform convulsions with biting of tongue
Worse_From: Regular daily period of colic; rich food and alcohol; cold air in chesty patients
Better_From: Gentle warmth to abdomen; carrying or gentle rocking of the child; regulated simple diet
Notes_Sphere: Digestive–respiratory remedy for flatulent colic (especially time-locked baby colic) and tracheo-gastric catarrh in old drinkers or asthmatics, with characteristic chest wall pain near third rib

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Cross, over-sensitive like Chamomilla but often with marked chilliness; children very irritable from gastric troubles, cannot bear to be touched or looked at; adults peevish and dissatisfied
General_Themes: Roman Chamomile; like Chamomilla but more chilly; acts on stomach, liver and mucous membranes; gastric disturbances with sensation of coldness and sensitivity to cold air and cold drinks
Key_Local_Symptoms: Gastric upset with cold feeling in stomach and abdomen; aching in liver region; griping with chilliness running into legs; coryza with much lachrymation, sneezing and watery nasal discharge, worse indoors; tickling cough and constricted, raw throat, worse in warm room; itching of anus with pale, putty-like stools
Worse_From: Cold air and cold things; being indoors; warm rooms for respiratory symptoms; dentition and worms in children
Better_From: Warm coverings and drinks for gastric chilliness; open, cool air for head and nose symptoms; gentle motion
Notes_Sphere: Child and adult remedy akin to Chamomilla where gastric disturbance, coldness and sensitivity to cold predominate, with coryza and rectal itching with pale stools

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Great anxiety and restlessness from intense burning pains and rapid tissue destruction; may be septic, dull, semi-delirious, sinking into collapse
General_Themes: Nosode from anthrax; profound septic and toxic action; indicated in malignant inflammations, carbuncles, boils, cellulitis, gangrenous ulcers and septicemia when burning, black, sloughing tissue dominates
Key_Local_Symptoms: Carbuncles and malignant boils with horrible burning pains, dark, gangrenous base and thin, foul, ichorous discharge; black or blue blisters and malignant pustules; septic fevers with rapid loss of strength, sinking pulse, delirium and fainting; haemorrhages of dark, decomposing blood from various orifices
Worse_From: Septic states; suppression or ill-treatment of boils and carbuncles; trauma or infection leading to gangrene
Better_From: Warmth to affected area usually aggravates burning; often only slight relief from appropriate local drainage and antiseptic care (general), while remedy modifies sepsis
Notes_Sphere: High-powered nosode for severe septic, sloughing, burning conditions—carbuncles, malignant ulcers, gangrene and septicemia—used with strong conventional management

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally dull, depressed and tired from chronic skin and rheumatic troubles; may be irritable from persistent itching and discomfort
General_Themes: Anthracite coal in caustic potash; acts on skin, joints and digestion; chronic pruritic eruptions with fissures and vesicles; some bilious and rheumatic tendencies
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronic skin eruptions—scabies-like, prurigo, herpes, cracks and ulcerations—with papular or vesicular tendency, especially on scrotum, hands, tibia, shoulders and dorsum of feet; intense itching; chronic rheumatism; bilious attacks with vomiting of bile and tympanitic, distended abdomen
Worse_From: Heat of bed; scratching; damp or cold aggravating rheumatic pains; dietary errors in bilious subjects
Better_From: Cool applications; keeping skin clean and dry; gentle movement for rheumatism; careful diet
Notes_Sphere: Chronic skin–rheumatic remedy where pruritic, fissured eruptions and bilious or rheumatic complaints coexist, especially with eruptions in scrotal and lower-limb regions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, weak and breathless; feels he will suffocate; great prostration with fear and restlessness from cardiac and respiratory weakness
General_Themes: Arsenite of antimony; combines features of Antimonium and Arsenicum; indicated in emphysema, chronic bronchitis and catarrhal pneumonia with much mucus and cardiac weakness; also pleurisy and pericarditis with effusion
Key_Local_Symptoms: Great dyspnoea with much mucous secretion; breathing difficult, worse lying down or after food; emphysema with wheezing and cough; catarrhal pneumonia after influenza; myocarditis and failing heart with sense of weakness; pleurisy (especially left) and pericarditis with exudation; sometimes oedematous face and inflamed eyes
Worse_From: Eating; lying down; exertion; damp cold air; post-influenza chest weakness
Better_From: Sitting up; leaning forward; fresh but not cold air; slow, gentle movement as tolerated
Notes_Sphere: Cardio-respiratory remedy for emphysema and post-influenza chest conditions with copious mucus, marked dyspnoea, cardiac weakness and aggravation lying or after eating

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Sulky, peevish, cannot bear to be looked at or touched; children cry when examined; adults gloomy, dissatisfied; mental and physical symptoms often from overeating or heat
General_Themes: Acts strongly on digestive tract, mucous membranes and skin; suits “gross feeders” who overindulge, especially in rich food, pastries, wine; thickened mucosa, disordered digestion and extensive skin eruptions (warts, corns, thick crusts)
Key_Local_Symptoms: Thick, white-coated tongue; digestive upset from overeating or mixed foods—eructations tasting of food, nausea, vomiting, diarrhoea or alternating constipation; dislike of being bathed or touched; plantar warts, callosities and cracked, rough skin; pustular eruptions and impetigo-like lesions; gouty or rheumatic complaints in big toe or ankles
Worse_From: Heat of sun or bath; overeating, especially acid or rich foods; cold bathing; touch or pressure on sensitive skin or corns
Better_From: Rest; avoidance of overeating; cool but not cold environment; gentle local care to skin and feet
Notes_Sphere: Constitutional remedy for thick, crusty skin and warts combined with gastric disturbance from overeating and irritable, oversensitive mood, often in children and stout adults

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, oppressed from chronic catarrh and chest congestion; mentally dull from long-standing mucus accumulation and poor oxygenation
General_Themes: Golden sulphuret of antimony; noted for many forms of chronic nasal and bronchial catarrh; also eye troubles (incipient amaurosis) and acne; increases tough mucus in nose, throat and bronchi
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronic coryza with much tough mucus, loss of smell and raw, scrapy feeling in nose and throat; nosebleed when washing face; chronic bronchial catarrh with difficult, tenacious expectoration and passive congestion of upper left lung; acne and facial eruptions; ocular symptoms such as dim vision or early clouding
Worse_From: Cold damp weather; washing (especially face and nose); exertion in chest cases
Better_From: Warm, dry air; gradual loosening and expectoration of mucus; gentle steam inhalation (general)
Notes_Sphere: Chronic catarrh remedy for nose, throat, bronchi and sometimes eyes and skin (acne), with tough mucus, nosebleed on washing and passive lung congestion

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Drowsy, apathetic, irritable when disturbed; feels too weak to cough or move; anxiety and fear of suffocation when breathing is oppressed
General_Themes: Acts especially on lungs and bronchi with accumulation of mucus and failure of expectoration; also on heart and circulation; suits old people and very young with weak, sluggish reaction; tendency to collapse with cold sweat
Key_Local_Symptoms: Great rattling of mucus in chest with little or no expectoration; threatened suffocation, especially in sleep or when drowsy; face pale or cyanotic, cold sweat; useful in bronchitis, bronchiolitis, pneumonia and asthma with “drowning in secretions”; may have nausea, vomiting and diarrhoea with exhaustion; sometimes urinary irritation and burning stools in low states
Worse_From: Lying down; warmth of room; after sleep; in children during teething or acute chest infections; exertion
Better_From: Sitting up or being held upright; being carried; fresh, cool air (not chilling); gentle suction/clearing of mucus in medical settings
Notes_Sphere: Key acute chest remedy when there is excessive rattling mucus with inability to raise it, much drowsiness, prostration and impending suffocation, especially in infants, children and the elderly

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Excitable, restless, cannot keep still; anxious and sleepless from intense itching or burning; mental state chased by drug-like over-stimulation and collapse
General_Themes: Coal-tar antipyretic acting on vasomotor system, skin and blood; rapid alternation of flushing and pallor, profuse sweats and intense pruritus; urticaria and oedematous skin eruptions
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent itching all over body, worse warmth of bed; large wheals, urticaria, angio-oedema, sometimes with swelling of tongue and throat; profuse, sometimes drenching sweats in short, sharp paroxysms; sudden rise and fall of temperature; burning and redness of ears, face, hands
Worse_From: Warmth of bed; hot rooms; exertion; drug abuse or repeated antipyrine use
Better_From: Cool applications; exposure of skin to cool air; rest in a cool room
Notes_Sphere: Drug-picture remedy for antipyrine-type reactions with violent itching, urticaria, angio-oedema, flushing and profuse sweats, especially at night in bed

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, fretful from intestinal or liver disturbance; mind dulled by chronic abdominal discomfort
General_Themes: Acts on liver and intestinal canal; hepatic congestion with jaundice and bilious attacks; intestinal catarrh with colic and diarrhoea
Key_Local_Symptoms: Colicky, cutting pains about umbilicus with diarrhoea; stools watery, bilious or slimy; liver region sore and enlarged; jaundice with yellowness of eyes and skin; general weakness, head heavy
Worse_From: Dietary indiscretions; cold drinks when overheated; damp, cold weather
Better_From: Warmth to abdomen; simple, light diet; rest
Notes_Sphere: Hepatic–intestinal remedy for bilious colic, jaundice and catarrhal diarrhoea with soreness of liver region and great weakness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless, fidgety, easily irritated; weeps without cause; jealous, suspicious; cannot tolerate heat; often apathetic or drowsy in serious oedematous states
General_Themes: Acts on skin, serous membranes and kidneys; causes oedema, serous effusions and urticaria; burning, stinging pains like bee-stings; right-sided ovarian and throat complaints; dropsical states with scanty urine
Key_Local_Symptoms: Puffy, oedematous swellings that are pale, waxy or rosy, with burning-stinging pains and tenderness; urticaria and erysipelatous eruptions; serous effusions into pleura, pericardium, peritoneum or joints; sore, swollen throat with oedematous uvula; scanty, burning, sometimes albuminous urine; absence of thirst or only slight thirst despite fever
Worse_From: Heat; warm, stuffy rooms; touch; late afternoon (3–5 p.m.); lying on affected side
Better_From: Cold applications; cool open air; uncovering; after perspiration breaks
Notes_Sphere: Major remedy for oedema, urticaria and serous effusions with burning, stinging pains, intolerance of heat and aggravation 3–5 p.m.

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, nervous from long-standing rheumatic or urinary irritation; may be low and despondent when pains are severe
General_Themes: Acts on fibrous tissues, kidneys and bladder; rheumatic and gouty states with tendency to lithiasis and urinary irritation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Shifting rheumatic pains in joints and limbs, worse damp; backache and soreness in kidney region; frequent urging to urinate, scanty and high-coloured urine; burning in urethra; sometimes aggravation of uterine or ovarian pains around menses
Worse_From: Damp, cold weather; getting wet; excess meat, alcohol or rich food in gouty subjects
Better_From: Warmth; dry climate; rest; increased fluid intake and light diet (general)
Notes_Sphere: Rheumatic–urinary remedy for gouty and rheumatic pains with urinary irritation and kidney-region soreness, often in those who overuse stimulating food and drink

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, weak and nauseated; low-spirited and discouraged from persistent gastric and cardiac symptoms; may be irritable and restless
General_Themes: Acts on stomach, heart and circulation; produces vomiting, diarrhoea and profound prostration; some action on kidneys and serous membranes with oedema or dropsy
Key_Local_Symptoms: Persistent nausea and vomiting, often with diarrhoea and great weakness; empty, sinking feeling at pit of stomach; feeble, irregular pulse, tendency to collapse; dropsical swellings of limbs and body with scanty urine; sometimes alternating vomiting and purging
Worse_From: Motion; taking food or drink; hot rooms
Better_From: Cool fresh air; small sips of cold water; absolute rest in horizontal position
Notes_Sphere: Gastric–cardiac–dropsical remedy with persistent vomiting, diarrhoea, feeble heart and general oedema with scanty urine, requiring careful medical supervision

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Despondent and irritable; anxious about heart and dropsical state; feels weak and oppressed; restless from suffocative attacks
General_Themes: Strong action on heart, kidneys and serous membranes; dropsy of cardiac or renal origin; oedema of legs, abdominal and pleural effusion; scanty urine, sometimes suppressed; weak, irregular pulse
Key_Local_Symptoms: General dropsy with swelling of feet, legs, abdomen and sometimes chest; scanty, dark or almost absent urine; much thirst but water aggravates nausea and vomiting; feeling of suffocation from hydrothorax; weak, irregular heart action; sometimes loose stool with exhaustion
Worse_From: Eating or drinking freely; lying flat when hydrothorax present; exertion
Better_From: Sitting propped up; small sips of water; rest; careful regulation of fluids and salt (general)
Notes_Sphere: Classic dropsy remedy for cardiac and renal oedema with scanty urine, great thirst, nausea on drinking and oppression of breathing from effusions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, restless, nauseated; mental state dominated by violent nausea and vomiting; fear of swallowing or moving
General_Themes: Acts on vomiting centre and respiratory tract; intense and uncontrollable nausea and vomiting; also used in some respiratory and laryngeal affections with excessive secretion
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sudden, violent, persistent vomiting regardless of what is taken; retching and great prostration; nausea not relieved by vomiting; excessive bronchial secretion with suffocative cough, frothy, profuse sputum; fits of coughing ending in vomiting
Worse_From: Any attempt to eat or drink; motion; tobacco or offensive odours in sensitive patients
Better_From: Absolute rest; withholding food temporarily (medical guidance); small sips of cool water or ice chips (general)
Notes_Sphere: Remedy corresponding to drug picture of apomorphine with intense, uncontrollable nausea and vomiting and sometimes excessive bronchial secretion

Notes_Sphere: Experimental remedy with limited human clinical use, associated with digestive disturbance, nervous weakness and incoordination; included more for completeness than routine prescribing

Better_From: Sitting up in bed; warm drinks; warm, moist air or steam inhalation (general)
Notes_Sphere: Asthmatic–laryngeal remedy with sudden night attacks coming on immediately after lying down, compelling patient to sit up and cough violently

Better_From: Dry, warm climate; lying down warmly covered; tobacco smoke and firm pressure may give some relief
Notes_Sphere: Remedy for hydrogenoid, malarial-type patients who are extremely sensitive to damp and cold, with periodic chills, bone pains and splenic congestion

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low, irritable from chronic skin and joint trouble; may feel stiff, old and discouraged when eruptions or arthritis flare
General_Themes: Acts on skin, joints and urinary tract; eczema associated with gouty and rheumatic tendencies; arthritis of larger joints with shifting of symptoms between skin and joints

Notes_Sphere: Skin–joint–urinary remedy where eczema alternates or coexists with gouty arthritis and lumbago, and urine tends to clear as the case improves

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, weak and nervy with worm complaints or eye strain; mental dulness from chronic gastric or parasitic irritation
General_Themes: Betel nut; traditionally used for helminthic infestations and tapeworm; acts on eye, salivary glands, heart and intestines; increases salivation and peristalsis

Notes_Sphere: Helminthic and gastrointestinal remedy where worms, salivation, contracted pupils and increased intestinal activity are prominent features

Notes_Sphere: Spasmodic remedy for colicky bowel cramps, throbbing head, dry painful throat and scanty discoloured urine, with neuro-muscular pains disturbing sleep

Notes_Sphere: Voice–joint remedy for those who emaciate, crave fresh air and suffer hoarseness and joint weakness, notably knees and elbows, worse from speaking or mental exertion

General_Themes: Strongly neurotic remedy acting on brain, spinal cord and mucous membranes; loss of control and coordination mentally and physically; tremors, unsteadiness and a sense of expansion; irritant to throat and digestive tract leading to gastritis and flatulent dyspepsia

Notes_Sphere: Key remedy for anticipatory anxiety with trembling and diarrhoea, incoordination and mucous-membrane irritation of throat and digestive tract

General_Themes: Brazilian snake root; produces stitching pains, venous congestion and irritation of intestines, anus and lower limbs; affects heels, Achilles tendon and ankles

Notes_Sphere: Peripheral–intestinal remedy with stitching pains, colic and burning anus, together with heel, Achilles and ankle pains and bruised, mottled legs

Better_From: Rest; lying with head low in shock; cold applications acutely then gentle warmth; proper local care of injuries
Notes_Sphere: First-aid and post-trauma remedy for bruises, strains, sprains, shock and post-surgical soreness, with characteristic “as if beaten” feeling and aversion to being touched

Notes_Sphere: Deep-acting constitutional and acute remedy for great prostration, burning pains better by heat, restlessness and anxiety with small-sip thirst and acrid discharges, widely used in digestive, respiratory and skin conditions

Notes_Sphere: Skin–metabolic remedy particularly referenced for acne rosacea or stubborn acne of youth, sometimes in association with disordered sugar metabolism

Notes_Sphere: Deep, toxic Arsenicum state with kidney involvement, haemorrhage, extreme coldness and collapse anxiety, often in severe infections or cholera-like conditions

Notes_Sphere: Remedy for chronic burning catarrhs and acrid discharges with red, angry mucosa, especially in scrofulous or tubercular subjects and in senile heart conditions

Notes_Sphere: Chronic arsenical-syphilitic remedy with periodic headaches, oedematous swellings and weakness, often where latent syphilis or deep cachexia is suspected

Notes_Sphere: Chronic catarrhal and skin remedy where arsenic-type burning and sulphur-type skin involvement combine, often with dry cough worse from cold

Better_From: Warm drinks; warm, moist air; rest and quiet for voice
Notes_Sphere: Throat and larynx remedy for raw, tender pharyngitis with croupy, hoarse cough and urinary burning, especially when night asthma and languor are present

Notes_Sphere: Acute throat–nose remedy for acrid coryza and excoriated lips and nostrils, especially in restless children who pick at the sore parts and bore head into pillow

Notes_Sphere: Hay-fever–rhinitis remedy with keynote itching of nose and palate, sneezing and watery coryza, often with disturbed smell and ear catarrh

Notes_Sphere: Remedy for hysterical flatulence with reversed peristalsis, noisy eructations and bursting sensations, also for deep-seated syphilitic bone disease with extreme sensitivity and throbbing pains

Notes_Sphere: Nervous-sensory remedy for extreme hyperaesthesia (especially to sound) with shivering, peevish anaemic children or adults who become unwell from ordinary sensory stimulation

Notes_Sphere: Pleurisy–dropsy remedy with stitching pleuritic pains, sweat with scanty urine and some oedema, especially when pleural effusion and chest oppression are present

Notes_Sphere: Biliary–digestive remedy for jaundice and bilious gastrointestinal disturbances with nausea, colic and weakness

Notes_Sphere: Alterative skin–liver remedy for urticaria, eczema and gouty or rheumatic conditions associated with hepatic or splenic enlargement and indulgent diet

Notes_Sphere: Blood–spleen–skin remedy for intermittent fever, rheumatic pains and toxic or malarial states with afternoon rise of temperature and congested spleen

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, tired, often with fear about lungs and chronic disease; mentally dull from long chest trouble
General_Themes: Tubercular nosode prepared from diseased lung; deep action on respiratory tract and skin; chronic bronchitis, catarrhal phthisis, humid asthma and tendency to tubercular states
Key_Local_Symptoms: Oppression of chest with catarrhal dyspnoea and humid asthma; muco-purulent, bubbling, bronchial expectoration that tends to lessen under its use; chronic coughs in weak, cachectic patients; ringworm and pityriasis of scalp or body; eczema of eyelids; enlarged tender neck glands
Worse_From: Night and early morning; cold air; damp, chilly weather; suppression of skin eruptions
Better_From: Dry, warm climate; heat in general; open air without draughts; gradual improvement of expectoration
Notes_Sphere: Nosode for chronic lung and tubercular tendencies with muco-purulent expectoration, humid asthma and ringworm or eczematous skin, often opening the way for other remedies

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Oversensitive, irritable from soreness; feels bruised and beaten, dislikes motion or touch of clothes
General_Themes: Fresh-water sponge; acts on muscles, skin and lymphatic glands; scrofulous and rheumatic states with great superficial soreness and swollen glands
Key_Local_Symptoms: General soreness of muscles and integuments as if beaten; sensitiveness of skin to touch and to friction of clothing; swollen, tender glands, especially cervical; profuse fluent coryza with sneezing and thin mucus; spasmodic cough or whooping-cough with thick, yellow mucus and great soreness of chest wall
Worse_From: Motion; jar or touch; friction of clothing; cold and damp air
Better_From: Rest; warmth; loose clothing; gentle applications that reduce glandular congestion
Notes_Sphere: Muscle–gland remedy for bruised soreness of soft tissues and glands, with coryza or spasmodic cough and high sensitivity to motion and cold

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable and low from prolonged catarrh and weakness; may feel anxious about lungs and emaciation
General_Themes: Peruvian balsam; empiric but valuable in bronchial catarrh and catarrhal phthisis; promotes granulation in ulcers; stimulates healing of respiratory and cutaneous mucosa
Key_Local_Symptoms: Bronchial catarrh or catarrhal phthisis with copious thick, creamy, yellowish-white or purulent expectoration; loud rales, night sweats, hectic fever and debility; chronic bronchitis or early tuberculosis; locally used for indolent ulcers, fissures and itchy skin affections
Worse_From: Cold, damp air; exertion; night, with sweats and cough; neglect of hygiene in chronic lung cases
Better_From: Warm, dry air; rest; good nourishment; local cleansing and balsamic applications
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory–skin remedy for chronic, purulent bronchial catarrh and early phthisical states with hectic and night sweats, also used topically to stimulate healing in chronic ulcers and fissured skin

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Stuporous, confused, as if intoxicated; falls asleep while answering; feels body is scattered and must be collected; besotted, indifferent or delirious
General_Themes: Short-acting, septic remedy for acute fevers; acts on blood, mucous membranes and nervous system; typhoid, influenza, septic sore throat and low adynamic states
Key_Local_Symptoms: Profound prostration with high fever and offensive discharges; face dusky, dark-red, besotted or “drunken” looking; delirious stupor, falls asleep while spoken to, answers slowly and correctly then relapses into stupor; tongue coated, then dry, brown and cracked; sore, bruised feeling all over, bed feels hard; ulcerated, foul mucous membranes and offensive stools or breath
Worse_From: Septic fevers; close, overheated rooms; motion; mental exertion when toxic
Better_From: Fresh, cool air; rest; sips of water; good ventilation around the patient
Notes_Sphere: Septic–typhoid remedy for prostrating fevers with dusky face, offensive discharges and characteristic stupor with falling asleep while answering

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, anxious from constant urinary urging and pelvic discomfort; mentally preoccupied with bladder or prostate symptoms
General_Themes: Buchu; acts specifically on genito-urinary mucous membranes; vesical catarrh, cystitis, gravel, prostatic and pelvic catarrhal states
Key_Local_Symptoms: Irritable bladder with frequent urging and scanty or burning urination; muco-purulent vesical discharge; cystitis or urethritis with cutting pains; prostatic irritation with dribbling or discomfort; pelvic catarrh with leucorrhoea and offensive odour
Worse_From: Cold, damp; coffee, alcohol or irritating drinks; getting chilled when bladder is weak
Better_From: Plenty of water; avoidance of irritant foods and drinks; moderate warmth; regular emptying of bladder
Notes_Sphere: Genito-urinary remedy for irritable bladder, cystitis, gravel and prostatic or vaginal catarrh with muco-purulent, sometimes offensive discharge

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Timid, lacks self-confidence, forgetful and indecisive; feels weak and old, especially in limbs and back
General_Themes: Acetate of barium; acts on nerves, muscles, joints and aged skin; paralysis beginning in extremities, lumbago and rheumatic pains, pruritus of the elderly
Key_Local_Symptoms: Drawing, rheumatic pains down limbs, especially left leg, with lumbago and stiffness; crawling and burning stitches in muscles and joints; progressive weakness or paralysis starting in extremities and creeping upward; pruritus and troublesome itching in aged people; sensation of cobweb on face
Worse_From: Cold and damp; exertion; prolonged standing or walking; mental strain in weak patients
Better_From: Rest; gentle warmth; light massage or movement; supportive care for aged skin and circulation
Notes_Sphere: Nervous–muscular baryta salt for paralytic weakness, lumbago and rheumatic pains with pruritus in elderly or debilitated patients and marked lack of confidence

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Childish, timid, shy, easily embarrassed; fears strangers, feels small and inadequate; in elders, childishness and loss of mental power
General_Themes: Constitutional baryta; marked influence on growth and ageing; mental and physical dwarfishness, delayed development in children and premature senility in old people; tendency to enlarged glands and vascular degeneration
Key_Local_Symptoms: Retarded growth, both mental and physical; children late to walk, talk or assume responsibility; enlarged, chronically inflamed tonsils and cervical glands; recurrent tonsillitis and quinsy; enlarged prostate or other glands in elderly; tendency to atherosclerosis, apoplexy and cardiac strain in old people; always chilly, takes cold easily
