Worse_From: Cold and damp; exposure of feet and neck; mental exertion or embarrassment; presence of strangers
Better_From: Warm, dry climate; reassurance and protection; gentle, structured demands appropriate to level of development
Notes_Sphere: Deep baryta constitution for dwarfish, timid children and prematurely aged adults with enlarged glands (especially tonsils and prostate), recurrent throat infections and vascular degeneration

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, oversensitive about health; often timid or underdeveloped children with chronic glandular trouble; may be fretful and self-conscious
General_Themes: Iodide of baryta; acts strongly on lymphatic system and glands; increases leucocytosis; indicated in indurated and hypertrophied glands, especially tonsils, breasts and cervical nodes, and in strumous states
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronically enlarged, hard tonsils with tendency to quinsy; hypertrophied, indurated cervical glands and mammary glands; strumous ophthalmia with swollen lids and glands about neck; stunted growth and undernourished appearance; glandular tumours in lymphatic constitutions
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; taking cold about throat; suppressed glandular discharges; exertion during acute gland inflammation
Better_From: Dry, warm climate; gentle warmth to throat and glands; gradual constitutional strengthening
Notes_Sphere: Baryta–iodine gland remedy for hard, indurated tonsils and other glands (especially cervical and breasts) in strumous, underdeveloped subjects with recurrent throat and eye inflammations

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Childish, confused, indecisive like Baryta carbonica, but often with more serious heart and vessel disease; anxious, fearful something will happen, especially about heart or brain
General_Themes: Chloride of barium; combines baryta immaturity with strong action on heart, arteries and glands; arteriosclerosis, aneurysm, hypertrophy and dilatation of heart, pancreatic and salivary gland induration, parotid and tonsillar swellings
Key_Local_Symptoms: Hard, swollen parotid and salivary glands; buzzing, whizzing noises and tinnitus with deafness; tendency to recurrent tonsillitis and glandular enlargements; abdominal or thoracic aneurysm with distressing throbbing and dyspnoea; induration of pancreas and other deep glands; dyspepsia with cardiac oppression
Worse_From: Exertion; lying flat when there is cardiac or aneurysmal involvement; emotional excitement; cold and damp
Better_From: Rest; head and upper body elevated; gentle warmth; careful regulation of strain on heart and vessels
Notes_Sphere: Deep baryta salt for arteriosclerosis and aneurysmal states with baryta-type mental immaturity and associated glandular swellings (parotid, salivary, tonsillar, pancreatic)

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Sudden, violent states; delirium, excitement, wild look; fears imaginary things, sees faces, animals; very sensitive to light, noise, jarring; wants to be left alone in acute heat
General_Themes: Acute congestive remedy; rapid onset, high fever, intense heat, redness and throbbing; dryness of mucous membranes; right-sided tendency; suited to robust, plethoric, easily flushed patients
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning, throbbing headaches with hot, red face and cold extremities; pupils dilated, eyes glassy; dry, intensely sore throat with bright redness, difficulty swallowing; high, bounding pulse; febrile convulsions in children; neuralgic pains that come and go suddenly
Worse_From: Least jar or movement; bright light, noise, draft on head; lying flat; afternoon and evening; after getting head wet
Better_From: Darkened, quiet room; rest with head slightly raised; warmth to body but head often uncovered
Notes_Sphere: Key acute remedy for sudden congestive attacks—high fevers, throbbing headaches, acute tonsillitis, otitis, etc.—with bright redness, heat, dryness and oversensitive senses

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Feels bruised, sore and overworked; may be irritable yet downplays injury; mental dullness from chronic fatigue or trauma
General_Themes: Deep Arnica of the soft tissues; trauma to deeper muscles, pelvic organs, abdominal wall and breasts; sprains and strains, especially after overexertion or gardening; effects of blows, surgery and childbirth
Key_Local_Symptoms: Soreness and bruised feeling of muscles and pelvic organs as if beaten; uterine and ovarian soreness after confinement or pelvic surgery; pain and stiffness in back and limbs from overuse, especially from stooping or gardening; varicose veins and venous congestion of pelvis and legs
Worse_From: Cold bathing; cold, damp weather; getting chilled when hot; continued exertion after strain; lying on sore parts
Better_From: Warm applications; continued gentle motion after rest; massage of affected muscles
Notes_Sphere: Trauma–pelvic remedy for deep soft-tissue injuries, pelvic and abdominal soreness after childbirth or surgery, and strains from overwork, especially where Arnica helps but does not go deep enough

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, gloomy, feels old and worn; mental state coloured by gouty or urinary troubles; children want to be carried, dislike being put down
General_Themes: Acts on metabolism, joints and kidneys; uric-acid diathesis with highly offensive urine; gout and rheumatism with changing pains; heart symptoms in gouty subjects
Key_Local_Symptoms: Urine dark, scanty or copious but very foul-smelling, often brown; gouty nodosities and joint pains, especially knees, big toe and heel; pains suddenly change locality; cardiac discomfort or asthma in gouty patients; offensive stools and perspiration
Worse_From: Cold and damp; dietary excess (wine, meat, rich food); suppression of eruptions or gout
Better_From: Warmth; rest; free action of kidneys and bowels; strict, simple diet
Notes_Sphere: Gout–kidney remedy for offensive dark urine, uric-acid gout and wandering joint pains, especially when joints and heart share a gouty background

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low, apathetic, weak; may be anxious and fearful during palpitations or collapses; mental dulness from anaemia and poor circulation
General_Themes: Powerful blood and marrow toxin; decreases red cells and increases white; affects circulatory system, causing venous engorgement, haemorrhages and fatty degeneration of heart; suited to states resembling leukaemia or aplastic anaemia in the drug-picture
Key_Local_Symptoms: Great weakness and breathlessness on exertion; bruised soreness and pains about heart; petechiae, ecchymoses or haemorrhages from nose, gums, uterus; dark, tarry stools or haematuria; enlarged spleen; pallor with easy fatigue, dizziness and faintness
Worse_From: Exertion; warm baths and heat of bed; storms and changes of weather; long-continued drug or chemical exposure
Better_From: Rest; cool fresh air; careful medical supervision (supportive)
Notes_Sphere: Deep-acting blood–circulation remedy representing the benzene drug-picture—anaemia, haemorrhages, marrow depression and cardiac weakness (mainly of academic/confirmatory value)

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low confidence, self-conscious about appearance, especially facial eruptions; may be despondent about chronic skin issues
General_Themes: Skin and nutrition remedy; improves assimilation and alters chronic eruptions; acne, blotches, rough, scaly skin and some cases of psoriasis; liver sluggishness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Acne and pimples on face, especially cheeks and forehead; rough, scaly, dry eruptions and blotches; tendency to chaps and unhealthy-looking skin; dull headaches and hepatic torpor with coated tongue and bad taste
Worse_From: Rich, greasy food; neglect of skin hygiene; chronic illness or debility
Better_From: Regular washing and gentle exfoliation; light, non-greasy diet; open air
Notes_Sphere: Skin–liver remedy often used to clear complexion in acne, blotchy skin and some psoriatic or scaly eruptions, especially when nutrition and liver function are below par

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, tired, easily depressed from constant back and kidney pains; mental energy low when urinary or rheumatic symptoms are bad
General_Themes: Classic kidney and urinary remedy; acts on renal pelvis, liver and joints; gravel, stones and radiating pains from kidneys; also arthritic and rheumatic states
Key_Local_Symptoms: Deep aching or stitching pain in kidney region radiating to hips, thighs, groins and bladder; sensation of bubbling or gurgling in kidneys; tendency to kidney stones and gravel with burning, cutting pains on urination; urine may contain mucus, blood or sediment; stitching pains in joints, lumbago and sciatica
Worse_From: Jarring or motion (riding, walking); standing; stooping; cold and damp; exertion
Better_From: Rest; lying on back; warmth to lumbar region; passing urine or sediment (partial relief)
Notes_Sphere: Key remedy for kidney stones, gravel and radiating renal pains, with bubbling sensations in kidney region and associated arthritic or rheumatic pains

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Children and adults may be dull, tired, chilly and prone to repeated colds; mood low from chronic catarrh or weakness
General_Themes: Beet-root; influences chronic catarrhal states and phthisical tendencies, especially in children; supports blood and nutrition; used in chronic chest catarrh and early tuberculosis
Key_Local_Symptoms: Recurrent colds and bronchial catarrh in children who are easily chilled; chronic, loose cough with much mucus; tendency to emaciation and weakness in phthisical subjects; sometimes used as a general blood and liver cleanser in toxic or congested states
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; exposure leading to chest colds; poor nutrition
Better_From: Warmth; nourishing but simple diet; dry climate; fresh air in moderation
Notes_Sphere: Less-used constitutional remedy influencing chronic catarrhal chest states and phthisical tendencies, especially in chilly, easily-catched-cold children

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Childlike dependence; intense desire for company, cannot be left alone; anxious and restless during gastric agony, moaning and tossing
General_Themes: Acts especially on stomach, causing violent gastritis and collapse; also kidneys and circulation; suits acute vomiting states and chronic gastralgia
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense pain in stomach with great tenderness; vomiting of enormous quantities of food or mucus as soon as it reaches the stomach, often in fountains; vomiting relieved for a while by cold drinks, which are then vomited when warmed in stomach; burning from stomach up oesophagus; collapsed appearance, cold sweat, prostration; metallic taste, coated tongue
Worse_From: Warm drinks; food or even small quantities of liquid reaching stomach; being alone
Better_From: Cold drinks in small sips (temporarily); company and reassurance; absolute rest
Notes_Sphere: Gastric crisis remedy for violent vomiting and burning gastralgia, especially when patient craves cold drinks and hates to be left alone

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious and oppressed during asthma attacks; fear of suffocation; mental state much better when expectoration is free
General_Themes: Cockroach; strong bronchial–asthma remedy; especially useful when asthma is associated with bronchitis and much mucus; corpulent or stout patients; acts well in acute attacks and chronic tendency
Key_Local_Symptoms: Asthma with much congestion of chest and large quantities of thick, tenacious mucus; must sit up; wheezing and rattling, often in stout, heavy patients; attacks often triggered by damp, rainy weather or mouldy environments; bronchitis with dyspnoea and rapid, laboured breathing
Worse_From: Damp, rainy weather; mouldy, dusty rooms; exertion; lying down
Better_From: Expectoration of mucus; dry, warm environment; sitting propped up
Notes_Sphere: Asthma–bronchitis remedy for stout, congested patients with much mucus and wheezing, especially when attacks are brought on or worsened by dampness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Fear and anxiety with suffocative attacks; feels chest is filling up; irritable from broken sleep and chronic weakness
General_Themes: Another cockroach remedy; similar sphere to Blatta americana but especially noted in bronchitis and asthma of old or debilitated people; great accumulation of mucus with susceptibility to damp and cold
Key_Local_Symptoms: Old people or weak patients with chronic bronchitis and asthma; large quantities of mucus in chest with rattling and difficult expectoration; attacks worse in damp basements, rainy or foggy weather; shortness of breath on least exertion; tendency to associated cardiac weakness
Worse_From: Damp, mouldy places; rainy season; exertion; lying flat
Better_From: Dry, warm climate; sitting propped up; gradual expectoration of mucus
Notes_Sphere: Asthma–chronic bronchitis remedy for elderly or debilitated patients who are aggravated by damp and have great mucus accumulation with rattling and breathlessness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low, dull, heavy; mentally sluggish from chronic kidney trouble and dropsy; may be fretful and anxious at night
General_Themes: Renal and dropsical remedy; acts on kidneys, liver and serous membranes; anasarca, ascites, pleural effusion and oedema of feet with scanty urine
Key_Local_Symptoms: Scanty, high-coloured urine with puffiness of face, hands and feet; general anasarca or ascites from cardiac, renal or hepatic causes; oppression of chest from effusion; dull aching in loins and back
Worse_From: Night; lying flat when effusion is marked; exertion in weak, dropsical patients
Better_From: Passing urine; sitting propped up; dry, warm atmosphere
Notes_Sphere: Kidney–dropsy remedy where scanty urine, general oedema and serous effusions (ascites, pleural) dominate the picture in weak, toxic patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, gloomy, restless during fever; mental dulness and aching all over as if beaten
General_Themes: Intermittent and remittent fever remedy; acts on liver, spleen and nervous system; influenza-like states with chill predominating; malarial tendencies with bone and back pains
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chills beginning in back and radiating; violent aching in back and limbs as if bones were broken; profuse perspiration following chill; headache with sore eyeballs; biliousness and hepatic soreness; intermittent fevers with chill much more pronounced than heat
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; exposure to malarial influences; motion during chill
Better_From: Warmth; being wrapped up; onset of sweat stage
Notes_Sphere: Malarial-influenza remedy for intermittent fevers where chill and bone/back pains predominate and liver and spleen are congested

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, easily startled by sudden noises; great dread of downward motion (especially in children); timid and sensitive
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes, skin and nervous system; aphthous ulcerations of mouth, genitals and digestive tract; infantile disorders and women’s pelvic complaints
Key_Local_Symptoms: Marked fear of downward motion—child screams when being laid down or in rocking motion; aphthae in mouth with hot, tender, easily bleeding mucosa; canker sores; greenish, gushing stools in infants; profuse, albuminous or stringy leucorrhoea; eczema behind ears and on scalp
Worse_From: Downward motion (being carried downstairs, rocked, laid in crib); sudden noises; early morning (4–5 a.m.)
Better_From: Steady, gentle handling; quiet environment; cool drinks for mouth soreness
Notes_Sphere: Keynotes are dread of downward motion and aphthous ulcerations of mouth and genitals, especially in nervous, sensitive children and women with leucorrhoea

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed and irritable from chronic burning discharges and skin troubles; mentally weary in long-standing septic states
General_Themes: Antiseptic and disinfectant action; affects skin, mucous membranes and urinary tract; used in burns, eczema, otorrhoea and cystitis-type pictures
Key_Local_Symptoms: Persistent, offensive, thin or serous discharges from ears, eyes, nose, genitals or urinary tract; otorrhoea with excoriation; cystitis with frequent urging and burning, urine sometimes cloudy or albuminous; erythematous, weeping, excoriated eczema and intertrigo (e.g. napkin rash)
Worse_From: Warm, stuffy rooms; prolonged moisture against skin (diapers, dressings); neglect of local hygiene
Better_From: Cool applications to burns and raw surfaces; frequent gentle cleansing; loose clothing and air to skin
Notes_Sphere: Local–constitutional remedy for thin, acrid, septic discharges and excoriated, burning skin or mucosa, especially in cystitis, otorrhoea and napkin rash-type conditions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Confused, dull, cannot find words; anxiety and fear with a sense of suffocation or impending stroke; mental functions sluggish after apoplexy
General_Themes: Snake-venom remedy; causes profound blood changes—thrombosis, haemorrhage and septic states; right-sided paralysis and aphasia; tendency to clotting in veins and arteries
Key_Local_Symptoms: Right-sided hemiplegia and aphasia after cerebral haemorrhage or thrombosis; inability to articulate though words are clear mentally, or vice-versa; dark, fluid haemorrhages; phlebitis and thrombosis of veins; septic conditions with bluish discolouration; purpura and gangrenous tendencies
Worse_From: Motion in paralysed parts; exertion; tight bandages around limbs; septic or thrombotic stresses
Better_From: Absolute rest; limb elevation in phlebitis; warmth (often)
Notes_Sphere: Vascular–nervous remedy for thrombotic and haemorrhagic states with right-sided paralysis, aphasia and sepsis-type haemorrhages, often following stroke

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, fearful something terrible will happen; mental dullness and confusion in flaccid-paralytic states; may be apathetic between bouts of anxiety
General_Themes: Nosode prepared from botulinus toxin; acts on peripheral nerves and neuromuscular junctions, causing flaccid paralysis, ptosis and bulbar symptoms; also intestinal and bladder atony
Key_Local_Symptoms: Drooping eyelids (ptosis), double vision, difficulty focusing; weakness of facial muscles and dysarthria; difficulty swallowing with choking; constipation from intestinal atony; bladder weakness with retention or dribbling; profound fatigue and easy exhaustion
Worse_From: Exertion; repeated effort of the same muscles; fatigue; after certain infections or toxins (as etiologic history)
Better_From: Rest; alternating activity and rest periods; careful, graded use of affected muscles (supportive)
Notes_Sphere: Nosode corresponding to botulism-like flaccid paralysis and neuromuscular weakness with ptosis, bulbar difficulty, intestinal and bladder atony—strictly for experienced hands

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Awkward, clumsy, drops things; feels as if body or hands were enlarged; emotional states often around menses or after use of cosmetics; may be timid or hurried
General_Themes: Acts on skin, circulation and female organs; ill-effects of external applications (cosmetics, detergents) and tight clothing; urticaria, eczema, warts; menstrual disturbances with flooding and oozing
Key_Local_Symptoms: Diarrhoea early morning, from cold drinks or after taking cold; urticaria and itching, especially before menses; hands feel thick or clumsy—difficulty holding small objects; menses too early and too profuse, with diarrhoea and nosebleed; skin eruptions in washerwomen from soaps and damp
Worse_From: Damp weather; new moon; before and during menses; use of cosmetics or strong detergents; tight bands about waist or limbs
Better_From: Open air; loosening clothing; avoiding irritating applications; gentle drying of skin
Notes_Sphere: Skin–menses remedy for awkward, “over-large” sensation persons with urticaria, eczema or warts, menstrual flooding and ill-effects from cosmetics, soaps and damp

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, worried about kidneys and bladder; mentally dulled by chronic urinary trouble and lack of sleep from night frequency
General_Themes: New Zealand plant; acts on kidneys and bladder; haematuria, albuminuria and chronic nephritis; catarrhal cystitis with frequent urging and pain
Key_Local_Symptoms: Frequent, painful urging to urinate with burning; urine smoky, bloody or albuminous; dull aching in loins and kidney region; oedema of ankles or puffiness of face in nephritic states; chronic catarrhal cystitis with mucus and pain at end of urination
Worse_From: Exposure to cold and damp; exertion; late evening and night when bladder is more irritable
Better_From: Rest; warmth to lumbar region; regular, moderate fluid intake; avoiding chilling
Notes_Sphere: Renal–vesical remedy for nephritis and catarrhal cystitis with haematuria, albuminuria and dull lumbar aching, especially in cold-damp aggravated patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, hurried, suspicious; fear of being alone yet dreads strangers; very sensitive to every change of air and room; nervous, excitable, especially fair-haired people
General_Themes: Acts on larynx, trachea and left lung; hard, enlarged glands; croup, diphtheria, chronic laryngitis and asthma in scrofulous, fair, blue-eyed patients who are worse in warm rooms
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dry, hoarse, barking or croupy cough with laryngeal spasm and much rattling in larynx, but little lower down; sensation of a plug or foreign body in throat; left-sided chest complaints, including infiltration and early tuberculosis; hard, stony glands (thyroid, parotid, testes); symptoms worse in warm room, better near sea
Worse_From: Warm, dusty or overheated rooms; exertion in warm air; evening; going into heated theatres or churches
Better_From: Sea air; cool, open air; slow, gentle motion; cool drinks
Notes_Sphere: Larynx–left-lung–gland remedy for fair, scrofulous subjects with croupy cough, laryngeal spasm and hard glandular enlargements, worse in warm rooms and better at the seaside

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Very irritable, wants to be left alone; talks about business even when ill; anxiety about the future and about money; fears poverty; desires home and quiet
General_Themes: Dryness and serous inflammation of serous membranes and mucosa; stitching, tearing pains made worse by the slightest motion; right-sided tendency; slow onset of complaints; great thirst for large quantities of cold water at long intervals
Key_Local_Symptoms: Severe, stitching pains in chest, joints or serous membranes, worse from every motion and better from absolute rest and pressure; dry, painful cough with need to hold chest; dry, coated tongue with white or brown centre; constipation with dry, hard stools as if burnt; serous effusions (pleurisy, synovitis, peritonitis)
Worse_From: Least motion (even talking, breathing deeply, coughing); getting overheated, then chilled; morning on rising; touch of affected parts
Better_From: Absolute rest; lying on painful side; firm pressure or bandaging; cool drinks in large quantities at long intervals
Notes_Sphere: Big acute polycrest for dry, painful, motion-worse inflammations of serous membranes, joints and chest, with great thirst for large draughts and extreme irritability

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dull, heavy, sometimes imbecile or idiotic; violent impulses, especially sexual or destructive; epilepsy with aura from genital organs; children slow, apathetic, often masturbating early
General_Themes: Acts on brain, spinal cord, heart and skin; epileptic and convulsive states, especially at puberty or connected with sexual excitement; great weakness after fits; blistering eruptions and ulcerating sores
Key_Local_Symptoms: Epileptic attacks with aura beginning in genital organs or solar plexus, often at night during sleep; profound stupor and drooling after seizure; great prostration, must sleep; early, excessive masturbation in children or adolescents; foul, phagedenic ulcers and bullous eruptions; cardiac weakness in epileptics
Worse_From: Sexual excitement; anger; alcohol; night, especially during sleep; menses or ovulation in women
Better_From: Rest and deep sleep after attack; avoidance of sexual and emotional excess; quiet, dark room
Notes_Sphere: Epilepsy–skin remedy for slow, dull, often sexually disturbed patients with nocturnal fits beginning in genital region and blistering or phagedenic skin lesions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, fretful from abdominal discomfort; mentally dull and drowsy with gastric or intestinal upset
General_Themes: Acts chiefly on digestive tract and nervous system; flatulent dyspepsia, abnormal fermentation and intestinal catarrh; choreic or spasmodic movements linked with digestive trouble
Key_Local_Symptoms: Much rumbling and distension of abdomen with offensive flatus; eructations of rancid, sour or putrid gas; diarrhoea alternating with constipation; stools very offensive; in some cases, choreic movements of face or limbs associated with digestive derangement
Worse_From: Fatty, rich, sugary foods; long fasting, then heavy meals; mental strain during indigestion
Better_From: Simple, light diet; regular small meals; gentle movement after eating
Notes_Sphere: Digestive–nervous remedy for flatulent, offensive dyspepsia with abnormal fermentation and occasional choreic or spasmodic symptoms

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Great anxiety and fear of heart disease; feels as if heart would stop, or as if something holds it; melancholic, weeping yet fears death
General_Themes: Powerful heart and circulation remedy; constriction sensation is keynote—heart, chest, head, uterus; acts in angina, cardiac hypertrophy, valvular disease, haemorrhages and congestive headaches
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sensation as if an iron band or vice around heart or chest; angina pectoris with constrictive pains radiating to left arm; palpitation and irregular pulse, worse lying on left side; haemorrhages—bright, often clotted—nose, lungs, uterus; congestive headaches as if band around head; uterine haemorrhage with constriction sensation
Worse_From: Exertion; emotions; lying on left side; about midday; climacteric period
Better_From: Rest; sitting up; open fresh air; gentle pressure over heart or head
Notes_Sphere: Major heart–vascular remedy with characteristic constriction sensations and haemorrhages, useful in angina, valvular disease, congestive headaches and uterine bleeding

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Extremely prostrated, chilly, wants to be perfectly quiet; anxious, morose, dislikes being spoken to; hopeless in long illness
General_Themes: Acts like a cross between Arsenicum and Veratrum: intense gastric irritation with coldness and collapse; suits yellow, icy-cold patients who vomit everything and cannot bear to be moved
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense nausea and vomiting with icy coldness and great weakness; vomits as soon as he drinks; black or coffee-ground vomit in severe cases; burning in stomach and oesophagus; deathly pallor or yellow, sallow skin; prostration in low fevers, cancer or after radiotherapy/chemotherapy-type states in the drug-picture
Worse_From: Cold, slightest motion, touch, talking; attempting to eat or drink
Better_From: Absolute rest; warmth; small sips of warm liquid if tolerated; quiet, dark room
Notes_Sphere: Gastric–collapse remedy for violent vomiting with black vomit, icy coldness and extreme prostration, especially in cancer or low fevers where Arsenicum/Veratrum seem indicated but fail

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, anxious from chronic dropsy or urinary trouble; mentally dull, weary of suffering; may be irritable and restless at night
General_Themes: South American root; diuretic and alterative; acts on kidneys, liver and spleen; anasarca, ascites and oedema, especially cardiac or hepatic; intermittent and gastric fevers with great thirst
Key_Local_Symptoms: General dropsy with swelling of legs, abdomen and face; pale, scanty urine with sediment; great thirst, especially for cold water; splenic and hepatic enlargement with soreness; gastric and bilious symptoms in intermittent fevers
Worse_From: Exertion; hot, close rooms; overeating or improper food in weak patients
Better_From: Rest; cool, open air; regulated, light diet; gradual increase of urine flow
Notes_Sphere: Dropsical–hepatic remedy with anasarca, thirst and scanty urine, enlarged liver and spleen and gastric-bilious symptoms, especially in intermittent fevers

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, anxious and restless from intense rectal or urinary burning; mental state dominated by tenesmus and pain
General_Themes: Acts on rectum, anus and genito-urinary tract; tenesmus and burning in dysentery, haemorrhoids and urethral inflammation; catarrhal conditions of bladder and prostate
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent tenesmus of rectum with small, frequent, bloody mucus stools; burning, smarting and rawness in anus; haemorrhoids intensely painful and sensitive; urethral burning with frequent urging, sometimes with gonorrhoeal or catarrhal discharge; pruritus of anus and genitals
Worse_From: After stool; urination; sitting; spicy food and alcohol; sexual excess
Better_From: Cool bathing of parts; lying down with hips slightly elevated; bland diet and plenty of water
Notes_Sphere: Rectal–urinary remedy for intense burning tenesmus, dysenteric stools and painful haemorrhoids or urethritis with violent irritation

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, depressed, mentally weakened; marked sexual disturbance—strong desire but physical inability, or aversion with local irritation; fears impotence
General_Themes: Acts on genito-urinary organs, mucous membranes and skin; pruritus of genitals, spermatorrhoea, sexual weakness; also used in tobacco craving and asthma in some traditions
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense itching of genitals without visible eruption; penis relaxed yet sexual desire present; emissions without erotic dreams; great exhaustion after sexual acts; in women, vulvar itching and burning; asthma or cough aggravated by smoking; nausea and vomiting from tobacco; cold, clammy skin with tendency to sweat
Worse_From: Tobacco and smoking; sexual excess; warmth of bed (itching); mental excitement
Better_From: Open, cool air; ceasing tobacco; washing parts with cool water; moderate sexual activity
Notes_Sphere: Genito-urinary–nervous remedy for sexual weakness with strong desire, genital itching, and aggravation from tobacco, also sometimes used in asthma or nausea from smoking

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, timid, easily tired; mentally sluggish, especially during teething or growth; worries about health
General_Themes: Calcarea salt with similar sphere to Calcarea carbonica but more marked glandular and osseous involvement; scrofulous children with enlarged glands and defective bone growth
Key_Local_Symptoms: Enlarged lymph glands, especially cervical; delayed dentition and bone development; tendency to rickets and curvature of bones; chronic suppuration of glands; sweating head and neck of children; acidity and diarrhoea in infants
Worse_From: Cold, damp air; exertion; milk aggravation in some children; mental strain
Better_From: Warm, dry climate; rest; appropriate nutrition with calcium and vitamin D
Notes_Sphere: Calcarea-family remedy for scrofulous, flabby, slow-developing children with enlarged glands, rickets and defective ossification

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, fearful, restless at night; worries about health and poverty; depressed yet driven; often chilly and debilitated
General_Themes: Combines Calcarea and Arsenicum themes: weakness, chilliness, anxiety, glandular enlargement and degeneration; acts on heart, kidneys and glands; chronic nephritis, hypertrophied heart and mesenteric glands
Key_Local_Symptoms: Albuminous urine with oedema of feet and face; hypertrophy and dilatation of heart with breathlessness on exertion; enlarged mesenteric and other glands in scrofulous children; chronic diarrhoea with emaciation; great chilliness and weakness, wants to be warmly wrapped
Worse_From: Cold, especially damp cold; exertion; climbing stairs; being overtired; after midnight
Better_From: Warmth; rest; gentle, steady routine; head and chest wrapped warmly
Notes_Sphere: Deep-acting remedy for scrofulous or tubercular constitutions with kidney and heart disease, albuminuria and enlarged glands, blending Calcarea sluggishness with Arsenicum anxiety and chilliness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, responsible, overworked types; easily fatigued, sluggish, prefers routine; fears insanity, misfortune, and especially heights; children are timid, obstinate and late to develop
General_Themes: Big constitutional remedy; acts on nutrition, glands, bones and mucous membranes; tendency to obesity or flabbiness, sweating head and neck, sour discharges; slow development in children; chronic catarrhs and tendency to catch cold easily
Key_Local_Symptoms: Profuse head-sweat in sleep; large abdomen with thin limbs in children; delayed walking and dentition; enlarged tonsils and cervical glands; chronic otitis, sinusitis and bronchitis; sour-smelling perspiration, stools and vomit; cold, damp feet; weakness on climbing stairs; craving for eggs, indigestible things (chalk, coal)
Worse_From: Cold, damp, getting feet wet; exertion, especially climbing; mental or physical overstrain; full moons or change of weather
Better_From: Dry, warm atmosphere; rest; being warmly clothed (especially feet and head); steady routine and nutrition
Notes_Sphere: Major constitutional remedy for flabby, chilly, sweat-prone individuals (especially children) with delayed development, glandular enlargement, bone troubles and chronic catarrhs

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Often anxious about money and security; stubborn, sometimes rough or coarse; can be restless and dissatisfied when pains or deformities are prominent
General_Themes: Acts on elastic tissues—ligaments, veins, glands, bones; nodosities and exostoses; varicose veins and ulcers; hard, stony glands; cracking joints and spinal curvature
Key_Local_Symptoms: Hard, stony swellings around joints and bones (exostoses, bone spurs); varicose veins and knotty, painful piles; relaxed ligaments with tendency to sprains and dislocations; chronic cracking and stiffness of joints; indurated glands (e.g. breast, cervical, prostate); fissures and hard, indurated ulcers
Worse_From: Cold, damp; beginning motion; standing long; strain on weakened ligaments or veins
Better_From: Warmth; continued gentle motion; elastic support for veins and joints
Notes_Sphere: Remedy for varicose veins, bone spurs, hard glands and ligament laxity—any condition where tissues have become hard, knotty or too relaxed

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Timid, self-conscious children or adults with chronic gland trouble; anxious, easily worried, mentally dull from long illness
General_Themes: Calcarea–iodine salt; powerful glandular remedy; enlarged, hard tonsils and cervical glands; adenoids; scrofulous and tubercular constitutions prone to chronic catarrh
Key_Local_Symptoms: Large, hard, chronic tonsils and adenoid vegetations; recurrent sore throats and catarrh; enlarged cervical and other lymph glands; nasal obstruction with mouth-breathing; delayed development in “glandular” children
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; exposure of throat; getting feet wet; exertion during acute throat attacks
Better_From: Warm, dry climate; wrapping neck; gentle constitutional strengthening
Notes_Sphere: Glandular Calcarea for big, hard tonsils and lymph nodes in scrofulous/tubercular children with chronic catarrh and delayed development

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless, dissatisfied, wants to travel or change things; children whiny, peevish, “never satisfied”; mental apathy from exhaustion or growth strain
General_Themes: Bone and growth remedy; acts on nutrition of bones, teeth and glands; anaemic, growing children; delayed union of fractures; “school headaches” and fatigue in students
Key_Local_Symptoms: Thin, pale children with large heads and open fontanelles; growing pains in limbs and back; slow or difficult dentition; tendency to curvature of spine and knock-knees; headaches in schoolchildren, worse mental exertion; weakness after illness or growth spurts; craving bacon, smoked meats or salty food
Worse_From: Cold and damp; exertion, especially mental; change of weather; over-study
Better_From: Warmth; gentle outdoor exercise; nourishing diet with minerals; rest from study
Notes_Sphere: Main growth-remedy for anaemic, restless children and for delayed fracture-healing or bone weakness in youth

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Timid, yielding, anxious about health; deep insecurity and fear of being criticised; combines slowness of Calcarea with sensitivity of Silica
General_Themes: Slow, deep constitutional remedy; chronic glandular indurations and suppurations; timid, chilly, sweaty subjects with enlarged glands and tendency to abscess
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronic enlargement and hardness of glands (cervical, mesenteric, mammary); recurrent, slowly ripening abscesses or suppurations; chronic catarrhs and skin eruptions in delicate, chilly subjects who perspire easily; fatigue from slightest exertion
Worse_From: Cold air and drafts; exertion; mental effort; suppression of sweats or discharges
Better_From: Warm, dry climate; wrapping up; gently promoting suppuration when needed; rest
Notes_Sphere: Constitutional remedy for delicate, timid patients with hard glands and slow suppuration, blending Calcarea sluggishness with Silica’s chronic pus tendency

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, easily offended, impatient with chronic discharges; may be depressed from long-term suppuration
General_Themes: Calcarea–sulphur salt; acts on suppurative processes and mucous membranes; continuation of Hepar sulph picture—helps finish clearing pus
Key_Local_Symptoms: Persistent, yellow, lumpy or blood-streaked discharges from ears, nose, lungs or skin; abscesses that discharge but refuse to heal; acne with pus-filled spots; chronic catarrh and bronchitis with thick, yellow expectoration
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; getting chilled; neglect of drainage or hygiene in suppurative cases
Better_From: Warmth; dry air; proper drainage and cleansing of discharging areas
Notes_Sphere: Pus-cleanup remedy when discharges remain thick and yellow after acute phase—good for lingering abscesses, acne and chronic catarrhs with yellow mucus

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Usually calm but may be low-spirited or anxious after injuries or surgery; mental state often overshadowed by wound pain or slow healing
General_Themes: Great local vulnerary; promotes healthy granulation and prevents suppuration; used externally and internally for cuts, lacerations, surgical wounds and ulcers
Key_Local_Symptoms: Open wounds that are raw, painful and tend to gape; lacerations rather than blunt trauma; surgical incisions; torn perineum after childbirth; ulcers and bedsores with sluggish healing; prevents excessive pus formation when used early
Worse_From: Cold, damp; neglect or contamination of wounds; repeated trauma to area
Better_From: Gentle cleansing; warm, moist dressings; Calendula lotions, gels or tincture appropriately diluted
Notes_Sphere: Top wound-healing remedy for cuts, tears, surgical wounds and ulcers—less for bruises (Arnica) and more for promoting clean granulation and preventing infection

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low, weak and anxious in dropsical or cardiac states; irritable when disturbed; mental dulness from great prostration
General_Themes: Acts on heart, circulation, liver and serous membranes; dropsy and anasarca with weak heart; acute rheumatism and fevers with much sweat and prostration
Key_Local_Symptoms: General dropsy with pitting oedema of legs, abdomen and sometimes chest; palpitation and cardiac weakness; profuse perspiration with little thirst; hepatic and splenic congestion; rheumatic pains with great weakness
Worse_From: Exertion; warm, confined rooms; lying flat when heart is weak; damp heat
Better_From: Rest; cool fresh air; head and chest elevated; gentle diuresis
Notes_Sphere: Cardio-dropsical remedy for anasarca with weak heart and profuse sweating, especially in hot climates and rheumatic or malarial backgrounds

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, restless and anxious with eruptions or uterine troubles; mental state fluctuates with pelvic pains and skin irritation
General_Themes: Marsh marigold; acts on skin and female pelvic organs; vesicular eruptions, especially around mouth and genitals; early, profuse menses; dysmenorrhoea
Key_Local_Symptoms: Small, yellowish vesicles or pustules around mouth, nose or genitals; raw, excoriated patches; early, profuse, sometimes painful menses with pelvic congestion; pruritus of vulva and perineum
Worse_From: Menses; warmth of bed; local irritation from washing or clothing
Better_From: Cool applications; loose clothing; gentle washing with bland fluids
Notes_Sphere: Skin–uterine remedy for vesicular eruptions about mouth and genitals and early, profuse menses with pelvic congestion and irritation

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Great anxiety and fear of death with icy coldness and collapse; yet hates to be covered despite chill; mind excitable then rapidly sinking into collapse
General_Themes: Powerful antidotal and collapse remedy; sudden sinking of vital forces with cold, pale, blue skin; cramps, spasms and cyanosis; often used in cholera-like attacks and shock
Key_Local_Symptoms: Body icy cold to touch, yet patient throws off covers; face pale or blue; weak, imperceptible pulse; sudden collapse in cholera, sunstroke, shock; cramps in calves and abdomen; scanty or suppressed urine; dry, cold skin without sweat
Worse_From: Cold air or drafts in collapse states; shock; violent diarrhoea or vomiting; suppression of eruptions
Better_From: Gentle external warmth; rubbing; small doses of warm drinks if possible; stimulation and first-aid measures
Notes_Sphere: Acute collapse remedy with icy coldness, blueness, absence of sweat and paradoxical aversion to covers—often thought of in early cholera, shock or sudden sinking of vitality

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous, excitable, then dull and confused; sleepless with nervous twitchings; may have hysterical states or night terrors
General_Themes: Brominated camphor; acts on brain and nervous system; nervous insomnia, hysteria, night terrors, convulsive twitchings; sometimes used in sexual irritability
Key_Local_Symptoms: Nervous sleeplessness with frequent waking and frightful dreams; twitchings of muscles and choreic movements; headaches with mental confusion; hysterical attacks with sobbing, laughing or crying; in some cases, sexual excitement with emissions and irritability
Worse_From: Mental overwork; excitement; stimulants; sexual excess; night
Better_From: Quiet, dark bedroom; mental rest; avoiding stimulants in the evening
Notes_Sphere: Nervous-sedative remedy for insomnia with twitchings, hysterical episodes and overactive nervous system, particularly in sensitive or over-stimulated patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low, dull, mildly depressed; mind feels tired from chronic skin or liver trouble; not a big mental remedy, more physical weariness
General_Themes: Traditional South-American blood purifier; acts on skin, liver and digestion; used in acne, boils, eczema and sluggish liver states with “bad blood” feeling
Key_Local_Symptoms: Acne, pustular and papular eruptions on face and trunk; recurring boils and “bad blood” states; dull frontal headaches with biliousness; coated tongue, poor appetite, sluggish digestion; general tiredness with tendency to chill easily
Worse_From: Rich, greasy foods; late hours; suppression of skin eruptions
Better_From: Open air; light, clean diet; regular exercise and elimination
Notes_Sphere: Skin–liver “blood purifier” type remedy for acne, boils and sluggish digestion with general dullness and fatigue

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mind racing; ideas crowding, time seems enormously prolonged; feels detached from body, as if in another world; alternates between exaltation and anxiety or panic; fear of losing reason
General_Themes: Acts powerfully on brain and nerves; dissociation, altered time and space sense; sensory exaltation; used in some forms of mania, anxiety, depersonalisation, and spinal irritation with shooting pains
Key_Local_Symptoms: Extreme distortion of time (minutes seem hours); sensation of being separated from body or floating; sudden attacks of intense anxiety or panic; uncontrollable laughter; neuralgic, shooting pains along spine and limbs; heaviness or paralysis-like weakness of legs; urinary retention from nervous spasm
Worse_From: Overexertion of mind; narcotic use; solitude; night; stimulants
Better_From: Company; distraction; gentle grounding activities; rest of mind
Notes_Sphere: Nervous–mental remedy for altered perception, racing thoughts, time distortion and panic, with shooting spinal pains or limb weakness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious about urinary and sexual organs; fear of going insane or having a serious disease; mentally restless, easily distracted
General_Themes: Acts mainly on urinary and genital tract and nervous system; urethritis, cystitis, gonorrhoea-type discharges; sexual excitement and irritability
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning, smarting pains during and especially at end of urination; frequent urging, drop-by-drop stream; urethral discharge (often gonorrhoeal) with redness and swelling; cutting pains from bladder along urethra; sexual excitement or painful erections; darting pains in heart in some cases
Worse_From: Walking; standing; during and after urination; sexual excess; cold, damp
Better_From: Rest; warmth; sitting or lying; plenty of water (general support)
Notes_Sphere: Urinary–sexual remedy for burning urethritis and cystitis with intense urging and drop-by-drop urination, often with mental anxiety about organs or sanity

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless, angry, delirious from pain and burning; intense sexual excitement or mania; mind fixed on pain in bladder or burn
General_Themes: Violent vesicant; acts on urinary tract and skin; burning, cutting pains and intense inflammation; classic for burns and scalds, cystitis, urethritis and gastro-intestinal irritation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intolerable burning in urinary tract; constant urging to urinate with passage of only a few drops of scalding urine, sometimes bloody; patient screams before, during or after urination; burning pains in stomach and intestines with vomiting and diarrhoea; second- and third-degree burns and scalds with blistering; burns feel better from cold applications
Worse_From: Touch of affected parts; attempt to pass urine; drinking coffee or irritants; warmth on burns
Better_From: Cold applications to burns and urinary region; small, frequent sips of bland fluids; rest
Notes_Sphere: Top remedy for burns and acute urinary inflammation with violent burning, constant urging and small, bloody, scalding urine; also for chemical/thermal burns with blistering

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Homesick, obstinate, sluggish; clings to familiar surroundings, weeps when reminded of home; easily offended; tends toward indolence and dislike of exertion
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes, especially of nose, throat, ears and urinary tract; burning pains with chilliness; suited to flabby, chilly, often obese people who dislike open air
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning pains as from red pepper in mouth, throat, stomach, bladder or rectum; sore, burning throat with relaxed uvula; otitis with mastoid pain and burning; burning haemorrhoids with tenesmus; dysentery with burning, painful stools; frequent urging to urinate with burning; chills beginning in back with burning and thirst
Worse_From: Cold air; drafts; uncovering; after drinking; homesickness and emotional upset
Better_From: Warm room; wrapping up warmly; warm drinks (for throat); steady routine and familiar environment
Notes_Sphere: Remedy for burning mucous-membrane affections (throat, ears, bladder, rectum) in chilly, flabby, homesick patients who dislike exertion and open air

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Gloomy, despondent, feels isolated; wants to be alone yet fears being deserted; sluggish mind from chronic weakness; tends to dwell on disease
General_Themes: Acts on glands, veins and connective tissues; induration and malignant degeneration; varicose veins, ulcers, breast and cervical gland affections; general venous stasis and coldness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Hard, stony, often painful glands (especially breasts, cervical, inguinal) with tendency to ulceration; indurated, bluish varicose veins and ulcers with burning, stitching pains; chronic hoarseness and laryngeal catarrh; offensive discharges and night sweats; icy cold feet and general chilliness
Worse_From: Cold, damp; night; open air when very weak; mental or physical exertion
Better_From: Warmth; bandaging or support to veins; gentle, steady motion; nourishing food
Notes_Sphere: Deep-acting remedy for hard glandular swellings, varicose veins and ulcerations with great weakness, coldness and sense of isolation—often considered in degenerative or malignant tendencies

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Apathetic, sluggish, wants to be fanned; feels almost dead yet fears death; irritable when disturbed; great indifference from collapse or chronic debility
General_Themes: Charcoal; classic “corpse-reviver”; acts on venous system and digestion; collapse states with coldness and desire to be fanned; flatulent dyspepsia and respiratory weakness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Extreme weakness and collapse with cold, bluish skin, cold breath, cold sweat; wants to be fanned hard and have more air; bloated abdomen full of gas with sour, rancid eructations; cannot digest fats; tendency to haemorrhage of dark, oozing blood; chronic emphysema and dyspnoea in old people
Worse_From: Warm stuffy rooms; overeating, especially fats; alcohol; lying flat in respiratory weakness
Better_From: Cool air and fanning; head high, propped up; small sips of cool drinks; eructations of gas
Notes_Sphere: Key remedy for collapse, “near-death” states with coldness and desire for fanning, and for chronic flatulent dyspepsia and respiratory weakness in the elderly or debilitated

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dull, stupid, semi-conscious in septic states; may be irritable or delirious; mental clouding with offensive discharges and great prostration
General_Themes: Powerful antiseptic; produces profound sepsis-like conditions with offensive discharges, stupor and collapse; affects blood, nerves and mucous membranes
Key_Local_Symptoms: Extremely offensive breath, stools, urine or discharges; dark, tarry or bloody stools; ulcerations of mouth, throat or stomach; septic fevers with low pulse, cold extremities and stupor; burning pains along gastro-intestinal tract; urine scanty, dark and foul
Worse_From: Septic processes; cold; exertion; neglect of basic care in serious infections
Better_From: Warmth; antiseptic cleansing; rest; support of circulation (medical)
Notes_Sphere: Sepsis–collapse remedy for low, offensive, putrid states with great prostration and stupor, dark haemorrhages and burning pains—more of a critical/confirmatory remedy than everyday prescription

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, irritable, mentally exhausted; memory weak; feels old and broken down, especially after chronic intoxication (alcohol, carbon monoxide, etc.)
General_Themes: Acts on peripheral nerves, spinal cord and bone marrow; chronic neuritis and myelitis; degenerative states after toxic exposure; marked weakness and paraesthesiae
Key_Local_Symptoms: Numbness, tingling and burning in hands and feet; progressive weakness of limbs with staggering gait; shooting pains along nerves; cold, cyanosed extremities; vertigo and headaches from circulatory and nervous insufficiency; history of chronic alcohol, tobacco or industrial-gas exposure
Worse_From: Exertion; continued toxic exposure; cold; standing long
Better_From: Rest; warmth; cessation of toxins; gentle physiotherapy
Notes_Sphere: Nervous–circulatory remedy for chronic peripheral neuropathy and weakness, especially after toxic insults (alcohol, gases) with numbness, tingling and cold, bluish extremities

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, apathetic, intellectually dulled; difficulty concentrating; anxiety and confusion following asphyxial or toxic events
General_Themes: Carbon monoxide picture; acts on blood, heart and nervous system; anaemia, hypoxia, cardiac weakness and neurological sequelae after carbon-monoxide-type poisoning
Key_Local_Symptoms: Headache, vertigo and throbbing in head; ringing in ears; breathlessness and palpitations on slight exertion; cold, cyanosed extremities; numbness or weakness in limbs; great fatigue after minimal effort; tendency to faint
Worse_From: Exertion; going upstairs; close, stuffy rooms; further exposure to fumes or smoke
Better_From: Fresh, well-ventilated air; rest; oxygen support (acute); gradual conditioning
Notes_Sphere: Remedy modelled on carbon-monoxide poisoning picture with hypoxia, cardiac weakness, headaches and neurological fatigue after asphyxial exposure

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, irritable, mentally dulled; memory weak; feels prematurely old and broken down, often after years of alcohol, tobacco or chemical exposure
General_Themes: Powerful nerve and blood remedy; progressive peripheral neuritis and spinal cord degeneration; marked anaemia and venous stasis; history of chronic intoxication (alcohol, lead, etc.)
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning, tingling, numbness and weakness in hands and feet, extending upward; staggering gait; legs feel heavy and wooden; icy cold extremities with bluish discoloration; headaches and vertigo from poor circulation; great fatigue from slightest effort
Worse_From: Exertion; continued exposure to toxins; cold and damp; at night
Better_From: Rest; warmth; stopping the toxic influence; gentle, regular movement
Notes_Sphere: Deep-acting chronic intoxication remedy for peripheral neuritis, cold numb extremities and progressive weakness after alcohol, tobacco or industrial toxins

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Highly sensitive, conscientious, perfectionistic; strong sense of duty; history of long-standing grief, abuse or early responsibility; fears failure, criticism and disease; loves music, dance and often thunderstorms; many family expectations on them
General_Themes: Cancer nosode; deep constitutional remedy where there is strong family history of cancer, tuberculosis or diabetes; multiple suppressions (vaccinations, antibiotics, steroids); early loss, abuse or prolonged stress; great fatigue yet restless, wired nervous system
Key_Local_Symptoms: Insomnia from active mind; recurrent infections that never fully clear; tendency to bruising, moles, café-au-lait spots or numerous naevi; constipation alternating with diarrhoea from nervous strain; headaches in studious, over-driven children; craving for chocolate, salt or stimulants; chilliness with periodic fevers
Worse_From: Overwork; emotional upset; criticism; suppression of eruptions or discharges; late nights
Better_From: Gentle routine; creative outlets (music, dance); seaside air; sympathy and understanding
Notes_Sphere: Deep miasmatic remedy for perfectionistic, over-burdened people with strong family cancer history, multiple suppressions and chronic fatigue or recurrent infections

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, depressed, easily angered when liver is congested; feels heavy and dull, worse in the morning; may be despondent about chronic digestive trouble
General_Themes: Milk thistle; great liver and portal remedy; congestion and enlargement of liver, especially left lobe; gallstone colic; haemorrhoids and varicose veins from portal obstruction
Key_Local_Symptoms: Soreness and pain in liver region, extending to right shoulder or under left scapula; stitches in liver on deep inspiration; jaundice with clay-coloured stools and dark urine; nausea and bitter taste, worse on waking; haemorrhoids with itching and burning; varicose veins of legs; tendency to nosebleeds from portal congestion
Worse_From: Alcohol, rich or fatty food; lying on left side; morning on waking; sitting long, sedentary habits
Better_From: Moderate exercise; light, fat-free diet; open air; lying on right side with knees drawn up
Notes_Sphere: Primary liver–portal remedy for hepatic enlargement, gallstones and portal haemorrhoids/varicose veins, especially where left lobe of liver is markedly sore

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Indolent, apathetic, often overweight; irritable when digestive habits are disturbed; mental heaviness improved by regular regimen
General_Themes: Thermal spring preparation; acts on liver, stomach and intestines; chronic catarrhal conditions of stomach and duodenum; gallstones; constipation and obesity from sedentary life and high living
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronic gastric catarrh with sour eructations, heartburn and fullness after small amounts of food; constipation with large, hard stools or sluggish bowels requiring laxatives; gallstone tendencies with fullness and aching in liver and right shoulder; obesity with sluggish metabolism; gouty and rheumatic complaints in stout people
Worse_From: Overeating, especially rich, fatty foods; alcohol; lack of exercise; late meals
Better_From: Regular regimen, early light suppers; warm mineral water taken slowly; walking in open air
Notes_Sphere: “Spa” remedy for stout, sedentary patients with chronic gastric and hepatic catarrh, sluggish bowels, gallstones and gouty tendencies who do better on strict regimen and mineral waters

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, despondent from long-standing constipation; feels heavy, dull and unrefreshed; mind sluggish until bowels act
General_Themes: Chiefly a bowel remedy; chronic constipation from intestinal and rectal atony; sluggish portal circulation; piles and headaches from continual straining or incomplete evacuation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Habitual constipation with dry, knotty or insufficient stools; sensation of incomplete evacuation, must return to toilet repeatedly; dull headache and backache with rectal fullness; haemorrhoids from long straining; liver sluggishness with coated tongue and foul taste
Worse_From: Sedentary lifestyle; irregular habits; neglect of urge; overeating, especially rich food
Better_From: Regular, moderate exercise; plenty of water and fibre; establishing daily bowel routine
Notes_Sphere: Chronic-constipation remedy for atonic bowels with constant sense of incomplete stool, haemorrhoids and dull headache/backache from straining

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, anxious and easily fatigued from chronic digestive weakness; may be hypochondriacal about stomach and heart
General_Themes: Acts on stomach and intestines; flatulent dyspepsia, chronic diarrhoea or alternating constipation, especially after debility or tropical disease; used in convalescence from fevers
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sour, bitter eructations with flatulence; weight and oppression in stomach after food; chronic, offensive diarrhoea in the morning, sometimes alternating with constipation; colicky pains about umbilicus; palpitations from gas pressing upward
Worse_From: Fatty or rich food; coffee and stimulants; eating irregularly; cold drinks when overheated
Better_From: Warm, simple food; regular small meals; gentle movement after eating
Notes_Sphere: Digestive remedy for flatulent, sour dyspepsia and chronic diarrhoea/alternation in weak, debilitated patients, especially after fevers or tropical illnesses

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally exhausted and irritable from incessant coughing or nerve pains; cannot rest, feels worn out and worried
General_Themes: Sweet chestnut; acts chiefly on respiratory tract and nerves; pertussis and spasmodic coughs; neuralgias and rheumatic pains
Key_Local_Symptoms: Spasmodic, exhausting cough, especially in whooping-cough, with very frequent paroxysms and short intervals of relief; cough may be almost continuous, preventing sleep; little or no expectoration; chest and abdominal muscles ache and feel bruised from coughing; also occipital or facial neuralgias and shooting rheumatic pains
Worse_From: Night; lying down; cold air; laughing or talking; exertion
Better_From: Sitting propped up; warm room; short periods of rest between paroxysms; sips of warm drinks
Notes_Sphere: Spasmodic-cough remedy, particularly for almost continuous whooping-cough paroxysms with bruised chest and abdominal muscles and great exhaustion

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, irritable, made miserable by local pains in feet, corns or cracked skin; worries about appearance and inability to walk comfortably
General_Themes: Inner layer of horse’s hoof; acts on skin, bones and periosteum; corns, bunions, warts, rhagades and felons; also glandular swellings of breast and ovaries
Key_Local_Symptoms: Painful, sensitive corns and bunions on feet, especially soles and heels; deep cracks and rhagades on fingers, heels and hands; early felon (whitlow) with throbbing pain; tenderness and enlargement of breasts or ovaries with sharp, stitching pains; warts on hands or feet
Worse_From: Standing or walking; tight shoes; cold damp affecting hands and feet
Better_From: Rest; warm foot-baths; soft footwear; local applications (as ordered)
Notes_Sphere: Skin–bone remedy for very painful corns, bunions, cracks and early felons, and sometimes for sensitive breast/ovarian enlargements with stitching pains

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Oversensitive, nervous, easily startled; hysterical fits from pain or emotional upset; exhausted, tearful and irritable, especially in delicate women and children
General_Themes: Acts on nervous system and digestion; hysterical and nervous states after long suffering or nervous shock; colicky pains; menstrual and labour pains with great nervousness; suits oversensitive, worn-out individuals
Key_Local_Symptoms: Spasmodic colic in children and women with much groaning and hysterical crying; pains come in waves and cause faintness or extreme irritability; menstrual colic with nausea and trembling; labour pains with great nervous agitation, spasms or hysteria; nervous headaches in exhausted, delicate people
Worse_From: Emotion, fright, noise; pain; night; cold air in sensitive subjects
Better_From: Rest in quiet, dark room; warmth; gentle pressure over abdomen; reassurance and company
Notes_Sphere: Nervous–spasmodic remedy for hysterical, oversensitive patients with colicky pains, menstrual or labour pains and great nervous exhaustion after long suffering

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Fretful, restless, overexcitable—especially infants and children; cannot be comforted, cries from colic and nervous irritation; adults may have hysterical or nervous states
General_Themes: Catnip; acts on nervous system and abdomen; infantile colic and spasms; sleepless, over-wrought children; some use in whooping-cough and hysterical coughs
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent colic in infants with drawing up of legs, shrill crying and restlessness; gas and distension of abdomen; children cannot sleep, toss about and cry until exhausted; spasmodic cough in nervous children and in whooping-cough; hysterical attacks with weeping or laughing in sensitive subjects
Worse_From: Overfeeding; flatulent foods for nursing mother; excitement, noise, bright lights in children; evening and night
Better_From: Gentle rocking; carrying the child; warmth to abdomen; passing flatus or stool
Notes_Sphere: Child-colic and nervousness remedy for fretful, sleepless infants with gas and abdominal pain, and for spasmodic or hysterical coughs in sensitive children

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Fretful, nervous, easily exhausted by pain; women feel weak, irritable and discouraged from repeated miscarriages or difficult labours
General_Themes: Primarily a woman’s remedy; uterine atony and nervous spasms; false or inefficient labour pains; tendency to habitual abortion; also acts on small joints
Key_Local_Symptoms: Labour pains sharp, spasmodic, flying from one part to another with little progress; rigid, unyielding cervix; tendency to habitual abortion from uterine weakness; after-pains or dysmenorrhoea with crampy, wandering pains; stiffness and erratic pains in fingers, toes and small joints
Worse_From: Labour or menses when uterus is weak; cold; exertion in delicate women
Better_From: Warmth; gentle movement; when true, effective contractions get established
Notes_Sphere: Key remedy for uterine weakness with spasmodic, ineffective labour or menstrual pains and a history of miscarriages, plus erratic small-joint pains

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Serious, idealistic, sensitive to injustice; weepy over others’ suffering; anxious about the future; fears something bad will happen; mentally and physically weakened
General_Themes: Deep polycrest for slowly developing paralysis, contractures and weakness of tendons; warts, especially on face and hands; chronic hoarseness and laryngeal catarrh; rheumatic and arthritic complaints
Key_Local_Symptoms: Progressive weakness or paralysis of single parts (face, eyelids, vocal cords, bladder, extremities); hoarseness with inability to raise voice; chronic dry, raw cough, often worse evening and 3–4 a.m.; involuntary urination when coughing or sneezing; burning, raw sensations in skin and mucosa; large, flat warts on face, eyelids, hands
Worse_From: Dry, cold weather; drafts; getting chilled; over-use of voice; emotions about injustice
Better_From: Damp, mild weather; warmth of bed; sips of warm drinks; gentle movement
Notes_Sphere: Major remedy for paralytic weakness, warts and chronic hoarseness in sensitive, justice-oriented patients who get worse in dry cold and better in warmth and damp

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally dull and weak from chronic spleen and liver trouble; can be low-spirited and tired of suffering
General_Themes: Strong spleen and left-sided remedy; splenic enlargement, “ague cake” in malarial or anaemic patients; portal congestion with left-sided pains and dyspnoea
Key_Local_Symptoms: Enormous enlargement and tenderness of spleen with deep pain in left hypochondrium up into left shoulder; cannot lie on left side; left-sided abdominal and back pains; sometimes jaundice and liver soreness; shortness of breath from splenic congestion; profuse menses or leucorrhoea in such patients
Worse_From: Lying on left side; exertion; malarial influences; cold, damp air
Better_From: Lying on right side; warmth; gentle movement; improvement of spleen/liver function
Notes_Sphere: Splenic–portal remedy for left-sided “ague cake,” splenitis and portal congestion with inability to lie on the left side and deep splenic pain

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Excitable, nervous, sometimes voluptuous; may feel half-crazy from severe recurring pains; anxiety before expected paroxysms
General_Themes: Marked periodicity remedy—especially in malarial and neuralgic conditions; intense, clock-like recurring headaches and neuralgias; often suited to tropical, marshy climates
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent supra-orbital and facial neuralgia, often right-sided, returning with striking regularity at the same hour each day; pains radiate around eye and face; malarial attacks with periodic chills and fever; severe eye pains with lacrimation; sometimes used in periodic sciatica or other neuralgias
Worse_From: Same hour each day; damp, warm, marshy weather; exposure to malaria; exertion during neuralgic period
Better_From: Warmth; rest in dark room; after paroxysm has run its course
Notes_Sphere: Periodicity–neuralgia remedy for clock-like malarial or supra-orbital attacks, often in sensitive, excitable patients from warm damp regions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Jealous, suspicious, intense; emotional conflicts around dependence, sexuality and freedom; fear of being alone yet pushes people away; feels “split in two” emotionally
General_Themes: Snake-venom remedy similar to Lachesis; affects blood, heart and ovaries; congestion, haemorrhage and asphyxial tendencies; hot flushes and cardiac oppression with strong emotional component
Key_Local_Symptoms: Flushes of heat with palpitations and constriction about heart, as if heart were grasped; faintness and dyspnoea on least exertion; haemorrhages of dark blood; ovarian pains (often right) around menses with intense sexual and emotional agitation; tendency to bruising and varicosities
Worse_From: Emotional upsets, jealousy; heat; exertion; lying quietly in closed rooms
Better_From: Fresh air; sitting up; emotional release and open expression
Notes_Sphere: Heart–ovary–blood remedy for jealous, conflicted patients with flushes, palpitations, congestive heart and ovarian symptoms and a haemorrhagic tendency

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Desire to work and be useful but held back by heart and nerve pains; can be anxious and oppressed in chest, worried about heart
General_Themes: Night-blooming cereus; powerful cardiac and nerve remedy; violent heart pains, sense of weight on chest, cardiac hypertrophy; neuralgic pains in head and extremities
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sharp, convulsive pains in region of heart as if transfixed; stitching pains from heart to left chest or toward spleen; sensation of great weight on heart with pricking; difficult, sighing respiration; pains in occiput, eyes and malar bones; radiating pains down neck, back, arms and fingers
Worse_From: Exertion; emotional strain; lying on left side; at night when thinking of heart
Better_From: Rest; sitting propped up; warmth to chest; fresh air in moderation
Notes_Sphere: Cardiac-neuralgic remedy for stitching, “transfixed” heart pains with weight on chest and radiating neuralgia in head and limbs

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, nervous and restless from violent vomiting or menstrual pain; children and pregnant women extremely fidgety and sleepless
General_Themes: Acts on reflex centres producing spasmodic vomiting and spasmodic cough; known for vomiting of pregnancy, vomiting of half-digested food, and dysmenorrhoea with nausea in robust women
Key_Local_Symptoms: Persistent vomiting, especially of pregnancy or in children, with retching and exhaustion; vomits soon after eating, food partly digested; whooping cough with vomiting and sometimes haemorrhage; dysmenorrhoea in fleshy women where nausea and vomiting are relieved as menstrual flow becomes established
Worse_From: Motion; eating; beginning of menses; pregnancy; paroxysms of cough
Better_From: Once vomiting ceases or menstrual flow is fully established; complete rest; small sips of cool water
Notes_Sphere: Reflex-vomiting remedy for pregnancy or whooping cough and for menstrual colic where nausea/vomiting improve as the flow comes on

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Extreme irritability and oversensitivity; pains seem unbearable; angry, snappish, wants things and then rejects them; children only quiet when carried and rocked; one cheek red, the other pale
General_Themes: Great remedy for acute states in children (teething, otitis, colic) and for adults with oversensitive nerves; acts on digestion, nerves and mucous membranes
Key_Local_Symptoms: Teething with hot, red face on one side, greenish loose stools like chopped eggs and spinach; colic with drawing up of legs and shrill crying; otitis with intense pain and irritability; menses with labour-like pains and intolerable anger; symptoms with profuse hot sweat
Worse_From: Pain; anger; coffee; open air wind; night (especially around midnight); teething
Better_From: Being carried and rocked; warmth; warm drinks; gentle local heat
Notes_Sphere: Top acute children’s remedy for teething, earache and colic when pain is intense, the child is inconsolable and only being carried gives relief

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, discouraged and worn out from chronic bowel troubles; mental state coloured by constant diarrhoea and abdominal discomfort
General_Themes: Mexican bitter herb; strong affinity for intestines and liver; used chiefly in amoebic or chronic dysentery, chronic mucous colitis and lingering diarrhoeas
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronic diarrhoea or dysentery with mucus and sometimes blood; abdominal soreness and tenesmus; stools frequent, offensive, may alternate with short periods of normal stools; weakness and weight loss from long illness; hepatic congestion sometimes present
Worse_From: Cold drinks; irregular eating; fruit or questionable food; getting chilled
Better_From: Warmth; bland, simple diet; regular mealtimes; rest after stool
Notes_Sphere: Intestinal–liver remedy for chronic or amoebic-type dysentery and mucous colitis with persistent diarrhoea, tenesmus and debility

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, gloomy, often drowsy; feels weighed down and unable to think clearly; tendency to be anxious about health but too sluggish to act
General_Themes: Great right-sided liver and biliary remedy; marked jaundice, hepatic congestion and gall-bladder troubles; also acts on lungs (right side) and digestion
Key_Local_Symptoms: Constant pain and soreness under right scapula, key keynote; liver region enlarged, tender; jaundice with yellow skin and sclera; thick, yellow-coated tongue with teeth marks; bitter taste, nausea, desire for hot milk which agrees; clay-coloured or constipated stools, or diarrhoea with much bile; right-sided pneumonia or pleurisy with hepatic symptoms
Worse_From: Cold, change of weather; motion; lying on left side; early morning
Better_From: Warmth; hot milk; lying on painful (right) side with knees drawn up; eating small warm meals
Notes_Sphere: Classic liver–gall remedy for right-sided complaints, jaundice and shoulder-blade pain, especially when there is desire for and amelioration from hot milk

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, depressed and weary from chronic intestinal or liver troubles; children peevish and restless from worms; adults feel unclean and dragged down by digestive issues
General_Themes: Vermifuge and bitter tonic; acts on intestinal mucosa and liver; esp. roundworms and threadworms, with biliousness, pruritus ani and general debility after malarial or intestinal disease
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense itching and crawling at anus, especially at night; grinding of teeth, disturbed sleep and picking at nose in children; abdominal soreness and distension; sluggish liver with bitter mouth, coated tongue and poor appetite; convalescence from malaria with weakness and hepatic soreness
Worse_From: Night (for anal itching); sweets; irregular meals; sedentary habits
Better_From: Regular bowel movements; light, bitter tonics; hygiene of anal region; open air
Notes_Sphere: Intestinal–liver remedy chiefly for worms with marked anal itching and post-malarial or bilious weakness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally sluggish, absent-minded; startled by sudden sounds; anxiety around hearing loss or neurological symptoms
General_Themes: Acts on auditory and spinal nerves and as a worm remedy; partial deafness with peculiar auditory perception; spinal pains and scapular aches; also for intestinal worms (hookworm, roundworm)
Key_Local_Symptoms: Can hear sounds and music but not human voices clearly (or vice versa); roaring, buzzing or humming in ears; dull, aching pain between or beneath scapulae (often right) and in lumbar region; paraesthesiae along spine; intestinal worms with rectal itching and colicky pains
Worse_From: Noise; exertion; prolonged sitting; at night
Better_From: Rest; lying down; warmth to back; gentle stretching
Notes_Sphere: Nerve–auditory–worm remedy when there is odd partial deafness with noises in ears, scapular spinal pains and evidence of intestinal worms

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, timid, embarrassed by urinary or prostatic trouble; feels better when bladder empties; mental dulness from chronic pelvic congestion
General_Themes: Urinary and prostate remedy; chronic cystitis, enlarged prostate, retention; acts on kidneys, bladder and pelvic glands
Key_Local_Symptoms: Frequent urging with scanty, scalding urine; must stand with feet wide apart and bend forward to start flow; feeling of a ball or weight in perineum; cloudy, ropy, mucous or bloody urine; chronic cystitis in women and prostatitis in men; urine in children smells strong or “like a cat”
Worse_From: Sitting long (pelvic congestion); cold, damp; suppression of urine; pregnancy or postpartum states
Better_From: Standing and bending forward to urinate; walking a little; warm applications over bladder/perineum
Notes_Sphere: Key urinary–prostate remedy where starting urination requires bending forward, with ropy mucus and chronic cystitis or prostatitis

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Oversensitive to noise, touch and pain; irritable and easily offended; feels weak and drained, especially after loss of fluids; imaginative, brooding, may have illusions
General_Themes: Great remedy for debility from loss of vital fluids (haemorrhage, diarrhoea, lactation, suppuration); flatulent dyspepsia and tympanitic abdomen; periodic fevers and neuralgias
Key_Local_Symptoms: Abdomen enormously distended with gas, not relieved by passing flatus; colic from slight food or fruit; chill and fever coming every other day or with marked periodicity; ringing in ears, throbbing headaches; weakness and trembling after small exertion; pallor after haemorrhage or long illness
Worse_From: Night; slightest touch or draft; after eating fruit or milk; loss of fluids (bleeding, diarrhoea, sweating); noise
Better_From: Firm pressure; warmth; rest; eating small, simple meals; lying with head high
Notes_Sphere: Classic tonic remedy for post-haemorrhagic or post-diarrhoeal weakness, periodic fevers and extreme flatulent distension with hypersensitivity to touch and noise

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, restless, fearful, especially at night; great prostration with mental irritability; worries about heart and breathing
General_Themes: Powerful anti-periodic and cardiac tonic; combines quinine periodicity with Arsenicum’s restlessness and exhaustion; intermittent fevers, pernicious malaria, chronic asthma and cardiac weakness with oedema
Key_Local_Symptoms: Marked periodic chill–fever–sweat cycles with great exhaustion; severe neuralgias and headaches recurring at fixed times; dyspnoea and cardiac oppression on slight exertion; oedema of feet and ankles; albuminous urine in some cases; burning pains yet great chilliness
Worse_From: Night; exertion; ascending stairs; cold and damp; periodic exposures (malaria etc.)
Better_From: Warmth; rest; lying with head and chest raised; regular, small meals
Notes_Sphere: Deep remedy for prostrating periodic fevers and cardiac weakness with oedema and asthma, especially where Arsenicum-like anxiety and restlessness are prominent

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, hypersensitive to noise and light; head feels bursting; mental confusion during attacks, better in dark and quiet
General_Themes: Quinine salt; strong periodicity; neuralgias, headaches and intermittent fevers; toxic effects of quinine including tinnitus, deafness and vertigo
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent, throbbing or neuralgic headaches (often supra-orbital) recurring at same hour daily; tinnitus and partial deafness, especially after quinine abuse; intermittent fevers with chill, heat and sweat at regular times; vertigo and buzzing in ears; enlarged spleen in malarial subjects
Worse_From: Noise, light, motion; early afternoon or fixed hour; damp, malarial regions; mental exertion
Better_From: Dark, quiet room; lying still; warmth; regular, moderate doses when indicated
Notes_Sphere: Periodicity remedy for clock-like headaches, neuralgias and malarial fevers, and for after-effects of quinine with tinnitus and auditory disturbance

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, despondent, drowsy; mental heaviness from constant frontal headaches and liver trouble; feels too tired to think
General_Themes: Marked liver and gall-bladder remedy; jaundice, bilious headaches and hepatic colic; acts on pancreas to some extent
