Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense, dull, throbbing frontal or over-eye headaches with nausea and bilious vomiting; pain and soreness in liver region with jaundiced skin and sclera; clay-coloured stools and dark urine; gallstone colic; constipation or diarrhoea with much bile
Worse_From: Morning; after fatty or rich food; alcohol; motion during acute headache
Better_From: Rest in dark room; lying with head high; warm applications over liver; light, non-fatty diet
Notes_Sphere: Liver–headache remedy for jaundice and gallstone colic with severe frontal headaches and bilious vomiting

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless, anxious, terrified by visions and nightmares; sleepless, nervous and excitable, then quickly prostrated; confusion and fear on waking
General_Themes: Hypnotic drug picture; acts on brain, heart and circulation; insomnia with hallucinations, night terrors and delirium tremens; collapse with small, weak pulse; hyperaesthetic skin and mucosa
Key_Local_Symptoms: Persistent insomnia with terrifying dreams and hallucinations on closing eyes; red, congested face and eyes with burning lids; trembling, twitching and startings in sleep; night terrors in children; weak, irregular pulse, cold sweat and collapse in poisoning picture; intense itching and burning of skin
Worse_From: Night; lying down to sleep; alcohol and stimulants; overwork of brain
Better_From: Cool, quiet, dark room; gentle reassurance; avoidance of stimulants; slight elevation of head
Notes_Sphere: Nervous–cardiac remedy corresponding to chloral hydrate states: insomnia with vivid nightmares, hyperaesthesia and possible collapse with weak heart

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dull, drowsy, sometimes exhilarated; may feel alternately fearful and indifferent; mental clouding after anaesthesia or shocks
General_Themes: Acts on heart, liver, stomach and nerves; collapse, syncope, angina pectoris and biliary or renal colic; after-effects of chloroform anaesthesia
Key_Local_Symptoms: Angina with sense of oppression and constriction about heart, radiating to left arm; sudden faintness or syncope with pallor, cold sweat and weak pulse; severe biliary or renal colic with spasmodic pains; persistent vomiting or gastric irritation after chloroform or other anaesthetics
Worse_From: Exertion; emotional excitement; lying flat in weak heart; post-operative period
Better_From: Rest; head low during faintness, then slightly raised; warmth; very small sips of cold water
Notes_Sphere: Remedy picture of chloroform: sudden faintness or angina with cardiac oppression, spasmodic colics and gastric irritation following anaesthesia or shock

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, restless, feels suffocating; fear of choking or dying during attacks; mentally confused after spasms
General_Themes: Chlorine gas picture; intense irritation of larynx and air passages; croup, laryngospasm, asthma and diphtheritic or membranous affections; sudden choking fits
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sudden spasms of larynx with sensation of strangulation; must sit up and gasp for breath; voice hoarse or lost; dry, suffocative cough leading to cyanosis; diphtheritic or membranous formations in throat; constant desire to take a deep breath; chest feels tight and hot
Worse_From: Warm, close rooms; slightest exertion; after sleep; exposure to chlorine or other irritant gases
Better_From: Cool, fresh air; sitting upright; sipping cold drinks; gentle fanning
Notes_Sphere: Acute larynx–respiratory remedy for spasmodic suffocative attacks (croupy or diphtheritic) with intense laryngeal constriction and need for deep breaths

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, low-spirited and heavy from chronic liver and gall-bladder trouble; mental clouding and despondency with headaches and vertigo
General_Themes: Acts on liver, gall-bladder and metabolism; gallstones, biliary colic, fatty degeneration and hypercholesterolaemia; often in persons with chronic hepatic congestion
Key_Local_Symptoms: Severe right-sided abdominal pain from gallstones, radiating to back and shoulder; jaundice with itching skin, pale stools and dark urine; persistent hepatic tenderness and enlargement; headaches and vertigo with bilious attacks; intolerance of fatty foods
Worse_From: Fatty, rich meals; alcohol; anger; at night or after lying on right side
Better_From: Light, fat-free diet; warm applications over liver region; rest on right side with knees drawn up
Notes_Sphere: Liver–gallstone remedy for chronic biliary colic, jaundice and high cholesterol states with right-sided hepatic pain and food intolerance

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, restless from severe burning pains and offensive discharges; mental dulness in advanced destructive states
General_Themes: Corrosive drug; produces deep ulceration of mucous membranes with dark, offensive discharges; throat, nose, larynx, stomach and genito-urinary tract affected
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intensely sore throat with dark, almost black membranes or ulcers and burning pains; post-nasal catarrh with thick, offensive, blood-streaked mucus; deep, punched-out ulcers on mucosa or skin; haemorrhages of dark blood; violent gastric irritation with vomiting and diarrhoea; nephritis with albuminous, bloody urine
Worse_From: Cold damp; night; after abuse of strong chemicals or cauterisation
Better_From: Warmth; frequent cleansing with bland fluids; absolute rest
Notes_Sphere: Destructive–ulcerative remedy for deep, dark, offensive ulcerations of throat, nose, larynx and mucosa with burning pains and dark haemorrhage

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Extremely irritable and restless from constant itching and disfigurement; feels embarrassed and ashamed of skin
General_Themes: Powerful skin remedy; acts on epidermis and underlying tissues; chronic eczema, psoriasis, lichen planus and crusted eruptions with intense pruritus and excoriation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Thick, crusted, brownish or blackish eruptions with intolerable itching and burning; eczema behind ears, on scalp, eyelids and flexures; oozing, fissured patches that bleed easily; psoriatic plaques with scaling and cracks; scratching leads to excoriation and infection
Worse_From: Heat of bed; washing with hot water; woollen clothing; emotional upset
Better_From: Cool applications; open air; gentle washing with mild soaps; keeping skin dry and clean
Notes_Sphere: Chronic-skin remedy for crusty, thick, intensely itchy eruptions (psoriasis/eczema/lichen) especially behind ears, on scalp and in flexures

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Childish, silly behaviour or confusion; mental blankness after convulsions; may be fearful and suspicious between attacks
General_Themes: Strong convulsive remedy; tetanic spasms, opisthotonos and violent distortions; often after head injury or suppression of eruptions; infantile spasms and epileptiform seizures
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sudden, violent convulsions with frightful distortions of body and face; head twists backward (opisthotonos); jaws clenched, foam at mouth; pupils dilated; post-ictal stupor, memory loss and weakness; history of suppressed eruptions, head trauma or worms; eruptions thickly crusted, honey-yellow, especially on scalp and face
Worse_From: Bright objects; touch; injury; suppression of eruptions; dentition; worms
Better_From: After vomiting or stool; after eruption reappears; quiet, dark room
Notes_Sphere: Convulsion remedy for violent tetanic seizures, especially in children, often linked to suppressed eruptions, head injury or worms

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, restless and dissatisfied; nervous and fidgety, particularly before chill or with joint pains; dislikes being disturbed
General_Themes: Bedbug; intermittent fevers and rheumatic pains; marked chilliness and jerking; also uterine haemorrhage and labour issues in some cases
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chilliness with shivering and yawning before attacks of intermittent fever; sensation as if tendons were too short, causing jerks and drawing pains in limbs; rheumatic and gouty pains in joints, especially wrists and ankles; uterine haemorrhage or labour pains with intense chilliness; itching and crawling sensations over skin
Worse_From: Night; before and during chill; damp cold; movement of affected joints
Better_From: Warmth; wrapping up; rest in bed; perspiration stage of fever
Notes_Sphere: Intermittent-fever and rheumatic remedy with marked chilliness, jerking tendons and drawing joint pains, sometimes with uterine haemorrhage

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Gloomy, fearful, oversensitive; fears insanity, death, or that something terrible will happen; talkative, jumps from subject to subject; emotional states strongly linked to uterus and spine
General_Themes: Great female and rheumatic remedy; acts on uterus, ovaries, muscles and nerves; rheumatic pains in neck and back; chorea; dysmenorrhoea and labour pains with mental distress
Key_Local_Symptoms: Severe, neuralgic headaches as if top of head would fly off; pains in neck and upper back, worse menses; uterine and ovarian pains shooting down thighs; irregular, painful menses with dark, clotted flow; false labour pains, rheumatic stiffness of neck and back; choreic movements in hysterical or pubertal girls
Worse_From: Cold, damp; menses; emotion; after fright; at menopause
Better_From: Warmth; continued gentle motion; pressure on painful part; fresh air
Notes_Sphere: Female–rheumatic remedy for fearful, talkative women with uterine and spinal problems, neuralgic headaches and choreiform or rheumatic pains

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Extremely irritable, cross and contrary; does not want to be touched or looked at; child wants to be carried but fights and strikes; often angry and obstinate
General_Themes: Classic roundworm remedy; acts on intestinal tract and nervous system of children; worm irritation, convulsions and spasms; also spasmodic cough and asthma in wormy kids
Key_Local_Symptoms: Constant picking at nose and rubbing face; grinding teeth in sleep; boring finger into nose; hungry soon after eating yet loses weight; abdomen hard and sore around navel; spasms and twitching, convulsions from worms; pale face with bluish rings around eyes; spasmodic cough or asthma in wormy children
Worse_From: Night; during and after eating; around full moon; sweets; being looked at or touched
Better_From: Passing worms or stool; being carried (briefly); lying on abdomen; warmth
Notes_Sphere: Top worm remedy for cross, irritable children with nose-picking, teeth-grinding, periumbilical pain and voracious appetite yet emaciation

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally dull, tired from chronic visual strain; may be anxious about slowly failing eyesight
General_Themes: Ophthalmic remedy; chiefly used for opacities of cornea and lens—cataracts, corneal nebulae and chronic keratitis; stimulates local circulation and absorption
Key_Local_Symptoms: Gradual dimming of vision from cataract or corneal opacity; sensation of mist or veil before eyes; smarting, burning, dryness and tiredness of eyes after reading; conjunctival injection with mild irritation rather than acute inflammation
Worse_From: Eye-strain (reading, screens); bright light; ageing; chronic irritation
Better_From: Resting eyes; shaded light; regular gentle use of Cineraria preparations; outdoor breaks from near work
Notes_Sphere: Eye remedy mainly for early or slowly developing cataract and corneal opacities, and tired, irritated eyes from chronic strain

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, impatient, often lascivious thoughts; mental restlessness at night with vivid dreams; may feel driven yet fatigued
General_Themes: Strongly syphilitic remedy; acts on mucous membranes, periosteum and glands; nasal, pharyngeal and genital conditions with red, inflamed tissues; warts and condylomata
Key_Local_Symptoms: Characteristically bright red line from nose to upper lip; thick, tenacious post-nasal mucus; raw, sore throat especially at night; burning, itching in anus and genitals with condylomata or warts; bone and periosteal pains, especially in skull and tibia, worse at night; moist, offensive eruptions around mouth and genitals
Worse_From: Night (especially after midnight); warmth of bed; touch; damp; sexual excess
Better_From: Moderate cool air; gentle motion; local hygiene; sometimes rest in semi-upright position
Notes_Sphere: Syphilitic mucosa–bone remedy for red, raw throat and naso-pharynx, condylomata and bone pains with strong nocturnal aggravation

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious and faint from sudden blood loss; feels weak, tremulous and chilly; may fear dying from haemorrhage
General_Themes: Haemorrhagic and post-haemorrhagic remedy; acts on uterus and circulation; uterine bleeding, post-partum or post-abortion haemorrhage; nosebleeds and gastric haemorrhage
Key_Local_Symptoms: Profuse bright-red haemorrhage, especially uterine, with faintness, cold sweat and palpitations; bleeding may occur in gushes or between periods; history of abortion or post-partum haemorrhage; bleeding after slight trauma or exertion; cramps in stomach or uterus with bleeding
Worse_From: Exertion; rising suddenly; after childbirth or miscarriage; slightest strain when already anaemic
Better_From: Lying flat; external pressure over bleeding area; cold applications; small sips of cold water
Notes_Sphere: Haemorrhage remedy for bright-red, often uterine bleeding with marked faintness, coldness and palpitations, especially post-partum or after miscarriage

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, timid, easily startled; feels extremely sensitive to surrounding influences, especially cold air; may be depressed and fearful in the dark
General_Themes: Strong scrofulous and glandular remedy; acts on throat, tonsils, cervical glands and skin; marked sensitivity to cold air, even around head and neck; chronic suppurations and catarrhs
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronic sore throat and tonsillitis with sensation of extreme coldness in throat; enlarged, hard or suppurating cervical glands; nose and sinuses sensitive to slightest draft; dry, cracked skin on hands and face; chronic skin eruptions with gland involvement
Worse_From: Cold air, drafts (especially on head and neck); winter; uncovering; swallowing cold drinks
Better_From: Wrapping up warmly; warm room; warm drinks; gentle, dry climate
Notes_Sphere: Scrofulous–glandular remedy for chronic tonsillitis, cervical adenitis and cold-sensitive throats and skin in thin, chilly patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low, melancholic, easily discouraged; mental dullness with a heavy, oppressed feeling from dyspepsia or liver trouble
General_Themes: Bitter orange; gastric and hepatic remedy; flatulent dyspepsia, “nervous stomach,” bilious attacks and headaches from digestive disturbance; mild sedative for restless, irritable patients
Key_Local_Symptoms: Heaviness and fullness in stomach after eating small amounts; sour or bitter eructations; flatulence with griping colic; bilious headaches with nausea, coated tongue and bitter taste; disturbed sleep from gastric irritation; tendency to constipation or sluggish bowels
Worse_From: Overeating; rich or fatty food; evening and night; mental worry with irregular meals
Better_From: Simple, light diet; warm drinks; gentle walking after meals; regular meal times
Notes_Sphere: Digestive–liver remedy for flatulent, “nervous” dyspepsia and bilious headaches in sensitive, melancholic patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Timid, nervous, anxious about health; mental confusion and forgetfulness; restless at night with worries about urinary or genital disease
General_Themes: Acts on genito-urinary organs, lymphatic glands and skin; orchitis, epididymitis, prostatitis and urethritis; also eruptions and glandular swellings
Key_Local_Symptoms: Swollen, indurated, painful testicles or epididymis; drawing, tearing pains in spermatic cord; urethral burning and smarting, worse when not urinating; chronic prostatitis with slow, weak stream; glandular enlargements and skin eruptions with itching; scalp eruptions with oozing and matting of hair
Worse_From: Night; lying in bed; suppression of discharges; cold, damp
Better_From: Warm applications to affected glands; gentle support of scrotum; warm room; slow walking
Notes_Sphere: Genito-urinary–gland remedy for orchitis/epididymitis, prostatitis and urethritis with indurated glands and nightly aggravation

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Melancholic, easily exhausted mentally; worse from long sitting at desk work; depressed and irritable, with preoccupation about sexual weakness
General_Themes: Acts on spine, sacrum and sexual organs; backache from sitting, especially in coccyx and lumbar region; sexual debility from excess or masturbation; weakness in lower limbs
Key_Local_Symptoms: Pain and weakness in small of back and sacrum, worse sitting, better walking; coccyx sore, cannot sit on hard surfaces; heaviness and weakness in legs after emission or coitus; nocturnal emissions with great prostration; haemorrhoids and rectal soreness from sedentary habits
Worse_From: Prolonged sitting; sexual excess; masturbation; mental overwork while seated
Better_From: Walking about; changing position; lying down; standing rather than sitting
Notes_Sphere: Spine–sexual remedy for backache from sitting, coccyx soreness and sexual weakness or exhaustion in sedentary workers

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Excited, talkative, optimistic at first, then depressed and apathetic; easily fatigued mentally; anxiety about heart and breathing, especially at altitude
General_Themes: High-altitude and fatigue remedy; acts on heart, lungs and nervous system; mountain sickness, climbers’ and athletes’ exhaustion; also useful in some cases of neurasthenia and anaemia
Key_Local_Symptoms: Shortness of breath and palpitations on exertion, especially climbing or at high altitudes; faintness, headache and nausea from rarefied air; great weakness and trembling after slight effort; insomnia from nervous over-activity; ringing in ears and dizziness from circulatory strain
Worse_From: Ascending heights; physical exertion, especially uphill; mental strain with lack of sleep; high mountains or rarefied air
Better_From: Rest; descending to lower altitude; cool fresh air without exertion; small sips of water
Notes_Sphere: Altitude–fatigue remedy for breathlessness, palpitations and collapse from exertion, particularly in climbers, travellers and over-strained athletes

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Over-excited, talkative, restless; hallucinations, suspicion and anxiety; then profound depression, fear and exhaustion; craving for stimulation
General_Themes: Local-anaesthetic and CNS stimulant picture; acts on brain, heart and mucous membranes; insomnia, neuralgia, cardiac palpitation and collapse; dryness and ulceration of nasal and pharyngeal mucosa
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense insomnia with racing thoughts and hallucinations; palpitations and irregular, feeble pulse; great prostration after excitement; numbness and tingling in mouth, throat or skin; dryness, crusting and ulceration of nasal septum in habitual users; periodic headaches and eye-strain
Worse_From: Stimulants and repeated dosing; night; mental strain; emotional excitement
Better_From: Rest in quiet, dark room; removal of stimulant; cool drinks in small sips; gentle reassurance
Notes_Sphere: Nervous–cardiac remedy corresponding to cocaine states: over-stimulation followed by collapse, insomnia, palpitations and local numbness/dryness of mucosa

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Extremely irritable and sensitive; violent outbursts from intense facial pain; cannot bear slightest touch or jaw movement during attacks
General_Themes: Ladybird; strong affinity for trigeminal and dental nerves; violent facial neuralgia and toothache, often connected with carious teeth and gastric disturbance
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent, tearing or stabbing pains in face and teeth, particularly upper jaw and around eyes; pains radiate to ear and temple; aggravated by chewing, talking or slightest touch; teeth decayed or very sensitive to cold air; copious salivation with nausea and gastric acidity; throbbing headache with neuralgia
Worse_From: Chewing, talking, touch, cold air; night; lying on painful side
Better_From: Warm coverings; holding or supporting jaw; resting quietly with head elevated; warmth to face
Notes_Sphere: Facial-neuralgia remedy for intense trigeminal tooth and face pains with extreme sensitivity to touch and motion and associated gastric acidity

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dull, confused, as if intoxicated; slow to answer; very irritable and sensitive to contradiction; ailments from loss of sleep, nursing the sick, night-watching or long travel
General_Themes: Acts on nervous system and digestion; vertigo, seasickness, motion sickness; weakness of spine and limbs; cramps and tremors; dysmenorrhoea and postpartum weakness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Vertigo with nausea, worse from motion or riding in vehicles; seasickness with empty, hollow feeling in stomach; great weakness and trembling after loss of sleep or long watching; back and neck feel weak, cannot support head; menses with cramping and nausea; spasms and twitching in limbs; constipation with ineffectual urging
Worse_From: Motion (cars, boats, trains); loss of sleep; anxiety or grief while nursing others; open air when moving
Better_From: Lying still; closing eyes; warmth; sleep and rest after strain; eating a little food
Notes_Sphere: Top remedy for ailments from loss of sleep and motion sickness: vertigo, nausea, weakness and spinal exhaustion in overworked caregivers and travellers

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, impatient, anxious; attacks of fear and suffocation during coughing fits; feels worse on waking in morning
General_Themes: Acts on respiratory and urinary tracts; spasmodic coughs and whooping cough with profuse, stringy mucus and haemorrhage; gravelly urine and urethral irritation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Paroxysmal, spasmodic cough with choking and tickling in larynx, ending in copious, tenacious, stringy mucus and sometimes vomiting; cough worse in morning on waking and from slightest talking; whooping-cough with blood-streaked mucus and nosebleed; burning and cutting in urethra; urine contains red, sand-like sediment and blood at end of urination
Worse_From: Morning on waking; warm room; talking; singing; pressure on larynx; drinking cold fluids during cough
Better_From: Cold fresh air (between attacks); sipping water during intervals; rest with head elevated; expectoration of mucus
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory–urinary remedy for morning-worse spasmodic coughs with ropy mucus, haemorrhage and uric-acid gravel or urethral burning

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally dull and listless from chronic catarrh and deafness; may be irritable from constant nasal and throat discomfort
General_Themes: Horse-radish; acts on mucous membranes and salivary glands; chronic nasal and pharyngeal catarrh, hoarseness and aphonia; scurvy-like gum conditions
Key_Local_Symptoms: Profuse nasal catarrh with watery, acrid discharge excoriating nostrils; chronic hoarseness or loss of voice from laryngitis; thick mucus in throat with constant hawking; salivation with bleeding, spongy gums; dull hearing from Eustachian catarrh; frontal sinus pressure and dull headache
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; exposure to cold air on throat; speaking or singing long; neglect of oral hygiene
Better_From: Warmth; wrapping neck; warm drinks; fresh vegetables and improved diet in scorbutic states
Notes_Sphere: ENT–mucous membrane remedy for chronic nasal catarrh, hoarseness and scurvy-like gum troubles with acrid discharge and thick throat mucus

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dull, drowsy, apathetic; wants to be left alone and sleep; mental activity feels sluggish from long illness or cough
General_Themes: Acts chiefly on respiratory centre and nerves; dry, spasmodic, teasing coughs with little expectoration; cough of elderly, tubercular or cardiac patients; also pruritus and nervous twitchings
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dry, hacking, spasmodic cough, worse at night and from talking; cough may end in retching or vomiting; scanty or no expectoration; cough of phthisis or chronic bronchitis in weak subjects; intense itching of skin, especially in elderly, worse at night; twitching or jerking of muscles when falling asleep
Worse_From: Night, especially on lying down; talking; cold air; excitement or exertion
Better_From: Rest; quiet, warm room; sipping warm drinks; lying propped up
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory–nervous remedy for dry, teasing, mostly non-productive coughs in weak or elderly patients, often with intense nocturnal pruritus

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mind overactive and excited; ideas flow rapidly; hypersensitive to pain, sound, touch, and emotions; sleepless from joy, surprise or strong impressions
General_Themes: Acts on nervous system; acute insomnia, nervous excitement, headaches from over-stimulation; toothache and neuralgia with over-sensitivity
Key_Local_Symptoms: Insomnia from overactive mind—cannot stop thinking after joy, plans or worries; pains felt as unbearable, driving to despair; toothache better by holding cold water in mouth; headaches from excitement, coffee abuse or mental overwork; palpitations from joyful news
Worse_From: Noise, strong emotions (joy or grief), coffee, narcotics, night watching
Better_From: Cold applications (toothache, some headaches); lying quietly; gentle massage; cool, dark room
Notes_Sphere: Top remedy for acute nervous excitement and sleeplessness from joy, surprises or mental overactivity, with extreme sensitivity to pain and impressions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, oversensitive to external impressions; even smell of food nauseates; mental exhaustion from long suffering or gout
General_Themes: Great gout and serous membrane remedy; small joint gout, especially great toe; autumn dysentery; acts on muscles, kidneys and GI tract
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense nausea from merely smelling or thinking of food (especially eggs, fish, fat); gouty pains in small joints, red, hot, exquisitely tender—cannot bear them touched; tearing pains worse at night and from motion; stools watery, mucous or shreddy, with much tenesmus, often in autumn; great weakness and prostration
Worse_From: Slightest motion; smell or sight of food; cold, damp weather; evening and night
Better_From: Rest, absolute quiet; warmth in bed; drawing up limbs; small sips of warm drinks
Notes_Sphere: Key gout–GI remedy for small-joint gout and autumn dysentery, with extreme nausea from food odours and great aggravation from motion

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, despondent from chronic constipation and piles; feels pelvic congestion and pressure constantly; pregnant women feel overwhelmed and low
General_Themes: Acts on rectum, portal circulation and pelvic organs; obstinate constipation with sensation of sticks in rectum; haemorrhoids, especially in pregnancy; pelvic congestion with heart symptoms
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dry, hard, knotty stools with constant sensation as if sticks or sand in rectum; blind or bleeding piles with much itching and burning, worse during pregnancy; constipation in pregnant women with backache and fullness in pelvis; sometimes palpitation and cardiac irritability from portal congestion
Worse_From: Pregnancy; standing long; straining at stool; suppression of haemorrhoidal flow
Better_From: Regular, soft stools; cool applications to anus; lying down; high-fibre diet and hydration
Notes_Sphere: Rectum–portal remedy for obstinate constipation and haemorrhoids, especially in pregnant or sedentary patients with stick-like rectal sensation

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Violent anger and indignation; broods over insults; pains drive patient to despair but is relieved by pressure and bending double
General_Themes: Classic colic and neuralgia remedy; acts on nerves of abdomen and spine; cramping pains, colic, sciatica and dysmenorrhoea with amelioration from hard pressure and doubling up
Key_Local_Symptoms: Cutting, cramping abdominal pains forcing patient to bend double and press abdomen firmly; colic after anger or indignation; diarrhoea with colic, stools watery, frothy or offensive; left-sided sciatica with shooting pains down limb, better hard pressure and lying on painful side; dysmenorrhoea with crampy pains relieved by bending double
Worse_From: Anger, indignation; eating; motion; exposure to cold; night
Better_From: Hard pressure; bending double; warmth; lying on painful side
Notes_Sphere: Top remedy for anger-related colic and neuralgias where pains are violent yet strongly relieved by pressure and doubling up

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, restless, depressed from eye or skin suffering; fears blindness; mental focus dominated by burning, stinging pains
General_Themes: Similar to Rhus tox; acts on eyes, skin and joints; intense burning, stinging, swelling; especially left eye; rheumatic pains and erysipelatous eruptions
Key_Local_Symptoms: Severe burning, stinging and swelling of eyes, especially left, as if from poison-ivy; eyelids oedematous, conjunctiva bright red; vision blurred from pain and photophobia; rheumatic pains and stiffness of joints with burning and soreness; erysipelatous or urticarial eruptions on skin with intense burning
Worse_From: Open air; light; motion of affected joint; touch; changes of weather
Better_From: Closing eyes; dark room; warmth; rest
Notes_Sphere: Eye–skin–joint remedy for poison-ivy-like burning and swelling of left eye and rheumatic pains with erysipelatous eruptions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Serious, reserved, often emotionally closed; history of grief, disappointed love or long celibacy; fear of being looked at, shyness; memory weak and slow
General_Themes: Great glandular and neurological remedy; slowly progressing muscular weakness, paralysis and induration; especially suited to elderly or those with long sexual abstinence; breast and prostate troubles; vertigo
Key_Local_Symptoms: Vertigo on turning in bed, lying down or turning head sideways; glandular indurations (breast, prostate, testes) that are hard and gradually enlarging; difficulty initiating urination, weak or interrupted flow in older men; trembling and weakness of legs, worse going downstairs; bruised pains in breasts, worse before menses; cough or chest oppression when lying
Worse_From: Turning in bed; lying down; going downstairs; sexual abstinence or suppression; alcohol
Better_From: Slow, steady motion in open air; keeping head still; continued gentle walking
Notes_Sphere: Induration–vertigo remedy for progressive gland hardness (breast/prostate) and old-age paralysis with characteristic positional vertigo when turning or lying down

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, fearful about heart; feels as if heart would stop if she moves; mental dullness and sadness from cardiac weakness
General_Themes: Lily-of-the-valley; heart remedy for valvular disease, dilatation and failure; marked dyspnoea and palpitations with little exertion; often in women post-pregnancy or middle age
Key_Local_Symptoms: Palpitations with sensation as if heart stopped and then gave a great throb; breathlessness on slightest exertion, especially walking or climbing stairs; cannot lie flat; ankles and feet oedematous; pulse weak, irregular or intermittent; tightness and soreness in precordial region
Worse_From: Exertion; walking upstairs; lying flat; emotional excitement
Better_From: Rest; sitting propped up; fresh, cool air; gentle, non-straining movement
Notes_Sphere: Cardiac remedy for valvular disease and failure with marked dyspnoea on exertion, ankle oedema and fear that the heart will stop

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, anxious about urinary and genital symptoms; embarrassed by chronic discharges and odours; mental unrest with physical itching and burning
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes of urinary, respiratory and digestive tracts; chronic urethritis, cystitis, prostatitis; chronic bronchitis with much mucus; skin eruptions with itching
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning and smarting in urethra during and after urination; chronic gonorrhoeal or catarrhal discharges, thin or creamy, often with strong odour; frequent urging to urinate, with sense of fullness in bladder and perineum; chronic bronchial catarrh with loose cough and copious, thick mucus; itching papular eruptions on skin
Worse_From: Cold and damp; sexual excess; alcohol and spicy food; long sitting
Better_From: Warmth; bland diet; passing urine; gentle activity
Notes_Sphere: Urinary–mucous membrane remedy for chronic urethral and bronchial catarrh with burning, smarting and abundant mucous discharges

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, excitable, anxious during attacks; feels suffocated and panicky; mental state dominated by violent paroxysmal cough
General_Themes: Great whooping-cough and spasmodic-cough remedy; acts on respiratory mucosa and nerves; rapid, violent paroxysms with short intervals; also chronic nasal catarrh
Key_Local_Symptoms: Extremely rapid, almost continuous paroxysms of cough with little time to breathe; cough is spasmodic, barking, often ending in vomiting; face becomes purple or dark red; much mucus in naso-pharynx but difficult to expel; chronic nasal catarrh with offensive, thick mucus and crusts; cough worse in cold air and at night
Worse_From: Cold air; uncovering; night; talking or laughing; inhaling cold air at doors/windows
Better_From: Warm room; wrapping up; covering mouth and nose; expectoration of mucus
Notes_Sphere: Spasmodic-cough remedy for very rapid, suffocative whooping-cough paroxysms and chronic nasal catarrh with thick, offensive mucus

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Children fretful, clingy, crying from abdominal discomfort; adults tired, dull and irritable from long-standing bowel weakness
General_Themes: Main use in chronic intestinal weakness of children; undigested, offensive stools; colicky diarrhoea during dentition or after chill; general malnutrition and debility
Key_Local_Symptoms: Frequent, loose, foul stools with undigested food; abdomen distended and gurgling, child doubles up and cries before stool; stools more troublesome in the day than at night; poor weight gain and pale face in little ones with chronic diarrhoea
Worse_From: Cold, damp exposure; dentition; fruit or dietary errors
Better_From: Warmth; simple, bland diet; regular small feeds; gentle rubbing of abdomen
Notes_Sphere: Paediatric–bowel remedy for chronic, undigested diarrhoea and colic in thin, peevish children, especially around teething

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, irritable, easily exhausted; mental dulness and “never well since” a long fever or malaria
General_Themes: Close to Cornus florida; post-malarial debility and intermittent fevers; sluggish liver and spleen; chronic digestive weakness after acute disease
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dull, heavy headache with fullness in liver and spleen regions; bitter taste, coated tongue, loss of appetite; recurring chill-and-fever pattern with great languor; soreness in back and limbs as if beaten; night sweats in debilitated patients
Worse_From: Overexertion; damp, marshy air; recurrence of malarial influences; late hours
Better_From: Rest; nourishing but light food; moderate dry warmth; gentle outdoor air away from marsh
Notes_Sphere: Convalescent–malarial remedy for lingering weakness, intermittent fever and hepatic–splenic soreness after malaria or long fevers

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, despondent, tired of suffering from chronic pains; mental focus stuck on stomach, liver or neuralgic pains
General_Themes: Acts on digestive tract, liver and peripheral nerves; neuralgic pains, especially in upper abdomen and chest; dyspepsia with hepatic congestion
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dull, pressing or neuralgic pains in epigastrium radiating to back or shoulders; sense of weight and soreness in liver region; flatulence and sour or bitter eructations; periodic neuralgic pains in chest or limbs with gastric disturbance
Worse_From: Overeating, rich or greasy food; alcohol; emotional strain
Better_From: Light, regular meals; warmth to abdomen; gentle movement in open air
Notes_Sphere: Digestive–neuralgia remedy where gastric and liver symptoms are accompanied by neuralgic pains and long-standing dyspepsia

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, apathetic, feels weighed down; tendency to dwell gloomily on health and responsibilities; better when in motion or occupied
General_Themes: Acts on venous system, uterus and rectum; chronic pelvic and haemorrhoidal congestion; some use in melancholia associated with pelvic symptoms
Key_Local_Symptoms: Haemorrhoids with fullness, itching and occasional bleeding; pelvic heaviness and bearing-down sensation; dull sacral and lumbar backache; tendency to varicose veins and congestive headaches in low-spirited patients
Worse_From: Prolonged standing; constipation; mental worry and sedentary habits
Better_From: Gentle walking; lying down with legs elevated; regular soft stools
Notes_Sphere: Pelvic–venous remedy for low mood associated with haemorrhoids, pelvic congestion, varicosities and dull sacral backache

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, fearful about heart; emotional, easily weeps; discouraged from chronic heart weakness yet often mentally clear
General_Themes: Famous heart tonic; acts directly on myocardium and coronary circulation; heart failure, dilatation, valvular disease, angina and arrhythmias; also high or low blood pressure with weak heart
Key_Local_Symptoms: Oppression and soreness about heart with breathlessness on exertion; palpitation from least effort or emotion; pulse weak, irregular or intermittent; chest pain radiating to left arm or scapula; ankle oedema, cold extremities, cyanosis in advanced cases; insomnia from heart awareness
Worse_From: Exertion (climbing stairs, walking uphill); excitement; lying flat if heart is failing
Better_From: Rest; sitting propped up; fresh cool air; slow, gentle movement within capacity
Notes_Sphere: Cardio tonic for failing or overstrained hearts with weakness, dyspnoea and irregular pulse, especially in middle-aged or elderly patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Hysterical, changeable mood—laughing then crying; sensation as if something alive were moving in body; excitable, imaginative and emotional
General_Themes: Acts on uterus and blood; haemorrhages with dark, stringy clots; hysterical states; choreic movements; sometimes used in threatened abortion with dark clotted flow
Key_Local_Symptoms: Uterine bleeding of dark, almost black blood in long strings or clots; feeling as if something alive were moving or jumping in abdomen, uterus or other parts; sudden gushes of blood then long pauses; nosebleeds of dark, stringy blood; hysterical fits with laughing, weeping, singing or dancing
Worse_From: Motion and exertion during menses or pregnancy; emotional excitement; warm rooms
Better_From: Rest; cool fresh air; lying quietly; gentle pressure over uterus
Notes_Sphere: Haemorrhagic–hysterical remedy for dark, stringy-clotted uterine bleeding with peculiar “something alive moving inside” sensation and changeable moods

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless, anxious, fearful of death; suspicious, irritable; mental confusion in septic or toxic states; low, muttering delirium in severe cases
General_Themes: Rattlesnake venom; powerful haemorrhagic and septic remedy; septicaemia, jaundice, low platelet states, malignant or toxic conditions; affects blood, nerves and right-sided organs
Key_Local_Symptoms: Haemorrhages of dark, fluid blood from nose, mouth, uterus or bowels; yellow jaundice with haemorrhagic tendency; swollen, dark, bleeding gums; ecchymoses and purple spots on skin; right-sided throat and chest affections; profound prostration, trembling and cold, clammy sweat
Worse_From: Sepsis, alcohol, snakebite, low fevers; slightest movement; night
Better_From: Absolute rest; quiet, slightly warm room; gentle external warmth
Notes_Sphere: Haemorrhagic–septic remedy for dark, non-clotting bleeding, jaundice and profound prostration, often right-sided and in low, malignant states

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Extremely irritable, oversensitive to slightest touch; restless from burning pains and sudden urges to stool; anxious during skin eruptions
General_Themes: Powerful irritant of skin and mucous membranes; gushing diarrhoea, especially after eating or drinking; vesicular skin eruptions (esp. in bands like herpes zoster); mastitis and breast troubles
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sudden, noisy, gushing watery stools, shot out with force, often after smallest food or drink; constant urging as soon as anything is taken into stomach; intense burning and rawness at anus; vesicular, intensely itching and burning eruptions, often in linear or band-like distribution (e.g., zoster); right breast extremely sensitive—slight touch of nipple sends pain straight through to scapula
Worse_From: Eating or drinking; touch (especially nipples or eruptions); warmth of bed; washing
Better_From: Gentle cool applications; complete rest; fasting or very small sips of water initially
Notes_Sphere: Intestinal–skin remedy for explosive diarrhoea and intensely burning, band-like eruptions, as well as right-breast mastitis with radiating nipple pains

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, anxious, embarrassed by chronic urinary or genital discharge; mental state coloured by burning and frequency of urination
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes of urinary and respiratory tracts; chronic urethritis, cystitis, prostatitis; catarrhal laryngitis and chronic cough with throat irritation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning and smarting in urethra, worse at end of urination; frequent urging with scanty, sometimes blood-streaked urine; thick, mucous or purulent urethral discharge (post-gonorrhoeal or chronic catarrh); chronic laryngitis with constant need to clear throat and hawk up sticky mucus; tickling cough from laryngeal irritation
Worse_From: Cold, damp; sexual excess; alcohol and spices; long sitting
Better_From: Passing urine; warmth; bland diet; gentle walking instead of sitting
Notes_Sphere: Urinary–respiratory catarrh remedy for chronic urethritis/cystitis with burning and discharge, and chronic laryngeal irritation with sticky mucus

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Weary, apathetic, low from chronic digestive or urinary trouble; may be anxious about kidneys or bladder; children fretful with colic and worms
General_Themes: Remedy derived from watermelon; traditional use as diuretic and vermifuge; in homeopathy used for urinary irritation, gravel and intestinal worms in some cases
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dull aching or dragging in kidneys and bladder; frequent urging to urinate with burning, scanty or cloudy urine; gravel or small calculi with colicky pains radiating to groins; abdominal colic and flatulence in children sometimes with worms; general heaviness and drowsiness after meals
Worse_From: Cold drinks in excess; damp or chill; overindulgence in watery fruits; night
Better_From: Warmth; moderate intake of fluids; rest with knees drawn up; passing urine or flatus
Notes_Sphere: Urinary–bowel remedy for mild kidney/bladder irritation with gravel and colic, and occasional use in wormy or colicky children with much gas and heaviness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Children peevish and fretful from worm irritation; adults dull, listless and low from chronic digestive or prostate trouble
General_Themes: Pumpkin seeds; classic folk vermifuge; in homoeopathy used for tapeworm, roundworm and some prostatic or urinary issues with pelvic heaviness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Abdominal colic and rumbling with presence of worms; itching of nose and anus, disturbed sleep and grinding of teeth in children; heaviness and pressure in pelvis and perineum; urinary frequency and tenesmus in older men with prostate enlargement
Worse_From: Night (worms more active); sweets; heavy meals; long sitting (pelvic congestion)
Better_From: Passing worms or stool; light diet; gentle walking; warmth to abdomen
Notes_Sphere: Worm–pelvic remedy for intestinal parasites and some cases of prostate-related pelvic heaviness and urinary frequency

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed and irritable from chronic oesophageal or gastric pain; mental state dominated by difficulty swallowing and digesting
General_Themes: Bark used for ulcerative conditions of stomach and oesophagus; fissures at corners of mouth; considered in some “scirrhous” complaints; improves appetite and digestion in chronic sufferers
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning, constrictive pain in oesophagus and cardia region; difficulty swallowing solid food, feels it sticks; vomiting of food with pain behind sternum; fissures and painful cracks at corners of mouth; chronic gastritis with weight loss and debility
Worse_From: Eating solid or coarse food; cold drinks; emotional strain with hurried eating
Better_From: Small, frequent meals; warm bland food; sipping warm water
Notes_Sphere: Upper–GI remedy for burning, constrictive oesophageal and gastric pains, especially with corner-of-mouth fissures and weight loss

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Children irritable, crying and clingy from colicky diarrhoea; adults worried and low from chronic bowel issues
General_Themes: Acts chiefly on bowels in children; summer diarrhoea, sour or undigested stools with abdominal colic; sometimes urinary irritation as well
Key_Local_Symptoms: Frequent, sour-smelling, undigested stools in infants and children; colic with drawing up of legs and loud flatus; diarrhoea worse in hot weather and after fruit; child restless, sleepless and crying before stool; sometimes burning on urinating with concentrated urine
Worse_From: Summer heat; fruit and sweets; cold drinks; dentition
Better_From: Warmth to abdomen; bland, simple diet; small sips of tepid water; rest
Notes_Sphere: Paediatric–bowel remedy for hot-weather diarrhoea with sour stools, colic and irritability in infants and small children

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, restless, easily frightened; mental dullness after convulsions; oversensitive to external stimuli during prodrome
General_Themes: Copper salt with strong antispasmodic action; violent cramps and convulsions; choleraic collapse; spasms of respiratory and digestive tract
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent, cramping pains in abdomen, legs or hands with tendency to cramps in calves and feet; cholera-like diarrhoea and vomiting with coldness, blue face and spasms; spasmodic cough or asthma with cramp of chest and fingers; convulsions preceded by nausea or colic
Worse_From: Night; suppressed eruptions; fright; cold drinks in overheated state; vomiting and diarrhoea
Better_From: Warmth; firm pressure; hot drinks; reappearance of eruptions
Notes_Sphere: Spasmodic remedy for severe cramps, choleraic states and convulsions where Cuprum is indicated but with marked gastric and intestinal involvement

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Great anxiety and restlessness with fear of death; alternating collapse and spasms; mental anguish intense in acute attacks
General_Themes: Fusion of Cuprum’s spasms with Arsenicum’s collapse; violent cramps, vomiting and diarrhoea with extreme prostration; asthmatic and cardiac crises
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sudden violent vomiting and rice-water stools with agonising cramps in abdomen and extremities; blue, cold skin, small rapid pulse; spasmodic asthma with suffocative attacks and great anxiety; collapse states after severe gastro-intestinal irritation
Worse_From: Cold; night; eating doubtful food; fright or shock; exertion during weakness
Better_From: Warmth; hot drinks in sips; complete rest; being wrapped up
Notes_Sphere: Deep acute remedy for cholera-like collapse and spasmodic asthma with extreme anxiety, restlessness and violent cramping

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Intense, controlled type; emotions suppressed until they break out as cramps or spasms; fearful and anxious before attacks, exhausted after
General_Themes: Major antispasmodic remedy; acts on nerves and muscles; convulsions, cramps, whooping-cough, cholera, epilepsy and spasmodic dysmenorrhoea
Key_Local_Symptoms: Cramps in calves, hands and feet, fingers clenched; convulsions beginning in fingers and toes and spreading inward; spasmodic, suffocative cough with cyanosis and possible vomiting (whooping-cough); violent colic with cramps, relieved somewhat by cold drinks; aura of cramps or spasms from suppressed eruptions or emotions
Worse_From: Night; suppressed eruptions; after fright; during menses; from over-exertion
Better_From: Cold drinks (for some colics); firm pressure; reappearance of skin eruptions; rest after attack
Notes_Sphere: Core spasm/convulsion remedy where cramps begin in extremities, with blue face, great exhaustion and often history of suppression (eruptions or emotions)

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Fearful and anxious about breathing and paralysis; mental alertness with physical inability to move; dread of suffocation
General_Themes: Arrow poison; produces peripheral paralysis of voluntary muscles with preserved consciousness; used in states resembling myasthenia, bulbar paralysis or post-diphtheritic paralysis; affects respiration strongly
Key_Local_Symptoms: Progressive weakness of muscles with great difficulty moving limbs while mind stays clear; respiratory muscles weak, must sit up to breathe; choking and suffocation on attempting to swallow; reflexes diminished; may follow diphtheria or other infections
Worse_From: Exertion; attempting to swallow; lying flat; respiratory infections
Better_From: Sitting propped up; complete rest; cool, well-ventilated room
Notes_Sphere: Paralytic–respiratory remedy for conditions with great motor weakness and risk of respiratory failure, while mind is comparatively clear

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, irritable, sluggish; mental fog and poor concentration from chronic liver and digestive troubles
General_Themes: Turmeric; acts on liver, gall-bladder and digestion; sluggish liver, flatulence and right-sided abdominal discomfort; used in rheumatic or inflammatory tendencies with biliousness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Fullness and dull aching in right hypochondrium; bitter taste, coated tongue, poor appetite; bloating and flatulence after fatty or spicy food; yellowish skin tone in some cases; rheumatic aches worse in damp weather in bilious subjects
Worse_From: Fatty, fried or spicy food; alcohol; damp, cold weather; late-night eating
Better_From: Light, warm diet; bitters and warm drinks; moderate exercise; warmth
Notes_Sphere: Liver–digestive remedy for sluggish bilious states with right-sided discomfort, gas and rheumatic tendencies in chilly, lethargic patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Gloomy, remorseful, easily offended; feels guilty or self-reproaching; changeable mood, better in open air; dislikes company yet fears being alone
General_Themes: Acts on nervous system, stomach and female organs; migraines with visual aura; menstrual irregularities and anaemia; ailments from suppressed menses
Key_Local_Symptoms: Headaches with visual disturbances (flickering, zigzag lights) often before or during menses; vertigo with staggering and inclination to fall to one side; menses too scanty or suppressed with cramps and chilliness; frequent yawning, drowsiness, yet unrefreshing sleep; gastric disturbances with aversion to fatty food and butter
Worse_From: Before or during menses; fatty food; staying in warm rooms; evening
Better_From: Open, cool fresh air; gentle motion; eating light food; rest
Notes_Sphere: Migraine–menses remedy for remorseful, gloomy patients with visual aura headaches, chilliness and menstrual suppression or irregularity

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous, excitable, wakeful—especially children after over-stimulation; mind overactive but not anxious; infants wide-eyed and playful at night
General_Themes: Acts on nervous system; insomnia and nervous irritability in children and exhausted adults; “nervous excitement” from teething, growth spurts, study or emotional strain
Key_Local_Symptoms: Restless, wakeful children who want to play at night instead of sleep; baby or child sleeps little, is bright-eyed and chatty rather than cross; nervousness, fidgetiness and twitching after brain-work or excitement; adults feel used-up yet mentally stimulated with inability to sleep
Worse_From: Over-stimulation (teething pains, travel, visitors, new toys, study); evening and night; coffee or stimulants
Better_From: Quiet, dark room; soothing routine; gentle rocking or walking; daytime physical activity with regular schedule
Notes_Sphere: Nervous–insomnia remedy for over-stimulated, bright, playful children (and some adults) who can’t wind down to sleep after excitement or mental work

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless, anxious, confused; children may cry out, become drowsy, then convulse; mental state clouded in toxic or meningitic conditions
General_Themes: Acts on brain, meninges and GI tract; poisoning picture with vomiting, diarrhoea, collapse and convulsions; sometimes used in meningitis-like states in children
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sudden vomiting and diarrhoea with great prostration; rolling of head, staring eyes, twitching of facial muscles; convulsions with rigid limbs and clenched jaws, followed by deep sleep; pupils dilated, skin cold and clammy; neck stiffness and head retraction in meningitic states
Worse_From: Toxic exposures; night; overheating; bright light and noise during meningitic irritation
Better_From: Quiet, dark room; cool but not cold environment; head slightly raised; gentle, cool sponging
Notes_Sphere: Acute neuro–GI remedy corresponding to laburnum poisoning: vomiting, diarrhoea, collapse and convulsions, especially in children with meningitic signs

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, easily discouraged; mental fatigue from sexual excess or long-standing weakness; loss of confidence and drive
General_Themes: Mild tonic to nervous system and genito-urinary organs; sexual neurasthenia, impotence from exhaustion, pelvic weakness in both sexes; chronic fatigue with depressed mood
Key_Local_Symptoms: Loss of sexual power with cold genitals, poor erections or diminished desire; general debility after overwork or excess; dull lumbar backache and pelvic heaviness; in women, pelvic weakness and low libido with nervousness and insomnia
Worse_From: Sexual excess; prolonged stress; worry about performance; late nights
Better_From: Moderate exercise; rest; supportive relationships; warm environment
Notes_Sphere: Tonic–sexual remedy for nervous debility, mild depression and sexual weakness from overwork or excess, with accompanying lumbar and pelvic heaviness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Highly sensitive, irritable; extreme intolerance to pain; peculiar sensation that body or limbs are separated or scattered; strong cravings and aversions, often for tobacco
General_Themes: Acts on nerves, bones and periosteum; neuralgic and rheumatic pains; toothache; sometimes used for tobacco or other addiction states
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent tearing, shooting pains in limbs and bones, often wandering; toothache extending to ear and face, worse at night; feeling as if limbs were enlarged or separated from body; offensive foot sweat; desire to smoke, but tobacco aggravates; gastric disturbance with loud eructations
Worse_From: Night; cold air; tobacco; touch and motion; mental excitement
Better_From: Warmth; rest; gentle wrapping of affected part; quiet surroundings
Notes_Sphere: Neuralgic–addiction remedy with violent bone and nerve pains, peculiar “body disintegrated” sensations and aggravation from tobacco

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, fearful about heart; constant fear that heart will stop if he moves; slow thinking, sadness and apprehension
General_Themes: Powerful heart remedy; acts on myocardium and conduction; slow, weak or irregular pulse; heart failure with dropsy; valvular lesions; pulse and kidneys closely linked
Key_Local_Symptoms: Pulse slow, weak, sometimes intermittent; sensation as if heart would stop on slightest motion; cyanosis of lips and face; dyspnoea on exertion or lying flat; scanty, dark urine or almost suppressed; swelling of feet, ankles and lower limbs; faintness and sinking at stomach
Worse_From: Exertion; least motion; lying on left side; sitting up suddenly; cold weather
Better_From: Complete rest; sitting propped up; cool, fresh air; moderate warmth to extremities
Notes_Sphere: Key cardiac remedy for failing, slow or irregular hearts with great anxiety about heart action, scanty urine and oedema

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, restless during attacks; cannot keep still, must walk or straighten up; mental state dominated by colicky pain
General_Themes: Classic colic remedy; hepatic, biliary and intestinal colic; opposite modality to Colocynthis (better from bending backward instead of doubling up)
Key_Local_Symptoms: Severe twisting, boring or cramping pains in abdomen, radiating to back, chest or testes; colic better from standing erect, bending backward or walking about; colic worse from bending forward or lying; flatulence with rumbling; gallstone or renal colic with same modalities
Worse_From: Bending forward or double; lying down; eating; morning
Better_From: Standing or walking; stretching upright or bending backward; open air
Notes_Sphere: Colic remedy for biliary, intestinal or renal pains strongly improved by erect posture and bending backwards, worse by bending double (reverse of Colocynthis)

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, anxious and low from constant urinary discomfort; preoccupied with bladder and pelvic symptoms
General_Themes: Acts on urinary tract; catarrhal cystitis, urethritis and bladder irritation; offensive urine with mucus; some pelvic and prostate involvement
Key_Local_Symptoms: Frequent urging to urinate with burning or smarting in bladder and urethra; small quantities of cloudy, mucous or offensive urine; heaviness and fullness in pelvis and perineum; low backache from bladder irritation; worse at night and after cold exposure
Worse_From: Cold, damp; getting chilled; coffee, alcohol and spices; night
Better_From: Passing urine; warmth; bland fluids; gentle walking
Notes_Sphere: Urinary–catarrh remedy for chronic cystitis/urethritis with mucus, offensive urine and pelvic heaviness in chilly, easily irritated patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, restless or dull and stuporous; muttering, picks at bedclothes in septic states; children appear apathetic yet toxic
General_Themes: Nosode from diphtheria; malignant diphtheria-like conditions, septic sore throats, post-diphtheritic paralysis and low, adynamic states
Key_Local_Symptoms: Throat intensely swollen, dark and foul with thick, tenacious membrane; breath very offensive; prostration out of proportion to local signs; nosebleeds of dark blood; weak, rapid pulse; cold extremities, dusky skin; later paralysis of soft palate or limbs after diphtheria; great tendency to collapse
Worse_From: Night; slightest exertion; swallowing; toxic infections; low vitality
Better_From: Absolute rest; warm room; careful nourishment in small amounts; head elevated
Notes_Sphere: Septic–paralytic nosode for malignant diphtheria pictures and lingering post-diphtheritic paralysis with profound prostration and foul throat

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Extremely irritable and sleepless from unbearable itching; mental state oversensitive, almost frantic at night
General_Themes: Remarkable itching remedy; intense pruritus without or before eruption; liver and biliary involvement; right-sided complaints; obstinate constipation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense itching of skin, especially at night, often without visible eruption; itching worse on shoulders, back and extremities; cannot sleep or keep still; right-sided neuralgic pains and hepatic soreness; constipation with dry, hard stools and much straining; mouth and tongue may feel hot and burning
Worse_From: Night, especially after midnight; scratching; right side; warm bed
Better_From: Cool sponging; gentle rubbing (without scratching); open air; stool (for some abdominal symptoms)
Notes_Sphere: Itch remedy for violent nocturnal pruritus (often with little or no rash), right-sided liver symptoms and obstinate constipation

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless, anxious, screaming children; mental state confused, alternating stupor and irritability in meningitic or encephalitic conditions
General_Themes: Colorado potato beetle; acts on brain and meninges; high fever, meningitis, convulsions in children; hyperaesthesia of senses
Key_Local_Symptoms: High fever with boring of head into pillow, shrill cries and rolling of head; neck stiffness, head retracted; pupils unequal or dilated; twitching of facial muscles and limbs; vomiting, especially on sitting up; convulsions following brain irritation or meningitis; extreme sensitivity to light and noise
Worse_From: Noise, light, motion; sitting up; touch of head or neck
Better_From: Quiet, dark room; lying with head slightly raised; cool applications to head
Notes_Sphere: Acute child–brain remedy for meningitis-like states with shrill cries, head rolling, neck retraction and convulsions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Suspicious, jealous, feels persecuted; may be obstinate and gloomy; mental state aggravated at night; feels worse on confiding in others
General_Themes: Major spasmodic cough and whooping-cough remedy; acts on larynx and respiratory nerves; also phthisical laryngitis and early tuberculosis
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent, spasmodic, deep cough, coming in rapid, successive paroxysms until breath is almost lost; cough worse after midnight (esp. 2–3 a.m.), on lying down or talking; must hold chest or sides with hands; tendency to retching or vomiting after coughing; hoarseness and raw, scraped feeling in larynx; cough as soon as head touches pillow
Worse_From: After midnight (2–3 a.m.); lying down; talking; laughing; singing; drinking cold liquids
Better_From: Sitting up; going out into cool, fresh air; holding chest; warm drinks between attacks
Notes_Sphere: Prime whooping-cough/pertussis remedy for rapid, suffocative cough paroxysms after midnight with vomiting and marked laryngeal irritation

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless, anxious, confused; delirious states with visual illusions and loquacity; great dryness and desire to be left alone in toxic or febrile conditions
General_Themes: Atropine-like action on nervous system, eyes and mucous membranes; intense dryness of mouth, throat and skin; dilated pupils, disturbed vision and vertigo; seasickness and motion sickness; spasmodic cough and whooping-cough with dryness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dry, hacking, spasmodic cough with almost no expectoration; extreme dryness of mouth and throat with difficulty swallowing; dilated pupils and blurred or double vision; vertigo and nausea from motion, especially riding or at sea; flushed face with hot, dry skin in fevers
Worse_From: Motion (riding, sea travel); bright light; mental excitement; heat of room
Better_From: Rest in dark, quiet, cool room; absolute stillness; cool drinks in small sips
Notes_Sphere: Neuro–respiratory remedy for dry, spasmodic coughs and motion sickness with atropine-like dryness, dilated pupils and delirium

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, obstinate, easily angered; feels worse from any chill or damp exposure; complaints often linked to getting chilled while hot
General_Themes: Acts on skin, mucous membranes and rheumatic tissues; effects of cold, damp weather or getting wet when overheated; catarrhs, rheumatism, diarrhoea and skin eruptions from such exposure
Key_Local_Symptoms: Rheumatic pains shifting, worse cold damp and in autumn; stiffness of neck and back after getting chilled; acute coryza or bronchitis after sitting on cold/damp ground; diarrhoea or abdominal colic from cold wet; warty excrescences on skin; eruptions that come on in cold damp seasons and disappear in summer
Worse_From: Cold, damp, foggy weather; getting wet while warm; sudden chill; lying on cold ground
Better_From: Dry, warm weather; warmth of bed; moving about in a warm room
Notes_Sphere: Key “cold–damp” remedy for catarrh, rheumatism and skin eruptions brought on or worse from chilly, wet conditions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally dull, low and tired; feels poisoned or septic; anxious about serious illness but too exhausted to react strongly
General_Themes: Blood and lymph purifier; septic states, slow-healing wounds, boils, abscesses, bites and stings; chronic low-grade infections and glandular involvement
Key_Local_Symptoms: Offensive discharges from ulcers, abscesses or wounds; red, swollen margins around injuries; tendency to recurrent boils and carbuncles; septic sore throat or mouth with foul breath; general aching and prostration as if from influenza or septicaemia
Worse_From: Sepsis; neglected wounds; physical overstrain lowering resistance
Better_From: Proper drainage and cleansing of wounds; fresh air; adequate fluids; gentle movement as strength returns
Notes_Sphere: Septic–immune remedy supporting the system in slow-healing septic conditions, recurrent boils and foul discharges with marked tiredness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Fearful, anxious, especially about death; melancholic, feels forsaken; strong internal chilliness and dread of cold drinks
General_Themes: Brazilian coral-snake venom; haemorrhagic tendency with black, fluid blood; right-sided affections; catarrh of ears, nose and chest; great chilliness with desire for warm drinks, intolerance of cold ones
Key_Local_Symptoms: Black, fluid, sometimes offensive haemorrhages (nose, lungs, uterus); sensation as if cold water were poured inside, especially in chest or head; chronic ear discharge, blackish or offensive; right-sided pneumonia or pleurisy with extreme chilliness; chronic bronchial catarrh with thick, dark mucus
Worse_From: Cold drinks; cold air; right-sided complaints; storms and damp
Better_From: Warm drinks; warm room; wrapping up head and chest
Notes_Sphere: Haemorrhagic–chilly remedy with black, fluid blood, right-sided catarrhal and chest affections and peculiar “cold water internally” sensations

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, frightened by violence of symptoms; dull and apathetic in collapse states; children may be restless then sink into stupor
General_Themes: Acts on serous membranes and intestines; violent gushing diarrhoea and vomiting (choleraic states); effusions into pleura, peritoneum and brain; hydrocephalus-like conditions
Key_Local_Symptoms: Explosive, gushing, watery stools shot out with force, often with vomiting; great prostration, cold sweat and faintness after evacuations; “rice-water” or watery, green stools; serous effusions with dullness, drowsiness, rolling of head (hydrocephalic or meningitic states); oedema and ascites from heart or liver disease
Worse_From: Smallest food or drink; night; hot weather; suppressed eruptions
Better_From: Absolute rest; small sips of tepid water; cool, well-ventilated room; gentle external warmth to extremities
Notes_Sphere: Intestinal–serous remedy for cholera-like, gushing diarrhoea with collapse and for serous effusions (hydrocephalus, ascites, pleural effusions)

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, tired, mentally foggy from chronic digestive or hepatic issues; may be anxious about health yet sluggish to act
General_Themes: Indian gooseberry; tonic to liver, digestion and blood; acidity, gastritis and sluggish bowels in anaemic or debilitated patients
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sour belching and heartburn; heaviness and fullness in epigastrium after eating; tendency to constipation with dry stools or alternating loose motions; coated tongue, bad taste, low appetite; general weakness and mild anaemia with dull headaches
Worse_From: Overeating; sour, spicy or fried food; late-night meals
Better_From: Light, simple diet; warm drinks; regular meals; gentle exercise
Notes_Sphere: Digestive–liver tonic remedy for hyperacidity, sluggish bowels and mild anaemia in tired, run-down patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, restless, easily fatigued; oversensitive and irritable in allergic or asthmatic states; children fretful and clingy
General_Themes: Related to eosinophilic and allergic conditions; asthma, hay fever, parasitic and skin complaints with high eosinophil tendency
Key_Local_Symptoms: Paroxysmal wheezing and tightness of chest; allergic rhinitis with violent sneezing and watery discharge; itching eruptions or urticaria in atopic subjects; worm infestations with itching of nose and anus; marked weakness after attacks
Worse_From: Night; allergens (dust, pollen, animals); exertion; warm, stuffy rooms
Better_From: Cool, fresh air; removal of allergens; gentle upright posture; slow breathing
Notes_Sphere: Allergy–asthma remedy for eosinophilic tendencies: wheeze, hay fever and itchy eruptions, often with parasitic or atopic background

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, gloomy and weary from constant urinary or rheumatic discomfort; easily discouraged, especially by chronic gravel trouble
General_Themes: Uric-acid and gravel remedy; acts on kidneys, bladder and joints; lithaemic states, gravel and tendency to calculi; gouty dyspepsia
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning, cutting pains in kidneys and along ureters; urine scanty, high-coloured, depositing copious brick-dust sediment; gravel or small stones passed with sharp pains; acid dyspepsia with heartburn and sour eructations in gouty subjects; joint pains associated with uric-acid excess
Worse_From: Cold, damp; excess meat or rich food; acids and alcohol; exertion during renal colic
Better_From: Warmth; copious bland fluids; avoidance of rich/acidic foods; rest
Notes_Sphere: Renal–uric-acid remedy for gravel and gouty states with brick-dust urine, renal colic and acid dyspepsia

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, peevish, easily overtaxed; headaches from mental or physical exertion or change of routine (“Sunday” or holiday headaches)
General_Themes: Headache remedy; effects of overwork, shopping, travelling or unusual exertion; sensitive to heat of sun; often one-sided, especially left; tendency to aphthous mouth during attacks
Key_Local_Symptoms: Headache beginning in occiput and extending to temples or eyes, often left-sided; brought on by unusual exertion, shopping, long walks, excitement or “going out” days; mouth and lips may show small aphthous ulcers; great fatigue and need to lie down; head feels full and heavy
Worse_From: Overexertion; going into town, shopping, company; heat of sun; late hours
Better_From: Rest in quiet, dark room; lying down; cool applications; regular, moderate routine
Notes_Sphere: Exertion–headache remedy for “day out” or overwork headaches, often left-sided with aphthous mouth and marked fatigue

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, fretful from constant urging to urinate; children nervous and restless at night from bladder discomfort; mental state otherwise fairly clear
General_Themes: Bladder and urethra remedy; chronic irritation with fullness and pain, often without major pathology; enuresis in children; dull kidney and bladder pains
Key_Local_Symptoms: Constant sensation of fullness in bladder with desire to urinate, but only small amounts passed; dull, aching pain in bladder, worse at end of urination; sharp, cutting or burning in urethra; enuresis of children, especially at night or during dreams; cloudy urine with sometimes phosphatic deposits
Worse_From: Night; lying down; after urinating (end of stream); cold weather
Better_From: Daytime activity; frequent but not forced urination; warmth; avoiding tea/coffee and irritants
Notes_Sphere: Bladder–enuresis remedy for persistent urge and bladder pain (especially at end of urination) with nocturnal wetting in children and irritability from urinary discomfort

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious and low after loss of blood; feels weak, tremulous and easily frightened; mind preoccupied with danger of further bleeding
General_Themes: Haemorrhagic remedy acting on mucous membranes of lungs, stomach and bowels; bright, active bleeding with marked post-haemorrhagic weakness; useful around haemoptysis, haematemesis and haemorrhoids when other remedies only partially cover
Key_Local_Symptoms: Bright-red bleeding from lungs, stomach or rectum, often in repeated small attacks; burning or raw feeling in chest or epigastrium with cough; haemorrhoids that bleed easily with soreness and tenesmus; great prostration, faintness and coldness after loss of blood
Worse_From: Exertion; talking or coughing; standing upright; warm, close rooms
Better_From: Complete rest; lying with head and chest raised; cool fresh air; cold applications to bleeding parts
Notes_Sphere: Haemorrhage–weakness remedy for bright, active bleeding from chest or GI tract with disproportionate exhaustion and burning soreness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Very anxious, excitable and restless during haemorrhages; fears something serious will happen; mental state dominated by gushes of blood on movement
General_Themes: Strong uterine and vesical haemorrhage remedy; bright-red bleeding in spurts, renewed by slightest motion or exertion; often postpartum, post-miscarriage or from fibroids; also haematuria with bladder irritation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Bright-red, arterial uterine bleeding in gushes, starting or increasing with least movement, cough or strain; painful urging to urinate with blood in urine; haemorrhage after miscarriage or childbirth; sometimes nosebleeds with similar bright spurting blood; sense of pelvic weight and soreness
Worse_From: Least motion or exertion; pregnancy and puerperium; straining or lifting; coughing
Better_From: Perfect rest, lying flat and still; cold applications over pelvis; cool room
Notes_Sphere: Uterine–bladder haemorrhage remedy for bright, spurting blood that returns from slightest motion, often in postpartum or fibroid cases

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Discouraged, irritable and self-conscious from chronic cough and catarrh; tired of constant hawking and expectoration
General_Themes: Yerba santa; deep respiratory catarrh remedy; chronic bronchitis, asthma and phthisical cough with tough mucus; also chronic nasal and tracheal catarrh, especially in old “smoker’s” chests
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronic cough with abundant, thick, tenacious mucus that is difficult to raise at first, then comes freely; wheezing and tightness of chest, worse damp cold; long-standing bronchial catarrh with rattling and offensive expectoration; dry mouth with coated tongue and foul breath in chest cases
Worse_From: Damp, foggy or cold weather; lying down at night; early morning on waking; tobacco smoke
Better_From: Dry, warm air; expectoration of mucus; slow deep breathing; gentle outdoor exercise in suitable climate
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory–catarrh remedy for old, tough, bronchial mucus and asthmatic tendencies, especially in long-standing “smoker’s cough” and chronic bronchitis

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, gloomy, feels dragged down by pelvic and urinary discomfort; mental state coloured by constant perineal and genital pains
General_Themes: Acts on prostate, urethra and pelvic organs; prostatic enlargement with dribbling and painful perineum; sexual weakness with dragging pains; ovarian and uterine neuralgias
Key_Local_Symptoms: Deep aching and soreness in perineum extending to bladder and rectum; frequent urging to urinate with burning, dribbling and sense of fullness in prostate region; shooting pains from ovaries into thighs or sacrum; weakness of sexual organs with aching in testes or ovaries
Worse_From: Sitting long, particularly on hard seat; cold and damp; sexual excess or excitement
Better_From: Standing or lying with thighs slightly flexed; warm applications to pelvis; gentle walking
Notes_Sphere: Pelvic–urinary remedy for prostatic and genital aching, perineal soreness and frequent urging to urinate, often in middle-aged or older men or in women with ovarian neuralgia

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous, over-excited yet exhausted; children lively and talkative at bedtime, cannot settle; nightmares and restless sleep cause daytime irritability
General_Themes: Gentle nervine and soporific; sleeplessness and night terrors in children; nervous excitement from teething, growth or emotional strain; some neuralgic and rheumatic pains in sensitive subjects
Key_Local_Symptoms: Insomnia with inability to fall asleep though tired, especially in children; frequent waking with crying or vivid dreams; night terrors with screaming and clinginess; mild neuralgic pains in head or face with nervousness; enuresis in nervous, light-sleeping children
Worse_From: Over-stimulation (visitors, screen time, excitement); evening and early night; worry or anticipation
Better_From: Calm, regular bedtime routine; dark, quiet room; gentle rocking or soothing contact; daytime outdoor play
Notes_Sphere: Paediatric–nervous remedy for over-excited, overtired kids with difficulty falling asleep, night terrors and mild neuralgias

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally dull, heavy and indifferent during fevers; feels “poisoned” or stupefied; concentration poor, wants to lie still
General_Themes: Powerful antiseptic and anti-catarrhal remedy; malarial or septic fevers with marked chilliness and foul discharges; influenza, bronchitis and sinusitis with thick fetid mucus; tendency to profuse sweats
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chilliness with aching in limbs and back, followed by heat with flushed face and profuse, sometimes offensive perspiration; thick, foul, greenish catarrh from nose, sinuses or bronchi; heavy, oppressed chest with difficult breathing; bad taste in mouth and foul breath during fevers
Worse_From: Damp, cold weather; night air; lying in cold draughts; neglect of hygiene
Better_From: Dry, warm atmosphere; moderate perspiration; warm drinks; rest in bed
Notes_Sphere: Antiseptic–fever remedy for malarial or septic influenza-like states with foul catarrh, chilliness and heavy, oppressed chest

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Sensitive and self-conscious about appearance, especially facial eruptions; depressed and irritable from long-standing acne
General_Themes: Acts chiefly on skin and face; acne, papules and pustules of cheeks, forehead and chin, especially in adolescents and young adults; some toothache and face neuralgia
Key_Local_Symptoms: Acne and pustular eruptions mostly on cheeks and forehead, painful to touch; pimples often worse around menses or from rich food; face feels hot and tense; occasionally tearing facial pains or toothache with facial congestion; tendency to pick at lesions
Worse_From: Sweets and rich, greasy food; puberty and menstrual period; late nights; emotional excitement
Better_From: Fresh air; light, simple diet; gentle cleansing of skin; regular sleep
Notes_Sphere: Skin–cosmetic remedy for tender, congested facial acne in self-conscious youth, especially when diet and menses aggravate

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, gloomy and bilious; mental dullness and headache from liver congestion; feels heavy, overburdened and apathetic
General_Themes: Marked liver and portal remedy; sluggish liver with jaundice, bilious headaches and constipation; gall-bladder disturbance with right-sided pains
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dull aching or dragging in right hypochondrium with sense of fullness; bilious headaches with nausea and bitter taste; yellowish skin or sclera in some cases; constipation with pale or clay-coloured stools; heaviness and soreness in back and shoulders from hepatic congestion
Worse_From: Fatty, fried or rich foods; alcohol; late meals; prolonged sitting
Better_From: Light, easily digested food; moderate walking; warmth to right upper abdomen
