Worse_From: During and after eating; lying on right side; menstruation; heat of sun
Better_From: Lying on left side; warm room in general but cool applications to head; gentle motion
Notes_Sphere: Liver–pelvic remedy for chronic constipation, hepatic congestion and uterine troubles with reserved, dutiful temperament

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Sensitive, nervous, easily exhausted; better from company and reassurance; may be anxious about health yet quickly relieved when pains ease
General_Themes: Great antispasmodic; neuralgic and cramping pains in nerves and muscles; ‘homeopathic aspirin’ pattern of darting, shooting pains
Key_Local_Symptoms: Cramping pains in abdomen, uterus or limbs, better heat and firm pressure; facial or trigeminal neuralgia, darting like lightning; menstrual cramps with doubling-up
Worse_From: Cold, especially cold air or drinks; touch; night; motion during colic
Better_From: Dry heat (hot water bottle, hot drink); firm pressure; bending double
Notes_Sphere: Nerve–spasm remedy for neuralgias and cramping pains that are dramatically better from heat and pressure

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, gloomy, easily offended; mental dullness with heaviness; dislikes conversation when not feeling well
General_Themes: Acts on liver, bile passages and mucous membranes; bilious states with vertigo and weakness; tendency to catarrhal and rheumatic complaints
Key_Local_Symptoms: Bilious headaches with nausea; bitter taste; loose, bilious stools; aching in limbs and back as if bruised; vertigo on rising or walking
Worse_From: Damp cold weather; morning; motion; rich or fatty foods
Better_From: Warmth; rest; gentle motion after first moving
Notes_Sphere: Liver–bilious remedy for headaches, vertigo and loose stools in sluggish, irritable patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious about heart; feels any chest sensation as serious; restless, low-spirited with fear something will happen
General_Themes: Strong affinity for heart and chest; functional cardiac disorders, especially left-sided; rheumatic involvement of heart and large joints
Key_Local_Symptoms: Palpitations with oppression of left chest; aching, sore feeling about heart, sometimes extending to left arm; rheumatic pains shifting between heart region and extremities
Worse_From: Exertion; lying on left side; emotional excitement; damp, chilly weather
Better_From: Rest; lying on right side; warmth; calm surroundings
Notes_Sphere: Heart–rheumatic remedy for functional palpitations and chest oppression with associated rheumatic pains

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Chronic skin states and ill effects after vaccination or suppression of eruptions.
General_Themes: Irritable, anxious, may feel never well since a vaccine or since a skin eruption was driven in.
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dry, rough, fissured skin of hands and feet, chronic eczema, blisters, boils, lingering headaches or fatigue after vaccination.
Worse_From: Warmth, gentle local applications, allowing eruptions to express.
Better_From: After vaccination, suppression of eruptions, cold damp weather, washing or irritation of skin.
Notes_Sphere: Often considered when there is a history of vaccination followed by chronic skin or fatigue complaints.

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Extreme fear states with burning or icy sensations and heart symptoms.
General_Themes: Intense fear of insanity or evil influences, religious terror, feels pursued or haunted, oversensitive to impressions.
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning or icy cold along spine or in chest, violent palpitations, chest oppression, neuralgic burning pains, twitching or spasms.
Worse_From: Rest, reassurance, gentle warmth, sometimes fresh air.
Better_From: Emotional excitement, religious overstimulation, strong music, night, being alone.
Notes_Sphere: Used in very intense, fearful, almost haunted states with marked cardiac or nervous symptoms.

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Bone and periosteal pains and catarrhal hoarseness, better from motion and pressure.
General_Themes: Low, discouraged, oversensitive to suffering, worn out by chronic pain.
Key_Local_Symptoms: Deep sore drawing pains in bones and periosteum, rheumatic or arthritic complaints, chronic laryngitis and hoarseness, cough with painful larynx, worse in damp raw weather.
Worse_From: Continued gentle motion, walking about, firm pressure, warm applications.
Better_From: Rest, lying down on affected side, cold damp weather, changes of weather.
Notes_Sphere: Useful where chronic hoarseness coexists with bone or heel pains that improve when the patient keeps moving.

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Venous and pelvic congestion with uterine or cardiac pains, often left sided.
General_Themes: Irritable, heavy, easily exhausted, worries about heart or uterine disease.
Key_Local_Symptoms: Uterine bleeding or fibroid type flooding, sharp left ovarian pains, varicose veins and hemorrhoids, cardiac pains radiating down left arm, heaviness in chest.
Worse_From: Rest, lying quietly, local pressure or support to veins, cool applications.
Better_From: Exertion, standing, climbing, heat of room, heavy menses or pelvic congestion.
Notes_Sphere: Thought of in some traditions for fibroid bleeding and combined pelvic and heart or vein complaints.

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Deep sycotic miasm remedy with extremes of behavior and strong genito–urinary history.
General_Themes: Restless, impulsive, extremes of mood, fear of going insane, strong or precocious sexuality, poor memory for names and words, loves the night and hates routine.
Key_Local_Symptoms: History of gonorrhea or warts, recurrent urethral discharges, cystitis, prostatitis, asthma and eczema on sycotic background, lumbar weakness, early joint and heart problems, craving for ice and green unripe fruits, sleeps on abdomen or in knee–chest position.
Worse_From: Seashore or sea air, warm damp climate, lying on abdomen, bending forward, night time.
Better_From: Damp cold, daytime, sun or heat of day, exertion, suppression of discharges, overindulgence.
Notes_Sphere: Key nosode in cases with gonorrheal or wart history, extremes of behavior, strong cravings for cold and for fruit.

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Burning stinging skin eruptions and urticaria, often linked to sea water or jellyfish like reactions.
General_Themes: Irritable from itching and burning, distressed by heat and clothing, restless from skin discomfort.
Key_Local_Symptoms: Acute urticaria with burning stinging wheals, prickly heat and sun rashes, skin feels burned by jellyfish, edema or puffiness around eruptions.
Worse_From: Cold applications, cool bathing if not causative, fresh cool air, rest.
Better_From: Heat, sun, warm rooms, after sea bathing, contact with marine life, scratching or tight clothing.
Notes_Sphere: Used as an acute aid for jellyfish stings, sun or heat rashes, and intense burning stinging urticaria pictures.

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dry irritated mucous membranes with catarrh or constipation on a honey–salt theme.
General_Themes: Irritable and discouraged from chronic discomfort, feels sluggish and heavy.
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dryness and irritation of throat and upper airways, sticky catarrh, chronic constipation with hard dry stools and straining, anal soreness or fissure tendency, sluggish digestion with bloating.
Worse_From: Warm drinks, gentle moisture, regular bowel routine, mild movement.
Better_From: Dry cold air, irregular meals, overuse of sweets or heavy foods, prolonged sitting or straining at stool.
Notes_Sphere: Less common remedy, considered when throat irritation and chronic dry constipation occur together.

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Violent congestive headaches and flushings relieved by nosebleed or other bleeding.
General_Themes: Irritable, excitable, restless, fears apoplexy, feels head will burst, children may be wild during attacks.
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense congestive headaches with red hot face and throbbing carotids, nosebleed brings relief, tendency to brain hyperemia, headaches around menses or from sun or heat.
Worse_From: Epistaxis or any bleeding, cool open air, lying quietly in the dark, cold applications to head.
Better_From: Heat, sun, hot rooms, emotional excitement, before or during menses, suppression of nosebleed.
Notes_Sphere: Frequently used for red hot congestive headaches where a nosebleed markedly relieves the pain.

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Twisting griping abdominal pains with diarrhea or dysentery like stools.
General_Themes: Restless from pain, anxious about abdominal symptoms, wants quick relief.
Key_Local_Symptoms: Colicky twisting pains around the navel, gurgling and rumbling with loose offensive stools or mucus, summer or food related diarrheas, wandering rheumatic or neuralgic pains in limbs and back.
Worse_From: Warmth to abdomen, bending forward, passing stool or gas.
Better_From: Cold drinks, fruit or dietary indiscretions, damp exposure, jarring motion of abdomen.
Notes_Sphere: Used for acute colicky diarrheal states and sometimes in rheumatic or neuralgic patterns with similar twisting pains.

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Acute digestive upset with gas, colic and nausea resembling peppermint disturbances.
General_Themes: Irritable and impatient in pain, oversensitive to abdominal cramps, may feel faint with nausea.
Key_Local_Symptoms: Acute colicky abdominal pains with flatulence and distension, nausea or motion sickness, gastric upset from dietary excess, chilliness with digestive disturbance.
Worse_From: Warmth to abdomen, passing gas or stool, sipping warm teas, gentle walking.
Better_From: Overeating, rich or fatty foods, cold drinks, travel or motion, exposure of abdomen to cold air.
Notes_Sphere: Primarily an acute supportive digestive remedy for colic, gas and nausea rather than a deep constitutional medicine.

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous and fidgety; oversensitive to pain and odors; mental fatigue from study or reading
General_Themes: Neuralgic and spasmodic complaints; flatulent dyspepsia with cramping colic; chilliness with internal heat
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sharp shooting facial and head pains; frontal or sinus headaches with tight band feeling; bloated gassy stomach with griping round navel; spasmodic dry cough or asthma with chest constriction
Worse_From: Cold air and drafts; uncovering; mental exertion; after eating; at night
Better_From: Warmth; rest; firm pressure on painful parts; passing gas or eructations; warm drinks
Notes_Sphere: Neuralgic headaches from gastric disturbance; flatulent colic; spasmodic respiratory complaints

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dull and sluggish; apathetic yet easily irritated when disturbed; mental effort feels burdensome
General_Themes: Marked chilliness with sensation of fulness and tension; periodic complaints where chill predominates; cramping and twitching of muscles
Key_Local_Symptoms: Bursting frontal and occipital headaches with icy cold hands and feet; pressure at root of nose and temples; sinking and cramping in stomach and abdomen; stiffness and tension in neck and back
Worse_From: Cold and damp; motion; mental exertion; during chill stage; lying with head low
Better_From: Warm applications; wrapping up; rest; head high on pillows
Notes_Sphere: Headaches and intermittent fevers with great coldness; congestive head symptoms with tense, bursting sensations

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Excitable and overtalkative; anxious from sense of suffocation; restless and fearful at night
General_Themes: Spasmodic and paroxysmal tendency; violent respiratory attacks leaving great exhaustion; nervous oversensitivity
Key_Local_Symptoms: Whooping-cough-like paroxysms with long suffocative spells and little expectoration; laryngeal spasms with inability to exhale; asthma and dyspnoea worse at night or lying; chest feels constricted and cold
Worse_From: Night; lying down; talking; cold air or drinks; emotional excitement
Better_From: Sitting up; cool open air when not too cold; free expectoration or vomiting of mucus
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory sphere; whooping cough, asthma and nocturnal laryngeal spasm with suffocative attacks and great prostration

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, suspicious, oversensitive but sluggish; slow comprehension and weak memory; anxious and restless at night
General_Themes: General weakness with trembling; profuse offensive sweat that does not relieve; glandular enlargement; marked tendency to ulceration of mucous membranes and skin
Key_Local_Symptoms: Spongy bleeding gums with metallic taste and copious saliva; offensive ulcerations of mouth and throat; dysentery or alternating diarrhoea with intense tenesmus; bone and joint pains worse at night; thick offensive catarrh of nose or throat
Worse_From: Night; warmth of bed; extremes of heat or cold; damp weather and changes; sweating; lying on right side
Better_From: Rest in moderate temperature; gentle motion; open air when not damp
Notes_Sphere: Chronic suppurative and ulcerative conditions of mouth, throat, intestines and glands; syphilitic and catarrhal states with offensive secretions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Intense anxiety and irritability from violent pains; restless, fearful and oversensitive
General_Themes: Rapid destructive inflammation of mucous membranes; burning pains with great prostration; severe tenesmus of rectum and bladder
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dysentery with almost constant urging, scanty bloody mucus and intense burning in rectum; cutting and burning in bladder before, during and after scanty urination; mouth and throat raw, intensely painful and ulcerated with salivation
Worse_From: Small quantities of food or drink; touch; movement; night; cold damp; during stool or urination
Better_From: Rest; warmth; small sips of cool drink for burning mouth and throat
Notes_Sphere: Acute destructive inflammations of gastro-intestinal and urinary tracts; dysentery and cystitis with violent tenesmus and burning

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Stupefied, apathetic yet anxious; low-spirited from intense weakness; delirium or muttering at night
General_Themes: Sudden profound prostration; septic and haemorrhagic tendency; rapid pulse and collapse; dusky or cyanotic appearance
Key_Local_Symptoms: Malignant sore throat or diphtheritic membranes extending to nose and larynx with great fetor and difficult swallowing; neck glands greatly swollen; dark fluid bleeding from nose, mouth or bowels; albuminous or bloody urine
Worse_From: Least exertion; swallowing; night; warm close room; septic surroundings
Better_From: Cold drinks held in mouth; absolute rest
Notes_Sphere: Fulminant septic states, especially malignant diphtheria, scarlet or haemorrhagic conditions with extreme prostration and dark offensive discharges

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Peevish, fretful child; wants to be carried but rejects things; sluggish, dull and apathetic during illness
General_Themes: Glandular remedy with enlarged cervical and mesenteric glands; lingering catarrhal states; gouty or rheumatic tendency
Key_Local_Symptoms: Green slimy or watery stools, often painless, especially in teething or scrofulous children; abdomen distended with gurgling; chronic middle-ear catarrh with impaired hearing and Eustachian blockage; nasal catarrh with thick bland discharge
Worse_From: Damp cold weather; night; during dentition; after rich or fatty food; cold drinks
Better_From: Dry warm climate; moderate warmth; gentle motion; after stool or freer discharge
Notes_Sphere: Children with glandular enlargements and green diarrhoea; catarrhal deafness; sluggish glandular and rheumatic conditions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable and hurried; restless and dissatisfied; oversensitive to heat and noise
General_Themes: Right-sided throat and gland remedy; yellow exudations; infiltration and enlargement of glands in scrofulous or syphilitic constitutions
Key_Local_Symptoms: Right-sided tonsillitis or diphtheria with yellow coating and swelling; constant need to swallow with lump sensation; cervical glands swollen and tender on right side; thick yellow post-nasal discharge; tongue flabby with yellow coating at base
Worse_From: Warm room; swallowing; night; sudden weather changes; extremes of temperature
Better_From: Open cool air; rest; moderate, even temperature
Notes_Sphere: Right tonsil and cervical gland affections with yellow exudate; syphilitic or scrofulous throat and glandular disorders

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Gloomy, dissatisfied and fault-finding; mental dullness during throat complaints
General_Themes: Chronic left-sided throat and gland conditions with tendency to induration and ulceration; syphilitic taint; worse from warmth and at night
Key_Local_Symptoms: Left-sided tonsillitis with dark red or bluish swelling and deep ulceration; chronic enlarged tonsils that nearly meet; burning sore throat extending to ears; cervical glands hard, knotted and tender; offensive saliva and breath
Worse_From: Swallowing, especially when throat is empty; warm room; night; damp weather
Better_From: Open cool air; eating or cold drinks soothing the throat
Notes_Sphere: Left-sided throat and tonsillar disease on syphilitic background; chronic cervical gland enlargement

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed and anxious from cardiac and respiratory distress; irritable and restless; fearful when dyspnoea comes on
General_Themes: Dropsical states with serous effusion; cardiac and renal disease; tendency to sudden watery diarrhoea with great weakness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Profuse watery morning diarrhoea, gushing and exhausting; swelling of feet, legs and face with pitting oedema; oppression of chest with need to sit up; hydrothorax or ascites with difficult breathing; urine scanty, albuminous or loaded with sediment
Worse_From: Lying down; night; wet weather; exertion; after stool or loss of fluids
Better_From: Sitting up; cool fresh air; gradual evacuation of fluids, though weakness remains
Notes_Sphere: Dropsies of cardiac or renal origin with serous effusions into chest or abdomen and watery diarrhoea; circulatory and renal sphere with marked debility

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Great exhaustion and drowsiness; mental confusion with dull heavy head; feels strangely conscious of nose as if it were double; low vitality with tendency to drift into sleep
General_Themes: Marked prostration with drowsiness; affections of muscular fibres of stomach, intestines and bladder; inflammatory dryness and ulceration of mouth and throat; menstrual suppression with breast pains and swelling
Key_Local_Symptoms: Bandlike pressure across forehead with vertigo going down stairs; nostrils sore and sensitive with odd sensation as if two noses; great dryness of mouth and throat with heavy numb tongue; burning blisters on tongue, lips and cheeks; ulcers of palate, tonsils and pharynx; scanty or suppressed menses with painful swollen breasts
Worse_From: Going down stairs; exertion when exhausted; menstrual congestion or suppression; local irritation of inflamed mouth and throat
Better_From: Rest and quiet; lying still; sipping cool or tepid drinks that moisten and soothe burning mouth and throat
Notes_Sphere: Exhausting head and mucous membrane conditions; stomatitis, pharyngitis and amenorrhoea or dysmenorrhoea with marked prostration

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous weakness and neurasthenic fatigue; oversensitive to neuralgic pains; mental dullness and irritability during septic or malarial states
General_Themes: Neuralgia and neurasthenia; malaria and typhoid with distension, delirium and high fever; acute and scarlatinal nephritis; septic and pus infections; surgical kidney with copious pus; gonorrhoeal rheumatism and cystitis; backache and sciatica; later states of apoplexy
Key_Local_Symptoms: Urine turning green; burning or irritative bladder symptoms with frequent urging; neuralgic pains in limbs and back; septic or malarial fever with tympanites and delirium; scarlatinal nephritis with albuminous or bloody urine
Worse_From: Pathological states with sepsis, nephritis or cystitis; strain on kidneys; suppression or retention of urine
Better_From: Clinical improvement with relief of tympanites, fever and delirium; better as urine flows more freely and neuralgic pains subside
Notes_Sphere: Septic and toxic states with marked nervous and renal involvement; typhoid or scarlet fever complications; cystitis and gonorrhoeal rheumatism with green urine as a keynote

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Very sensitive to pain and cold; irritable, restless and low when pains are intense; aversion to talk or effort from stupefying headache
General_Themes: Marked chilliness with great sensitiveness to cold air; skin eruptions with thick leathery crusts under which pus collects; burning darting neuralgias; bone pains and drawing stiffness of joints; complaints often one sided
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent neuralgia of face and teeth, pains running to ear, worse at night and from eating, better near a hot stove; head covered with thick white scabs under which pus collects; chronic eczema with intolerable itching and chilliness, worse in bed; burning or stitching bone pains especially in tibia and long bones; gastric burning and nausea better from eating
Worse_From: Cold air; night and evening until midnight; warm food or drinks provoking cough; motion and touch; damp weather; eating in tooth and chest complaints
Better_From: Open air; warmth to the painful part, especially hot applications near face and head; eating relieves some stomach symptoms
Notes_Sphere: Chronic skin eruptions with thick crusts and underlying pus; post-vaccinal eruptions; facial neuralgia and bone pains with marked chilliness and aggravation from cold air

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mood dulled and comfort-seeking from gastric distress; restless when colicky or bloated
General_Themes: Acts chiefly on stomach and bowels; flatulent colic with rumbling and griping; used traditionally as a mild febrifuge, blood purifier and tonic herb
Key_Local_Symptoms: Nausea with pain in stomach and bowels; flatulence with rumbling and colicky cramps; abdominal discomfort relieved by passing gas or taking the warm herb tea
Worse_From: Flatulent overloading of stomach; cold drinks or indigestible food that provoke gas and cramping
Better_From: Warmth to abdomen; sipping the warm infusion; passage of flatus and stool
Notes_Sphere: Simple flatulent and colicky digestive upsets; mild febrile states where a soothing aromatic digestive remedy is desired

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious and restless during bleeding; mental confusion with feeling as if something has been forgotten; nervous excitement in suppressed menses
General_Themes: Key remedy for bright red haemorrhages from many parts; continued high temperature after injuries or operations; bad effects of falls or lifting; tendency to convulsions or epilepsy from suppressed menses
Key_Local_Symptoms: Bright red, fluid bleeding from nose, lungs, uterus or bowels; haemorrhoids or uterine haemorrhage with bright red blood; haemoptysis in early chest disease; vertigo and head feels full of blood; piercing pains through head or from eyes to root of nose
Worse_From: Exertion and overheating during haemorrhages; suppression of menses or haemorrhoidal flow; after injuries, falls or operations
Better_From: Rest and lying quietly; elevation and pressure or cool applications to the bleeding part; restoration of a natural menstrual or haemorrhoidal flow
Notes_Sphere: General haemorrhagic tendencies with bright red blood, especially after injury, strain or suppression of accustomed discharges

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous, dragged-down and sensitive from pelvic and bladder congestion; easily fatigued by uterine symptoms
General_Themes: Pelvic and bladder remedy especially in women; uterine congestion with associated bladder irritation; tendency to bright red uterine bleeding
Key_Local_Symptoms: Irritation at neck of bladder with frequent urging and dysuria; catarrh of bladder; cervix dark red and swollen; dysmenorrhoea and uterine haemorrhage with bright red blood
Worse_From: Pelvic congestion; exertion or standing that strains uterus and bladder; exposure to cold around pelvis
Better_From: Rest; lying down; warm applications to lower abdomen and back; frequent small voiding of urine
Notes_Sphere: Female pelvic complaints with accompanying bladder irritation; dysmenorrhoea and menorrhagia with bright red flow

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable and restless from violent colicky pains; anxious with back and pelvic pain around menses
General_Themes: Acts on digestive tract and pelvic organs; intense griping colic with accumulation of flatus; painful and excessive menses; may be associated with dropsical states
Key_Local_Symptoms: Griping colic with rumbling and dragging from back to front of abdomen; pain in back and hypogastrium with profuse painful menses; labour-like pains from small of back to pelvis; accumulation of gas in splenic flexure; abdominal distension in dropsical conditions
Worse_From: Eating heavily or foods that promote gas; movement during colic; onset of menses with congestion in pelvis
Better_From: Passing flatus and stool; onset and free flow of menses; warmth and gentle pressure over abdomen and back
Notes_Sphere: Flatulent colic centred in splenic flexure with back-to-front pains; painful menorrhagia and some dropsical states

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Profound depression with irritability and fault-finding; hysterical states from shock or terror; extremely sensitive to pain yet drowsy and dreamy
General_Themes: Acts powerfully on nervous system, respiration and circulation; alternation of tachycardia and bradycardia; great restlessness with hyperaesthesia, twitching and convulsions; tendency to Cheyne-Stokes respiration and extreme weakness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Vertigo from least movement of head; bursting headache with sensation of being wound up and head drawn back; dry brown-violet tongue with intense nausea and vomiting on rising; diaphragmatic paresis with difficult breathing, hiccough and teasing dry cough worse at night; marked bladder paresis with slow or difficult urination; neuralgias and multiple neuritis, better from heat
Worse_From: Least motion especially of head; rising up; after sleep; cold air on painful parts; solids or attempts to swallow when throat is constricted; night for cough and dyspnoea
Better_From: Warmth and hot applications to painful parts; hot drinks for throat; lying still with head supported; gentle position changes and quiet surroundings
Notes_Sphere: Severe neuralgias, post-zoster pains and multiple neuritis; respiratory and cardiac failure states with Cheyne-Stokes pattern; bladder paresis and intense nausea or vomiting in toxic or shock states

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Hysterical, changeable, laughing and scolding by turns; anxiety with palpitation and frequent fainting; great nervousness and fear of suffocation
General_Themes: Hysteria and nervous paroxysms with fainting, catalepsy and globus sensations; great sensitiveness to cold air; much flatulence with abdominal distension; tension in muscles, skin and mind
Key_Local_Symptoms: Compressive pains over root of nose and vertex with vertigo as if falling; hysterical tightness and spasmodic constriction of chest and larynx with difficult breathing; asthma with intense anxiety and smothering feeling; globus hystericus; nervous hiccough; profuse urination or diabetes with sexual weakness
Worse_From: Cold and especially cold air; emotional excitement; eating in sensitive patients; coition in men; suppressed or disordered menses in women
Better_From: Open air when not too cold; gentle rubbing or friction; loosening clothing; reassurance and quiet surroundings
Notes_Sphere: Hysterical and nervous manifestations with spasmodic chest and throat constriction, globus sensations and fainting spells, especially in sensitive chilly patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, peevish and fretful; sad, taciturn and suffering in silence; weak, sliding down in bed from profound exhaustion
General_Themes: Septic low fevers with high temperature and extreme prostration; decomposition of fluids with offensive discharges; tendency to haemorrhages and bed-sores; acts strongly on mouth, anus and rectum with great soreness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Tongue pale, swollen, dry and leathery with deep ulcers and fetid breath; sordes on teeth and aphthous mouth; haemorrhoids bluish, hot and exquisitely sensitive so that even soft paper is painful; involuntary, offensive stools when passing urine; prolapsus ani during urination; heavy weak limbs and painful tendo-Achilles
Worse_From: Damp weather; before midnight; least touch or pressure on the anus or haemorrhoids; septic states with exhaustion and haemorrhage
Better_From: Lying on left side; gentle cleanliness and careful local care; quiet rest in bed
Notes_Sphere: Septic and typhoid-like states with profound prostration, involuntary discharges and haemorrhoids or mouth ulcers; especially where patient is too weak to move and slides down in bed

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous, lively, affectionate women who are easily excited; great sadness, anxiety and dread; feels consciously aware of the womb all the time; heightened sexual desire with irritability if not relieved
General_Themes: Marked uterine congestion with bearing-down sensations; general weakness and run-down state; tendency to prolapse and enlargement of uterus with pelvic tenesmus; menses irregular, profuse, dark and clotted
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sinking, all-gone feeling in stomach; pulsation in neck of womb; feeling as if something were pressing on a sore spot in pelvis, worse sitting; uterine prolapse and displacement with sharp pains extending toward breasts; acrid, green or bloody leucorrhoea with soreness of genital parts
Worse_From: Sitting; standing and walking; before and during menses; slightest contact of genital parts; exertion with pelvic congestion; lying on back when uterus feels heavy
Better_From: Rest; supporting pelvic organs with hand or by tightly crossing legs; lying with pelvis well supported; free menstrual or leucorrhoeal flow
Notes_Sphere: Female pelvic organs; prolapse and displacement of uterus with intense bearing-down and sexual excitement in exhausted women

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Delirious, restless and sad; fears death and feels despondent; nervous, excitable children who cannot keep still
General_Themes: Marked action on motor nerves with constant twitching and jerking; choreic and convulsive tendencies; great weakness with unsteady gait; nervous exhaustion after fright or strain
Key_Local_Symptoms: Rapid twitching of facial muscles with mouth and eyes opening in quick succession; head jerked to one side; grating of teeth at night; dry, parched tongue put out with difficulty; involuntary movements of limbs as in chorea
Worse_From: Emotional excitement or fright; attempts to keep still; night; exertion; pubertal or menstrual changes
Better_From: Sleep; quiet surroundings; occupation that allows free movement; warmth and gentle rubbing of affected parts
Notes_Sphere: Nervous system; chorea and spasmodic disorders, especially in excitable children with constant twitching and grimacing

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited and easily fatigued from long-standing chest illness; anxious and worried about health; dull, oppressed mental state with chronic cough
General_Themes: Chronic bronchitis and incipient or established phthisis; night-sweats and emaciation; tendency to profuse muco-purulent expectoration
Key_Local_Symptoms: Cough with profuse thick muco-purulent sputum causing gagging and vomiting, worse while or after eating; pain and soreness in left lung, especially lower part, painful on coughing and sensitive to percussion; troublesome night-sweats in phthisical patients
Worse_From: While or after eating; talking; exertion that provokes cough; night in bed; damp cold weather
Better_From: Rest; lying quietly; open air when not cold; easier expectoration of mucus; light, frequent meals
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory tract; chronic bronchitis and pulmonary tuberculosis with profuse expectoration and night-sweats, especially with left-lung involvement

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Despondent, gloomy and indifferent; easily irritated and depressed during liver trouble; mental dullness with drowsiness
General_Themes: Marked action on liver and mucous membranes; catarrhal jaundice with bronze-yellow skin; persistent sleeplessness in spite of drowsiness; general malaise with bad taste and offensive breath
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dull aching in region of liver with fullness and soreness; yellow, itching face and sclerotica; thick, tenacious, foul mucus in mouth and throat; tongue heavily coated with bad taste and nausea; weak sinking feeling in epigastrium, worse after eating
Worse_From: After eating; morning on waking; damp cold weather; mental exertion when drowsy; lying on right side
Better_From: Rapid walking or moderate exercise, which relieves stomach sinking; warm drinks; gradual restoration of bile flow and stool
Notes_Sphere: Liver and digestive tract; catarrhal jaundice and hepatic congestion with sluggish digestion, coated tongue and offensive mucus

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable and anxious from painful inflammatory swellings; depressed and low during prolonged suppuration
General_Themes: Powerful antiseptic remedy for cellular tissue and periosteum; promotes and hastens suppuration in abscesses, felons and carbuncles; useful in traumatic infections and fistulous tracts
Key_Local_Symptoms: Deep-seated suppurative processes with throbbing, swelling and intense pain; felons and whitlows on fingers and toes; parotid and other glandular abscesses; fistulae and chronic discharging sinuses
Worse_From: Cold and damp; pressure on inflamed parts; neglect of hygiene; unchecked progression of abscess
Better_From: Warm applications; free drainage of pus; timely opening of abscess; rest of affected part
Notes_Sphere: Skin, cellular tissue and bones; septic and suppurative conditions where surgery seems imminent, acting as a ‘homeopathic knife’

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious and worried about chest symptoms; nervous and easily startled from heart and lung pains
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes of respiratory and urinary tracts; chest pains of consumptives; incipient phthisis; nerve sedative and antiseptic

Notes_Sphere: Respiratory organs, especially apex of left lung; early tuberculosis and left-sided chest pains with dry teasing cough

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Profound melancholy with sense of responsibility and guilt; feels she has neglected her duty; suicidal thoughts yet fears death; alternation of loquacity and deep depression

Notes_Sphere: Heart and nervous system; valvular disease, angina and cardiac coughs in sensitive, conscientious patients with marked guilt and depression

General_Themes: Acts on respiratory tract and urinary apparatus; coryza, hay-fever, chronic bronchitis, emphysema and early phthisis; irritation of kidneys and bladder; predisposition to whooping-cough

Better_From: Fresh, moderately warm air; sitting up; freer expectoration of mucus; nasal and bronchial discharge becoming easier
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory tract and urinary organs; hay-fever, asthma and chronic bronchial catarrh with irritating discharges

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Bewildered, confused feeling with heaviness of head; dull, stupefied mental state from gastric or toxic disturbance

Better_From: Open, fresh air; gentle motion; cleansing away crusts and mucus; cool applications to eyes
Notes_Sphere: Nasal and ocular mucous membranes; chronic rhinitis and sinusitis with frontal headache and post-nasal catarrh, especially in delicate, sensitive patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Timid, easily hurt and anxious; avoids people yet feels lonely; oversensitive to noise, music and mental effort; sadness and exhaustion from slight causes

Better_From: Rest; lying down; cool open air (not windy); gentle motion; careful diet avoiding milk and excess starch
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and digestive systems; sun headaches, chronic flatulent dyspepsia and weakness from heat or mental strain in delicate, oversensitive patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed and apathetic during septic or toxic states; anxious and restless when throat or glands are affected
General_Themes: Antiseptic, disinfectant action on blood and glands; low septic states with offensive discharges; inflammatory and ulcerative conditions of mouth and throat; glandular enlargement

Better_From: Rest; fresh, well-ventilated air; gentle local cleansing and warm applications
Notes_Sphere: Septic and glandular sphere; foul ulcerations of mouth and throat, swollen glands and offensive discharges in low, exhausted states

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Reserved, serious and sensitive; dwells long on grief and past hurts; consolation aggravates; easily offended yet avoids showing emotion; desire for solitude with silent sadness

Better_From: Open, cool air; rest; tight band or pressure around head; sweating; being alone and quietly occupied
Notes_Sphere: Nervous system, blood and mucous membranes; chronic headaches, anaemia, herpes, constipation and sequelae of grief in reserved, salt-craving patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, easily discouraged and anxious about heart and breathing; sadness with tendency to weep; sluggish mind in anaemic states

Better_From: Rest; sitting quietly; cool, fresh air; lying with head and chest raised
Notes_Sphere: Heart and respiratory sphere; anaemic, short-of-breath patients with palpitation, morning cough and chest oppression

Worse_From: Fatty or sugary food; milk; over-eating; mental exertion after meals
Better_From: Light, simple diet; avoiding sweets and fats; rest after eating; warm drinks
Notes_Sphere: Digestive and metabolic sphere; acid dyspepsia, worms, uric-acid rheumatism and conditions with yellow, creamy coatings or discharges

Better_From: Dry, warm climate; open air when dry; changing to higher, less damp environment; moving about gently
Notes_Sphere: Liver, intestines, respiratory tract; damp-aggravated asthma, bilious diarrhoea and sequelae of head injury in hydrogenoid constitutions

Worse_From: Mental exertion; playing piano or reading; talking or singing; afternoon and evening; change of weather
Better_From: Rest; lying quietly in dark room; open air; cessation of mental and vocal strain
Notes_Sphere: Nervous system and mucous membranes; periodic headaches, catarrh and laryngeal strain in anaemic, overworked individuals

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited and easily irritated; mental weariness in those who work indoors or with metals and chemicals

Notes_Sphere: Musculo-skeletal and mucous membranes; chronic catarrh and rheumatic or occupational complaints in those exposed to metals or damp

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, vindictive and easily offended; remembers old injuries; anxiety about health; despairing yet obstinate; great nervous sensitivity to pain

Key_Local_Symptoms: Ulcers and fissures of mouth, anus and genitals with splinter-like pains; painful haemorrhoids that bleed on slightest touch; deep cracks at corners of mouth or anus; acrid, foul leucorrhoea; urine strong-smelling and offensive; condylomata and warts that bleed on washing
Worse_From: Cold, especially damp cold; touch and pressure; night; scratching or washing affected parts; motion
Better_From: Riding in a carriage or boat; warmth in general; gentle applications that protect rather than irritate; rest
Notes_Sphere: Mucous membranes, skin and outlets; fissures, ulcers, warts and haemorrhoids with splinter-like pains and offensive discharges, often in syphilitic or mercurial patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, irritable and anxious; easily discouraged; mental weakness and inability for sustained effort in chronic liver disease
General_Themes: Acts powerfully on liver and portal system; chronic hepatic and splenic congestion; jaundice with great debility; haemorrhoids and rectal soreness; sluggish digestion with flatulence

Worse_From: After eating; mental or physical exertion; damp, cold weather; pressure over liver; standing or walking long

Notes_Sphere: Liver and portal circulation; chronic hepatic congestion, jaundice and haemorrhoids with marked fatigue and sallow complexion

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless and anxious during febrile attacks; nervous, easily excited and irritable; mind feels hurried and over-stimulated
General_Themes: Acts on circulation, kidneys and skin; febrile states with alternation of chill and heat; promotes perspiration and diuresis; useful in early colds and influenzal attacks
Key_Local_Symptoms: Fever with hot, dry skin or alternation of chill and heat, thirst and restlessness; headache and fullness in head; frequent urging to urinate with increased, light-coloured urine; slight burning or smarting in urinary passages
Worse_From: Night; becoming chilled; sudden changes from warm to cold; suppression of perspiration or urine
Better_From: Free perspiration; warm covering; increased flow of urine; rest in bed during fever
Notes_Sphere: Circulation and urinary tract; early febrile and catarrhal states where gentle diuretic and diaphoretic action is needed

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, sad and apathetic; gloomy and indifferent to life; in men, mental depression from loss of sexual power or long excesses
General_Themes: Marked action on male sexual organs and digestion; complete loss of sexual desire and power; great physical prostration; morning diarrhoea with sinking at epigastrium
Key_Local_Symptoms: Total absence of sexual desire and erections in men; relaxed, cold genital organs; morning, painless, yellow or watery diarrhoea with great weakness; sinking, empty feeling at stomach; dragging sensation in hypogastrium
Worse_From: Sexual excesses or abuse; mental worry about sexual weakness; morning on rising; exertion
Better_From: Rest; abstinence from sexual excitement; lying quietly; simple, easily digested food
Notes_Sphere: Male sexual sphere and digestion; impotence and prostration with morning diarrhoea and sinking gastric feeling

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Drowsy, dreamy, absent-minded; very changeable moods, laughing then weeping; hysterical, whimsical, oversensitive; feels everything is unreal or as if in a dream

Key_Local_Symptoms: Mouth and tongue intolerably dry yet no thirst; inclination to faint on least exertion or emotion; distended, tympanitic abdomen with colic and rumbling; sleepy, heavy feeling with inability to keep eyes open; irregular, suppressed or painful menses with hysterical symptoms

Notes_Sphere: Nervous system and mucous membranes; hysterical, fainty states with extreme dryness, sleepiness and flatulent distension

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, impatient, oversensitive to noise, light, odours and contradiction; ambitious, driven persons who overwork, overindulge in coffee, alcohol or rich food; anger and vexation easily excite

Better_From: Rest; warmth, especially external; in the evening; after a good stool or free discharge; short sleep after meals
Notes_Sphere: Digestive and nervous systems; dyspepsia, constipation, portal congestion and spasmodic complaints in irritable, overworked, high-living individuals

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, dull and despondent; irritable and restless during attacks; mind feels heavy and oppressed in bilious or malarial states

Key_Local_Symptoms: Headache with heaviness and vertigo in bilious fevers; pain and tenderness in right hypochondrium; bitter taste with nausea and bilious vomiting; loose, offensive stools with much bile; aching in back and limbs as if bones were bruised; rheumatic pains in joints during or after fever
Worse_From: Early morning; cold, damp air; chilling; during chill and fever stages; after rich or greasy food
Better_From: Warmth; rest; gentle perspiration; free bilious stool and urine
Notes_Sphere: Liver and malarial sphere; bilious fevers and jaundice with bone and joint pains, especially where attacks begin in early morning

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Very irritable, restless and excitable; children cry and scream with urinary or colicky pains; anxious from violent renal colic
General_Themes: Marked action on kidneys, ureters and bladder; renal and biliary colic; gravel and uric-acid diathesis; offensive breath and disordered digestion accompanying urinary troubles
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense right-sided renal colic radiating to groin and testicle or labium; urine scanty, high-coloured with red sand or brick-dust sediment; constant urging with cutting and burning in urethra; nausea, vomiting and abdominal distension during attacks; offensive breath and coated tongue
Worse_From: Right side in general; motion or jolting; night; cold drinks during colic; lying on painful side
Better_From: Passing of gravel or small calculi; warm applications to lumbar region; bending forward and rest
Notes_Sphere: Urinary tract; right-sided renal colic, gravel and uric-acid states with intense restlessness and irritability

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Sudden onset of confusion, terror or mania; alternation of wild excitement and deep stupor; mental obscuration during or after convulsions
General_Themes: Violent action on brain and spinal cord; epileptiform convulsions with sudden loss of consciousness; tonic and clonic spasms; tendency to status epilepticus; post-epileptic stupor and paralysis
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sudden, violent convulsions with distortion of eyes and face, clenching of jaws and opisthotonos; frothing at mouth; involuntary stool and urine during fit; long-lasting stupor after attack with cold, clammy skin; possible local palsies or weakness after repeated seizures
Worse_From: Bright light; noise; fright or emotional shock; menstrual or pubertal changes; suppression of eruptions; overheating
Better_From: Dark, quiet room; absolute rest; lying with head slightly raised; cool applications to head
Notes_Sphere: Brain and spinal cord; epileptiform seizures and severe spasmodic nervous disorders with marked post-ictal stupor and collapse

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Hysterical, excitable and anxious; tendency to sudden fainting; alternate laughing, crying and sighing; fearful and easily startled

Worse_From: Emotional excitement, fright or grief; loss of blood or other fluids; cold air; exertion in a weakened state
Better_From: Warmth; quiet, dark room; lying flat with head low; gentle stimulation and reassurance
Notes_Sphere: Nervous system and circulation; collapse, fainting and hysterical attacks after fright, shock or haemorrhage

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dull, depressed and apathetic; children peevish and fretful yet listless; mental and physical backwardness in scrofulous subjects
General_Themes: Nutritive remedy for scrofulous and tubercular constitutions; emaciation and weakness in growing children; rickets; chronic glandular enlargement; chronic chest complaints with tendency to tuberculosis
Key_Local_Symptoms: Thin, emaciated child with large head and abdomen, weak limbs and slow dentition; enlarged cervical and mesenteric glands; chronic bronchial catarrh with teasing cough and thick expectoration; night-sweats; frequent, loose stools with undigested food; bone pains and deformities in rickets
Worse_From: Cold, damp climate; lack of fresh air and sunshine; rapid growth; exertion; insufficient or poor diet
Better_From: Warm, dry climate; sunshine and open air; nourishing but easily digested food; rest with gradual, gentle exercise
Notes_Sphere: Nutrition, glands, bones and lungs; scrofulous and tubercular states with emaciation, rickets and chronic chest catarrh, especially in children

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable and anxious during urination; restless from burning and frequent urging; mind preoccupied with bladder symptoms
General_Themes: Acts chiefly on urinary tract; catarrhal inflammation of urethra and bladder; gonorrhoeal and non-specific urethritis; chronic gleet with scanty discharge
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning and smarting in urethra during and after urination; frequent urging with scanty, cloudy or milky urine; pain radiating along urethra into bladder or perineum; dragging in loins from urinary irritation
Worse_From: During and after urination; walking or motion that shakes region; taking cold; highly seasoned food and alcohol
Better_From: Rest; plenty of bland fluids; warmth to lumbar and suprapubic region
Notes_Sphere: Urinary sphere; acute and subacute urethritis, catarrhal cystitis and gleet with burning, frequent urging and cloudy or milky urine

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Absent-minded and dreamy; memory weak for what has just been read or heard; alternation of cheerfulness and depression; oversensitive to criticism yet apathetic in duties

Better_From: Rest; lying quietly; cool applications to scalp; gentle occupation without mental strain
Notes_Sphere: Skin, scalp, digestion and heart; hair loss with sensitive scalp, painless diarrhoea and cardiac weakness in drowsy, easily exhausted patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Peevish and fretful; children cross, want to be carried but remain dissatisfied; dull and apathetic during chest or gland troubles

Key_Local_Symptoms: Oppressed breathing with loose rattling cough; thick, tenacious mucus difficult to expectorate; chronic bronchitis in old or scrofulous people; enlarged cervical glands; sour vomiting or eructations with acidity and gastric discomfort

Better_From: Warmth; sitting up; slow, persistent expectoration; dry, mild climate
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory and glandular sphere; chronic catarrh, bronchitis and scrofulous gland enlargements with acidity and irritability

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Great mental dullness; difficulty thinking or fixing attention; drowsy, apathetic and forgetful; irritable when forced to exert mind or eyes

Worse_From: Using eyes for reading or fine work; sexual excesses or masturbation; mental exertion; afternoon and evening; damp, close rooms
Better_From: Resting eyes; lying down; open air; abstinence from sexual strain; sleep
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and ocular sphere; eyestrain headaches, nervous exhaustion and sexual weakness with marked mental dullness and heaviness

Key_Local_Symptoms: Deep, heavy sleep with loud snoring and open mouth; pupils contracted or widely dilated; hot, congested face and head; absolute constipation with no desire or urging; no desire to pass urine or retention from insensibility; stertorous breathing and threatened paralysis of lungs; after-effects of fright with continuing stupor or insomnia
Worse_From: After fright or shock; overheating; stimulants; attempts to rouse or move patient; lying with head low
Better_From: Head high; cool fresh air; gentle, cautious stimulation; free evacuations when obtained
Notes_Sphere: Nervous system, brain and intestines; states of coma, insensibility and retention after fright, shock or overuse of narcotics; lack of reaction and painless complaints

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious and restless from violent abdominal pain; impatient and irritable during attacks; fear of eating because it brings on purging
General_Themes: Powerful hydragogue purgative; acts on liver, intestines and serous membranes; ascites and dropsical states; violent bilious diarrhoea and vomiting with colic
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sudden, violent colicky pains in abdomen followed by copious watery or bilious stools; repeated vomiting of bile and mucus; great distension and rumbling with relief after abundant stool; ascites and general dropsy with tense abdomen

Better_From: Warmth to abdomen; bending forward; free, copious stools and discharges; rest
Notes_Sphere: Digestive tract and serous membranes; violent bilious purging and some dropsical conditions where a strong evacuant action is needed in robust patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, irritable and despondent; feels weighed down and discouraged; worry centred in stomach and chest sensations

Better_From: Rest; light, easily digested food; sitting or lying with head and chest slightly raised; passing stool or gas

Better_From: Quiet, dark room; lying with head high; warmth to neck and occiput; closing eyes and keeping perfectly still

Better_From: Walking in open air; pressure over uterus; warm applications; rest away from irritating people or situations
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and female pelvic sphere; hysterical, spasmodic and ovarian complaints in proud, over-sensitive women with sense of enlargement and spasmodic constipation

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, restless and uncomfortable from constant throat and nasal irritation; mental focus disturbed by hawking and coughing
General_Themes: Acts on upper air-passages; chronic catarrh of nose, throat and larynx; follicular pharyngitis; formation of crusts and plugs that must be constantly cleared
Key_Local_Symptoms: Constant hawking of thick mucus or small, firm plugs from naso-pharynx; dryness and rawness of throat; chronic hoarseness with scraping in larynx; tendency to post-nasal catarrh and enlarged follicles in pharynx
Worse_From: Damp, cold weather; talking or reading aloud; dust and smoke; morning on waking
Better_From: Warm drinks; warm, moist air; gentle, frequent clearing of mucus; rest of voice
Notes_Sphere: Upper respiratory and throat sphere; chronic pharyngeal and laryngeal catarrh with constant hawking of plugs and hoarseness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Profoundly depressed, hopeless and fearful; anxiety about health; slow to answer, memory weak; hypochondriacal and melancholy
General_Themes: Acts deeply on nervous system and muscles; slow progressive paralysis with wasting; intense constipation with spasmodic colic; marked retraction of abdominal wall; arteriosclerosis and lead poisoning states
Key_Local_Symptoms: Terrible colicky pains radiating from navel to back and down thighs, abdomen drawn in like a board; obstinate constipation with no desire, stool in hard, black balls; muscular weakness and wasting, especially extensors, with wrist-drop or foot-drop; numbness and formication in limbs; slow, hard pulse and arterio-sclerotic changes
Worse_From: Night; exertion; mental strain; cold; after exposure to lead or other toxins
Better_From: Rest; warmth; rubbing abdomen during colic; passing stool or flatus when obtainable
Notes_Sphere: Nervous, muscular and intestinal sphere; lead paralysis, progressive muscular atrophy and intense colic with retracted abdomen and obstinate constipation

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, dissatisfied and restless; gloomy during attacks; children cross and moaning with colic and diarrhoea
General_Themes: Acts strongly on liver and intestinal tract; bilious, gushing diarrhoea; portal congestion; tendency to prolapsus ani; teething and summer complaints in children
Key_Local_Symptoms: Profuse, painless, gushing diarrhoea early in the morning, driving out of bed; stools watery, yellow or green, offensive and sometimes containing mucus or undigested food; prolapse of rectum with stool; much rumbling and colic before stool, sense of emptiness after; headache over eyes with liver soreness
Worse_From: Early morning (2–4 a.m.); hot weather; after eating fruit or rich food; during dentition; motion
Better_From: Lying on abdomen; cool applications to head; passing large stool; rest in cool room
Notes_Sphere: Liver and intestinal sphere; bilious diarrhoea, prolapsus ani and portal congestion, especially in children and hot-weather complaints

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, fretful and restless; anxious from pelvic and haemorrhoidal pains; low-spirited with sense of pelvic fulness
General_Themes: Acts on pelvic vessels, rectum and uterus; haemorrhoids and varicosities; dysentery and mucous diarrhoea; menstrual and uterine congestion
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning, smarting haemorrhoids with fullness and weight in rectum; frequent urging with mucous or bloody stools; colicky pains around umbilicus; menstrual flow bright, sometimes profuse, with pelvic bearing-down; backache and soreness in sacral region
Worse_From: Prolonged standing; sitting long on hard seat; cold, damp exposure; onset of menses
Better_From: Rest; warm applications to pelvis and anus; lying with hips slightly elevated; gentle walking after acute pain subsides
Notes_Sphere: Rectal and pelvic sphere; haemorrhoids, mucous diarrhoea and pelvic congestion with burning, smarting pains and sense of fulness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, dull and heavy; irritable and restless during fever; mental confusion with aching bones and joints
General_Themes: Acts on liver, spleen, bones and serous membranes; periodic fevers of malarial or typhoid type; aching in bones and joints; tendency to profuse perspiration
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chill followed by high fever with profuse sweat and great prostration; dull, aching pains in long bones and joints; backache and soreness in lumbar region; enlarged spleen in malarial subjects; headache with fullness and throbbing during paroxysms
Worse_From: Periodic return of fever; damp, marshy surroundings; exertion during or just after paroxysm
Better_From: Rest; warmth in chill; cool sponging during heat; profuse sweating that often relieves pains and headache
Notes_Sphere: Malarial and rheumatic sphere; intermittent and remittent fevers with bone and joint pains, splenic enlargement and profuse perspiration

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, nervous and tremulous; easily startled; worry centred in bladder and rectal sensations; irritable when urged to activity
General_Themes: Acts chiefly on urinary tract and rectum; catarrhal cystitis and urethritis; early prostatic irritation; haemorrhoids and rectal congestion
Key_Local_Symptoms: Frequent urging to urinate with burning or smarting in urethra and neck of bladder; urine cloudy, offensive or containing mucus; rectum congested with haemorrhoids and fullness; dull, aching pain in lumbar and sacral region
Worse_From: Cold exposure; sitting on cold seats; long sitting or standing; coffee or irritating drinks
Better_From: Warmth; rest; warm applications to lumbar and pelvic region; passing urine and stool
Notes_Sphere: Urinary and rectal sphere; catarrhal cystitis, early prostatic irritation and haemorrhoids with lumbar ache and frequent urging

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, restless and low-spirited; disturbed by persistent cough and catarrh; mental focus interfered with by chest and throat symptoms
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes of respiratory tract; chronic bronchitis and laryngeal catarrh; irritating, teasing cough with much mucus; sore, raw air-passages
Key_Local_Symptoms: Rough, harsh cough with rawness and burning in larynx and trachea; abundant, tenacious mucus difficult to raise; hoarseness and scraping in throat; soreness behind sternum with oppressed breathing; worse in cold, damp weather
Worse_From: Cold air; damp fog; evening and night; talking; lying down
Better_From: Warm drinks; warm room; wrapping neck and chest; sitting up and leaning forward while coughing
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory sphere; chronic bronchial and laryngeal catarrh with rawness, hoarseness and tough mucus that is hard to expectorate

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable and low from constant itching and burning of skin; anxious and restless when eruptions are intense; easily upset by minor annoyances
General_Themes: Marked contact dermatitis from slightest handling of the plant; vesicular and eczematous eruptions, especially on hands, arms and face; great dryness, roughness and cracking
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent itching, burning, vesicular eruption on backs of hands, wrists and forearms spreading to face and neck; redness, swelling and oozing as in eczema; skin thickened, sore and fissured from scratching; sometimes rheumatic pains in small joints of hands with stiffness
Worse_From: Touch or handling of primula; washing affected parts; cold air on raw skin; night in bed; scratching
Better_From: Rest; protecting skin with gloves or coverings; bland, soothing applications; cool, gentle bathing that does not irritate
Notes_Sphere: Skin and peripheral nerves; contact eczema and vesicular dermatitis from primula with intense itching and burning, chiefly on exposed parts

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dull, heavy, despondent; mental confusion with stupefying headaches; anxious and restless during rheumatic or catarrhal attacks
General_Themes: Acts on muscles, joints and mucous membranes; rheumatism, especially of shoulders and small joints; catarrhal states with cough and expectoration; tendency to vertigo and fulness in head
Key_Local_Symptoms: Pressive, stupefying headache in forehead and temples with vertigo on rising or moving; rheumatic aching and stiffness in neck, shoulders and arms; dry, teasing cough with scanty mucus or loose cough with easy expectoration; soreness and bruised feeling in limbs
Worse_From: Motion, especially rising or moving head; damp, cold weather; exertion; early morning
Better_From: Rest; warmth of bed; warm drinks for cough; gentle motion after rest to loosen stiffness
Notes_Sphere: Muscular and catarrhal sphere; rheumatism with shoulder and neck pains, vertiginous headaches and catarrh with cough in sluggish, heavy patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited and irritable; mentally dull and tired; depressed from chronic rheumatism or gouty pains; anxious about heart and circulation
General_Themes: Marked action on fibrous tissues, joints and circulation; chronic rheumatism and gout with nodosities; stiffness of small joints; flushes and vascular excitement; tendency to sweating with strong, fishy odour
Key_Local_Symptoms: Aching and stiffness in small joints of hands and feet with nodular swellings; wandering rheumatic pains worse in damp weather; sense of fulness and oppression about heart with palpitation; profuse, offensive perspiration; gouty pains in great toe and fingers
Worse_From: Damp, cold weather; rest after getting chilled; exertion; night
Better_From: Dry, warm air; moderate exercise to keep joints limber; warmth of bed; sweating which sometimes relieves pains
Notes_Sphere: Musculo-skeletal and circulatory sphere; chronic rheumatism, gout and nodular joint conditions with vascular excitement and offensive sweat

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, fearful and restless from violent pains and constrictive sensations; gloomy and apprehensive about heart or bladder disease
General_Themes: Acts powerfully on nerves of heart, eyes, face and urinary organs; violent neuralgias; spasmodic constriction as if parts were squeezed or banded; retention and difficult emission of urine
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent pain in left eye as if it would burst, radiating to head; trigeminal neuralgia with shooting pains in face and jaw; sudden arrest of urine with intense pain in bladder and urethra, as if urine passed in drops; constriction in chest and heart region, as if grasped in a vice, with palpitation and dyspnoea
Worse_From: Sudden motion; emotional excitement; night; cold air; attempting to urinate when flow is obstructed
Better_From: Rest; warmth; lying quietly with head and chest raised; free flow of urine when at last obtained
Notes_Sphere: Nervous, cardiac and urinary sphere; violent neuralgias, spasmodic constrictions and painful urinary retention, especially with left-sided eye and chest symptoms

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Despairing, hopeless, feels forsaken; thinks never will get well; extremely anxious about salvation and future; very sensitive to cold and to external impressions; despondent before a storm
General_Themes: Profoundly chilly, must keep warmly wrapped even in hot weather; filthy, offensive discharges and secretions; great prostration from slight exertion; never well since suppressed eruptions or discharges; attacks recur periodically
Key_Local_Symptoms: Skin dirty, greasy-looking with intolerable itching, worse in bed and from warmth; eruptions that are dry, scaly or moist, with offensive odour; chronic otorrhoea, coryza, leucorrhoea and diarrhoea all foul-smelling; sweat offensive, especially of head and feet; tendency to recurring headaches, catarrh or asthma at fixed intervals
Worse_From: Cold air and changes of weather; before a storm; warmth of bed causing itching; exertion; suppression of eruptions or secretions
Better_From: Warm clothing (especially fur), yet cool fresh air in moderation; slowly established discharges or eruptions; rest
Notes_Sphere: Chronic psoric and septic states; patients extremely chilly, offensively smelling and hopeless, with recurrent complaints and history of suppressed eruptions or discharges

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, despondent and gloomy; mental work aggravates frontal headache; feels wretched and out of sorts with liver and stomach symptoms
General_Themes: Acts chiefly on liver, stomach and portal system; hepatic congestion; dyspepsia with constant sense of fulness; headaches from gastric and hepatic disturbance
Key_Local_Symptoms: Frontal headache with weight and pressure at root of nose, worse from mental effort or in close room; constant fulness and soreness in liver and epigastrium; eructations of bitter, sour or tasteless gas; nausea and sometimes vomiting; constipation or bilious, loose stools; sense of weight in right hypochondrium
Worse_From: Mental exertion; rich or fatty foods; close, heated rooms; lying on left side; after overeating
Better_From: Open, cool air; light, simple diet; rest from mental work; lying on right side relieves liver pressure
Notes_Sphere: Liver and digestive sphere; gastric and hepatic headaches with fulness at root of nose and right-sided soreness in bilious, irritable subjects

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Gentle, yielding, easily moved to tears; seeks company and consolation; timid and changeable, moods and symptoms constantly shifting; fears abandonment yet dislikes stuffy rooms; children cling and cry
General_Themes: Venous, lymphatic, mild, often fair and soft types; complaints from rich food, fat, pastry and ice-cream; great tendency to wandering pains and shifting symptoms; little or no thirst with dry mouth; chilliness in open air but feels oppressed in warm, close rooms
Key_Local_Symptoms: Thick, bland, yellow-green catarrhal discharges from nose, eyes, ears, vagina or urethra; earaches and otitis in teething children; dyspepsia from fat or rich food with flatulence and nausea; menstrual problems with delayed, scanty or changeable flow, worse evening; varicose veins and haemorrhoids; pains that shift from place to place and are worse from warmth, better in cool open air
Worse_From: Warm, close rooms; overheating in bed; fat and rich foods; lying on left or painful side; evening and at onset of menses; emotion and excitement
Better_From: Cool, fresh open air; gentle motion; consolation and kind attention; lying with head high; eating lightly
Notes_Sphere: Venous, mucous and genital sphere; catarrhal, digestive and menstrual troubles with changeable symptoms, bland discharges and thirstlessness in mild, tearful patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, restless and oversensitive; mental distress from intolerable itching and biting sensations; children fretful, cannot keep still for itching
General_Themes: Acts on skin, anus and female genital organs; produces intense itching as from flea-bites; haemorrhoids and anal irritation; pruritus vulvae and vaginitis
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense itching and burning about anus and perineum, worse at night in bed; haemorrhoids swollen, sore and sensitive, with constant desire to scratch; sensation as of fleas or insects biting skin; in women, intolerable itching and smarting of vulva with excoriation
Worse_From: Night in bed; warmth; scratching; wearing warm or rough clothing; sitting long
Better_From: Cool applications; bathing the parts gently; loose, soft clothing; rest with thighs slightly apart
Notes_Sphere: Skin, rectal and genital sphere; pruritus ani and vulvae, haemorrhoids and flea-like biting sensations with violent itching and restlessness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Despondent and anxious; worried about swelling and kidney function; mental dulness and weariness in chronic dropsical states
General_Themes: Acts on kidneys, liver and serous membranes; dropsy with scanty urine; ascites and general anasarca; chronic nephritic and hepatic conditions; weakness after long-standing congestion
Key_Local_Symptoms: General oedema of face, hands, abdomen and legs; scanty, high-coloured urine or almost suppression; dull aching in loins and hepatic region; abdominal distension with heaviness and shortness of breath on exertion; tendency to loose, watery stools in some cases
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; lying flat; exertion, especially walking or climbing; salty food and late meals
Better_From: Rest with head and chest raised; warm, dry climate; bland, moderate diet; gradual increase of urinary flow
Notes_Sphere: Renal, hepatic and serous sphere; dropsical states with scanty urine, abdominal distension and dyspnoea in chronic kidney or liver disease

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Great restlessness of mind and body; constantly changes position; feels as if she cannot lie in one place; loquacious, anxious, delirious; thinks she is very ill, sometimes imagines there is another person in bed with her
General_Themes: Septic states with profound prostration; pulse and temperature out of proportion (rapid pulse with low fever or high fever with relatively slow pulse); bed feels hard, as if bruised all over; offensive discharges; rapid decomposition of fluids
Key_Local_Symptoms: Whole body sore and bruised, bed feels too hard; high fever with marked chilliness and sweating; pulse extremely rapid, out of proportion to temperature; dark, offensive lochia or discharges in puerperal sepsis; foul breath, sweat, urine and stools; septic wounds with great prostration and restlessness
Worse_From: Night; motion yet must move; during chill and high fever; septic operations, childbirth or retained products; suppression of normal discharges
Better_From: Changing position frequently; warmth during chill; cool sponging in high fever; free, offensive discharges when they appear
Notes_Sphere: Blood and septic sphere; puerperal sepsis, post-operative septicaemia and low typhoid states with great restlessness, bed-so-hard sensation and pulse–temperature discrepancy

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, depressed and peevish from chronic digestive weakness; mental dulness and disinclination for work when stomach is out of order
General_Themes: Marked bitter tonic for atonic dyspepsia; loss of appetite with weakness and emaciation; sluggish liver; tendency to worms in children; great weakness after slight exertion
Key_Local_Symptoms: Complete loss of appetite with aversion to food but thirst for cold drinks; bitter taste in mouth; heavy, sinking feeling in epigastrium after a few mouthfuls; flatulence with rumbling and griping; itching of anus and nose with tendency to worms, especially in children
Worse_From: After eating; rich or greasy food; mental exertion after meals; long fasting which weakens stomach further
Better_From: Small, frequent meals; simple, easily digested food; warm drinks; rest after eating
Notes_Sphere: Digestive sphere; atonic dyspepsia, anorexia and worm troubles, especially in weak, irritable patients who are aggravated by eating

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious and fearful during attacks of breathlessness; restless, mentally oppressed and low-spirited from chronic dyspnoea
General_Themes: Powerful action on respiratory and circulatory systems; emphysema, chronic bronchitis and cardiac dyspnoea; increases oxygenation and relieves air-hunger; useful in asthmatic and cardiac patients
Key_Local_Symptoms: Great oppression of chest with shortness of breath on the least exertion; must sit up and gasp for air; sense as if lungs could not expand enough; dry or scanty cough with difficult expectoration; cyanosis and palpitation in advanced cases
Worse_From: Exertion, especially climbing or hurrying; lying flat; warm, close rooms; night on lying down
Better_From: Sitting up or propped high with pillows; cool, fresh air; slow, gentle movement; rest between efforts
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory and cardiac sphere; emphysema, chronic bronchitis and cardiac asthma with marked air-hunger and exertional dyspnoea

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, irritable and dull; feels dragged down and heavy; mental weakness and apathy in chronic alcoholism or enlarged spleen
General_Themes: Acts on spleen, portal system and metabolism; enlarged spleen after malaria; chronic alcoholism and craving for alcohol; obesity and dropsical states; haemorrhoids and varicose congestion
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dragging, heavy feeling in left hypochondrium with enlarged, tender spleen; distended abdomen with portal congestion; varicose veins and haemorrhoids; offensive breath and coated tongue in drinkers; craving for alcohol with bad after-effects from small quantities
Worse_From: Alcohol; rich food; standing long; damp, cold weather; old malarial influences
Better_From: Abstinence from alcohol; light diet; gentle exercise; lying on right side to relieve splenic pressure
Notes_Sphere: Spleen, portal circulation and metabolism; enlarged spleen after malaria, varicose conditions and alcoholism with heaviness and craving for spirits

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable and depressed from persistent cough and catarrh; mentally dulled by constant bronchial irritation
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes of respiratory tract and skin; chronic bronchitis with tough, foamy mucus; laryngeal and tracheal irritation; some eruptions with itching
Key_Local_Symptoms: Loose, rattling cough with profuse, frothy, tenacious expectoration, hard to raise; scraping, raw sensation in larynx and trachea; oppression beneath sternum; hoarseness from catarrh; sometimes itchy papular eruptions on skin
Worse_From: Cold, damp air; talking; laughing; lying down; early morning and night
Better_From: Warm drinks; warm, moist air; sitting up and leaning forward; gradual expectoration of mucus
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory and cutaneous sphere; chronic bronchitis and tracheal catarrh with profuse, foamy mucus and some itchy skin eruptions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, anxious and oversensitive; easily fatigued with desire to lie still; mental dulness in chronic rheumatic or skin disease
General_Themes: Deep action on skin, glands, joints and nervous system; chronic rheumatism and arthritis; gouty and syphilitic manifestations; radiodermatitis-like eruptions; profound weakness with disturbed sleep
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense itching, burning and thickening of skin with eczematous or psoriatic patches; ulcers and fissures that are slow to heal; wandering rheumatic pains in joints and muscles, worse rest; stiffness of spine and neck; marked fatigue and heaviness of limbs
Worse_From: Rest; at night; damp or stormy weather; cold; prolonged exertion when already weak
Better_From: Gentle, continued motion; warmth; dry climate; sleep (though often disturbed)
Notes_Sphere: Skin, joints and glands; chronic eczema or psoriasis, stubborn ulcers and rheumatic or gouty arthritis with great weakness and night aggravation

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, irritable and fretful from stitching chest or back pains; depressed and hypersensitive to weather changes
General_Themes: Acts on muscles and serous membranes of chest and intercostal spaces; intercostal rheumatism; effects of cold, damp weather; aggravation from changes of temperature
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sharp, stabbing, stitching pains in chest and between shoulder-blades, worse from motion and deep breathing; intercostal neuralgia and pleurodynia; soreness and tenderness of chest walls; vesicular eruptions on chest or fingers with burning and itching
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; changes from warm to cold; motion; deep breathing; touch of painful parts
Better_From: Warmth; rest; lying on painful side to limit motion; steady, even temperature
Notes_Sphere: Chest walls, pleura and muscles; intercostal rheumatism, pleurodynia and chest shingles with sharp stitches and weather-sensitivity

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, nervous and restless from violent burning and itching of skin; mentally distressed by acrid, watery eruptions
General_Themes: Powerful vesicant to skin and mucous membranes; produces burning, blistering and acrid, watery exudations; acts particularly on hands, face and around orifices
Key_Local_Symptoms: Clusters of small, thin-walled vesicles that quickly break and exude acrid, watery fluid, causing intense burning and smarting; eruptions around mouth, nose, fingers and genitals; raw, excoriated surfaces that sting severely
Worse_From: Contact with water; cold, damp weather; washing or rubbing eruptions; night in bed when warmth increases burning
Better_From: Protecting parts from moisture and friction; cool, bland applications; fresh air without damp
Notes_Sphere: Skin and mucous membranes; vesicular, acrid eruptions with burning, smarting and rawness, especially on exposed parts and around orifices

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, gloomy and uncomfortable from abdominal distension; distracted and restless from pent-up gas
General_Themes: Acts on digestive tract and nervous system; post-operative or post-illness tympanites; paralytic or atonic intestines; colic with inability to pass flatus either up or down
Key_Local_Symptoms: Great distension of abdomen with rumbling and colic, yet inability to pass gas; cutting, griping pains about umbilicus; stools scanty or suppressed; post-operative abdominal distension; belching ineffectual or absent
Worse_From: After abdominal operations; eating; cold drinks; motion; pressure from clothing
Better_From: Passing gas (when it occurs); warm applications to abdomen; gentle rubbing; walking slowly bent forward
Notes_Sphere: Digestive and intestinal sphere; post-operative tympanites and atonic intestines with marked gas retention and colic

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, anxious and fearful on account of intense anal pain; dread of stool because of suffering; mind preoccupied with rectal symptoms
General_Themes: Acts strongly on rectum and anus; fissures and haemorrhoids with cruel, cutting pains; constipation with hard, knotty stool; pruritus ani
Key_Local_Symptoms: Stool passes with great difficulty and is followed by long-lasting, burning, tearing, knife-like pains in anus, as if glass or splinters were there; fissures that bleed and smart intensely; large, protruding haemorrhoids, very painful to touch; itching and burning making patient afraid to sit or walk
Worse_From: During and after stool; sitting; walking; dry, hard stool; local cleansing that irritates
Better_From: Cool applications; sitting in cold water; lying on side with buttocks separated slightly; soft stool and gentle local care
Notes_Sphere: Rectal sphere; fissure ani and haemorrhoids with extreme, splinter-like pains after stool in anxious, pain-dreading patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, apathetic and lethargic; mental dulness with slow thinking; tendency to melancholy and sleepiness in hypertensive or cardiac patients
General_Themes: Acts on vasomotor centre, heart and circulation; lowers blood pressure; bradycardia with weakness; tendency to drowsiness and nasal congestion; sometimes mental depression
Key_Local_Symptoms: Headache from high blood pressure with heaviness and throbbing; dizziness and tendency to fall; slow pulse with weakness and cold extremities; nasal stuffiness and snoring; increased need for sleep with unrefreshing drowsiness
Worse_From: Emotional excitement; mental overwork; high salt intake; smoking and stimulants; lying flat when congested
Better_From: Rest; quiet surroundings; regular, moderate regimen; head slightly raised in sleep
