Notes_Sphere: Cardiovascular and nervous sphere; essential hypertension, vascular headaches and nervous irritability in patients tending to drowsiness, slow pulse and depression

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, restless and low-spirited when bowels are sluggish; mental dullness and impatience from chronic constipation
General_Themes: Acts on liver, portal system and intestines; torpid bowels with incomplete evacuation; dull frontal headaches from bile stasis; weakness and heaviness in whole body
Key_Local_Symptoms: Constipation with frequent ineffectual urging; stool dry or hard, followed by feeling of incomplete relief; dull aching in right hypochondrium and across sacrum; flatulent distension with griping before stool; coated tongue and bad taste
Worse_From: Sedentary habits; overeating; late rich meals; lack of exercise; mental strain when constipated
Better_From: Regular gentle exercise; warm drinks; light, easily digested diet; free, satisfactory stool
Notes_Sphere: Liver and intestinal sphere; chronic constipation with portal congestion, flatulence and dull headaches in sluggish, irritable patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Cross, peevish, whining, especially in children; wants many things and rejects them; oversensitive to pain and discomfort; anxious from abdominal colic
General_Themes: Remedy for sour, griping diarrhoea of children; dentition troubles; sourness of all excretions; colicky pains with straining and tenesmus
Key_Local_Symptoms: Stools sour-smelling, brown or greenish, mixed with mucus and undigested food; colic and griping around navel before and during stool; much straining with only partial relief; sour breath, sour sweat and sour vomiting; child draws up legs and cries
Worse_From: Dentition; cold, damp weather; after fruit or unripe food; at night; uncovering abdomen
Better_From: Warm applications to abdomen; being carried; wrapping body and abdomen warmly; passing stool or wind
Notes_Sphere: Digestive and intestinal sphere; sour, griping diarrhoea of teething children with great fretfulness and sour excretions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, restless and low-spirited before a storm; sensitive to weather changes; irritable and depressed when rheumatic pains are active
General_Themes: Acts on fibrous tissues, joints and testes; rheumatism and gout; marked aggravation before and during storms; wandering pains shifting from joint to joint
Key_Local_Symptoms: Tearing, drawing pains in small joints, especially wrists, ankles and fingers, worse before a storm; testicles swollen, sensitive and drawn up, pains radiating to abdomen and thighs; stiffness of neck and back; headache as if from pressure in head before storms
Worse_From: Before and during a thunderstorm; stormy, windy weather; cold and damp; rest after getting chilled
Better_From: After the storm passes; warmth in general; gentle continued motion; dry, stable weather
Notes_Sphere: Rheumatic and testicular sphere; gouty or rheumatic pains and testicular neuralgia markedly worse before storms or changes in weather

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, depressed and easily exhausted; mental dulness and disinclination for effort with spinal and limb pains
General_Themes: Acts on nerves and muscles; neuralgic and rheumatic pains; spinal irritation with weakness; periodic headaches and limb pains
Key_Local_Symptoms: Neuralgic pains in head and face, coming and going suddenly; aching and stiffness in cervical and dorsal spine; drawing, rheumatic pains in limbs, worse motion; general weakness and fatigue after slight exertion
Worse_From: Cold and damp; motion; prolonged sitting; mental exertion
Better_From: Rest; warmth; gentle rubbing of affected parts; lying down
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and musculo-skeletal sphere; neuralgia and rheumatic or spinal pains with easy fatigue and mental dulness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, restless and sleepless from urinary troubles; children irritable and excited when bladder is affected
General_Themes: Acts chiefly on bladder, urethra and kidneys; enuresis in children; diabetes insipidus; irritative bladder catarrh
Key_Local_Symptoms: Constant desire to urinate with frequent small discharges; dribbling of urine, especially at night; bed-wetting in children with strong-smelling urine; irritative burning in urethra; sometimes increased quantity of pale urine as in diabetes insipidus
Worse_From: Night in bed; getting chilled; excitement or fright in children; cold, damp weather
Better_From: Regular emptying of bladder; warmth; avoidance of chilling; quieting influences for nervous children
Notes_Sphere: Urinary sphere; enuresis, dribbling and some diabetes insipidus with restless, excitable children or anxious adults

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, dull and irritable; mental confusion with thick, coated tongue and foul taste; anxious about mouth and throat condition
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes of mouth, throat and intestines; aphthous and ulcerative stomatitis; sore throat; diarrhoea and dysentery
Key_Local_Symptoms: Mouth full of aphthae with burning, rawness and offensive breath; gums swollen and bleed easily; sore throat with difficult swallowing; diarrhoea with mucus and blood, tenesmus and abdominal soreness; tongue coated, edges red
Worse_From: Acid or spicy food; hot drinks; cold, damp exposure; fatigue
Better_From: Cool, bland food and drinks; gentle rinsing of mouth; rest
Notes_Sphere: Mucous membranes of mouth, throat and intestines; aphthous and ulcerative conditions with offensive breath and sometimes dysenteric stools

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless, anxious and fearful, cannot remain in one position; sadness and apprehension in evening; irritable yet fearful of being alone; complaints often follow strain, exposure and wetting
General_Themes: Acts on fibrous tissues, ligaments, skin and mucous membranes; rheumatism and sprains; eruptions with intense itching and vesicles; great stiffness and soreness of muscles and joints; complaints from getting wet, especially when overheated
Key_Local_Symptoms: Pains as if sprained or bruised, worse on first moving but better from continued motion; stiffness on rising from bed or chair; rheumatic pains worse cold, damp and at night; small vesicles on red base, intensely itching and burning, often from ivy exposure; dry teasing cough with stitching chest pains; tongue often red at tip like a triangle
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; getting wet while sweating; rest after exertion; night; first motion after rest; sitting or lying long in one position
Better_From: Warmth; hot bathing; continued, gentle motion; wrapping up; change of position
Notes_Sphere: Muscular, articular and cutaneous sphere; sprains, rheumatism and ivy-like eruptions with restlessness and relief from continued motion and warmth

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Great irritability and anxiety from violent skin irritation; mentally distressed and sleepless from burning and swelling; oversensitive to slightest touch on affected parts
General_Themes: Very intense action on skin and eyes; violent erysipelas and cellulitis; great oedema, especially of face and eyelids; vesicular and bullous eruptions with burning and itching
Key_Local_Symptoms: Face and eyelids enormously swollen, eyes almost closed; skin dark red, tense and shiny; large blisters or confluent vesicles filled with serum; intense burning and itching, worse warmth; oozing, crusting surfaces around eyes, face and hands; sometimes involvement of air-passages with oedematous swelling
Worse_From: Warmth of room or bed; washing or bathing in warm water; scratching; continued exposure to poison vines or sumach
Better_From: Cool applications; cool, fresh air (without draughts); elevation of swollen parts; absolute rest and protection from further contact
Notes_Sphere: Skin and cellular tissue; violent ivy or sumach poisoning, erysipelas and oedematous eruptions with great swelling, burning and vesiculation, especially of face and eyes

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Prostrated, anxious and dull; apathetic from exhausting vomiting and diarrhoea; nursing mothers sad and discouraged from lack of milk
General_Themes: Acts on gastro-intestinal tract and lacteal glands; choleraic diarrhoea with vomiting; rapid collapse; stimulates or restores milk secretion in some cases; intense thirst with great weakness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Profuse, watery, rice-water-like stools with violent vomiting and rapid prostration; cramps in limbs and abdomen; tongue pale and cold; surface cold and clammy; in nursing women, breasts flabby and milk scanty or suppressed, sometimes restored when remedy suits general condition
Worse_From: Eating or drinking; sudden chilling; epidemic cholera or cholera morbus influences; exertion in weak state
Better_From: Small, frequent sips of warm drink; warmth; rest in recumbent posture; gradual return of fluids
Notes_Sphere: Gastro-intestinal and lacteal sphere; choleraic vomiting and diarrhoea with collapse, and some cases of deficient lactation when exhaustion and gastric symptoms correspond

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, depressive and restless; despondent about constant acidity; children wake screaming with gastric pain and sour vomiting
General_Themes: Marked hyperacidity remedy; intensely sour belchings, vomit and stools; gastric and duodenal catarrh; headaches from acidity, especially at night
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning, sour eructations and heartburn after eating; intense acidity of stomach with sour vomiting of food, especially at night on lying down; colic and distension with sour, greenish stools in children; frontal headache with nausea from gastric disturbance
Worse_From: Night on lying down; after rich, fatty or acidic foods; coffee; loss of sleep; mental exertion after meals
Better_From: Elevating head and shoulders in bed; plain, non-acidic diet; small, frequent meals; alkaline or bland drinks
Notes_Sphere: Gastric and duodenal sphere; severe hyperacidity with sour vomiting, heartburn and night headaches, particularly in children and sensitive adults

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Sensitive, sentimental and easily moved to tears; low-spirited from prolonged catarrh or uterine troubles; nervous and oversensitive to odours and noise
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes of nose, eyes and uterus; catarrhal states with tendency to bleeding; nervous weakness in delicate, refined constitutions
Key_Local_Symptoms: Recurrent epistaxis with hot, congested face and stuffed nose; bland or slightly acrid coryza with sneezing and burning in nostrils; congestive headaches with sense of fullness over eyes; in women, tendency to profuse, early menses with pelvic bearing-down and nervous palpitation
Worse_From: Warm rooms; close, perfumed air; emotions and excitement; overexertion during menses
Better_From: Cool, fresh air; gentle rest in quiet surroundings; light, simple diet
Notes_Sphere: Catarrhal and uterine sphere; nosebleeds and congestive headaches with sensitive, nervous temperament and tendency to profuse menses

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, nervous and easily excited by the least tickling in throat; anxious about cough at night; oversensitive and chilly
General_Themes: Marked action on larynx and trachea; dry, teasing cough from tickling in supra-sternal fossa; great sensitivity to cold air; some early-morning diarrhoea
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dry, incessant cough, provoked by inspiration of cool air or uncovering, caused by tickling just above sternum; cough worse in evening and after going to bed, must cover head to keep air warm; raw, sore chest and hoarseness; morning diarrhoea driving from bed with brown, watery stools
Worse_From: Inhaling cold air; uncovering or removing bedclothes; talking; evening and after lying down; touching or pressing larynx
Better_From: Wrapping up neck and mouth; warm air and warm drinks; covering head in bed; gentle, steady warmth
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory and intestinal sphere; dry, tickling cough extremely sensitive to cold air, and some early-morning diarrhoea in chilly, nervous subjects

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, dissatisfied and gloomy; feels overtaxed and used; easily discouraged when overworked physically or with fine eye work
General_Themes: Acts on periosteum, tendons and cartilage; ill effects of strains, overlifting and overuse of joints; bruised, lame feeling in muscles; eyestrain from close work
Key_Local_Symptoms: Bruised, sore pains in bones and periosteum, worse over small joints and wrists; sprains and strains of tendons and ligaments, especially ankles and wrists; back feels as if broken after sitting; eyes ache and burn from fine sewing, reading or screen work; nodes and thickening about joints
Worse_From: Overuse of eyes; prolonged standing or walking; strain, twists and sprains; cold, damp weather; lying on hard surfaces
Better_From: Rest; lying on back on something moderately firm; gentle motion after rest; warmth; local support or bandaging of injured joint
Notes_Sphere: Musculo-skeletal and ocular sphere; sprains, periosteal soreness and eyestrain with bruised, lame feeling in overworked, irritable patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, timid and introspective; fixed ideas about disease, imagines he has serious ailments; very sensitive to cold and odours
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes of nose and throat and on nerves; paroxysmal sneezing and coryza; helminthic disturbances; marked chilliness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent, spasmodic sneezing with copious watery coryza, burning and itching in nose and eyes; hay-fever-like attacks with periodicity; throat feels dry and constricted with lump sensation; chilliness with shivering, even from thinking of cold; itching of anus and crawling in rectum from worms
Worse_From: Cold air; odours (especially of flowers); thinking of unpleasant things, of cold or of one’s own symptoms; spring and autumn for hay-fever types
Better_From: Warm room; keeping head and face covered; warm drinks; gentle wiping rather than blowing nose
Notes_Sphere: Nasal and nervous sphere; spasmodic sneezing, hay-fever and worm symptoms in chilly, oversensitive patients with fixed disease ideas

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, gloomy and irritable; anxiety and despondency from sexual and urinary weakness; feels prematurely old and worn
General_Themes: Marked action on male genito-urinary organs; enlarged prostate; dysuria and dribbling; sexual weakness and testicular atony; emaciation above with relative fat abdomen
Key_Local_Symptoms: Frequent urging to urinate, with difficulty starting stream and dribbling at close; sense of fullness and soreness in prostate and perineum; nocturnal urination disturbing sleep; diminished sexual power and shrinking of testicles; pelvic and backache in men, sometimes in women with ovarian atony
Worse_From: Cold damp; sitting long; pressure on perineum; sexual excesses or long abstinence with congestion
Better_From: Rest; warm sitz baths; avoiding pressure on perineum; moderate, regular activity
Notes_Sphere: Male pelvic and urinary sphere; prostatic enlargement, urinary dribbling and sexual weakness with depressed, prematurely aged feeling

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Excitable, violent and impulsive; tendency to outbursts of anger; great anxiety and irritability during uterine haemorrhage; gloomy, foreboding mood
General_Themes: Acts chiefly on uterus and joints; profuse, bright red, partly clotted haemorrhages; tendency to abortion, especially about third month; gouty and rheumatic pains, especially in small joints
Key_Local_Symptoms: Profuse, bright red bleeding with dark clots from uterus, worse from least motion; pains drawing from sacrum to pubes and thighs; tendency to miscarriage about third month; sensitive, inflamed genitals with offensive discharge; gouty pains in small joints; uterine polypi and chronic menorrhagia
Worse_From: Least motion; standing or walking; warm room; coition; around third month of pregnancy
Better_From: Rest; lying flat, especially on back; cool room; pressure over sacrum
Notes_Sphere: Uterine and articular sphere; menorrhagia, threatened miscarriage (especially third month) and gouty joint pains with bright, clotty haemorrhages

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Sweet, affectionate yet emotionally needy; seeks comfort and reassurance; children overexcited, impulsive and greedy for sweets; mood swings with irritability when demands are not met
General_Themes: Acts on nutrition, digestion and nervous system; craving for sugar and sweets; tendencies to hyperactivity or dullness; digestive derangements from refined carbohydrates; obesity or, at times, emaciation in sensitive children
Key_Local_Symptoms: Marked craving for sweets which often aggravate digestion or behaviour; bloating, gas and colic after sugar; alternation of constipation and loose, sour stools in children; tendency to skin eruptions or itching after sweets; restless sleep with grinding of teeth or night terrors in sugar-sensitive children
Worse_From: Excess sugar and sweet foods; emotional upsets soothed by eating; excitement and overstimulation; irregular meals
Better_From: Regular, balanced meals with reduced sugar; plenty of water; outdoor play and moderate exercise; calm, predictable routines
Notes_Sphere: Nutritional and nervous sphere; sugar-sensitive children and adults with craving for sweets, digestive upset and emotional overdependence or hyperactivity

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Confused, dull and drowsy; noises in head and ears make thinking difficult; irritable and anxious from vertigo and tinnitus
General_Themes: Acts on auditory nerve, brain and joints; tinnitus and Menière-like syndromes; rheumatism and influenza states; gastric irritation from salicylates
Key_Local_Symptoms: Roaring, buzzing or ringing in ears with vertigo and unsteadiness; headache with fullness, especially occipital; nausea and gastric irritation; rheumatic pains in joints and muscles; low fever with prostration and aching as in influenza
Worse_From: Noise; rapid movement; turning head quickly; bright light; mental exertion when vertiginous
Better_From: Quiet, dark room; lying still with head raised slightly; cool applications to head; gradual, cautious movement
Notes_Sphere: Auditory, nervous and rheumatic sphere; tinnitus, vertigo and rheumatic or influenza-like conditions with bursting head and auditory disturbances

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, depressed and restless; nervous and sleepless from sexual excitement or pelvic congestion; easily angered yet mentally tired
General_Themes: Acts on sexual organs and nervous system; sexual hyperaesthesia and irritability; spermatorrhoea and nocturnal emissions; ovarian and uterine congestion; nervous insomnia
Key_Local_Symptoms: In men, constant sexual desire with frequent emissions and weakness; aching in testes and prostate region; in women, pelvic congestion with ovarian and uterine pains and sexual excitement; nervousness and sleeplessness from genital irritation; backache and weakness in lumbosacral region
Worse_From: Sexual excitement or overindulgence; dwelling on sexual subjects; prolonged abstinence with congestion; lying in warm bed
Better_From: Moderation and regulation of sexual life; cool sleeping arrangements; rest; avoiding stimulating thoughts and reading
Notes_Sphere: Sexual and nervous sphere; excessive sexual excitement with nervous irritability, emissions and pelvic congestion in men and women

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, nervous and anxious; easily excited and sleepless from flushing and sweating; mental weakness and forgetfulness in climacteric states
General_Themes: Acts on sweat glands, salivary glands and female sexual sphere; profuse perspiration, especially night-sweats; excessive salivation; menopausal flushes and nervousness; tendency to dry mucous membranes with general weakness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Profuse, exhausting night-sweats in phthisical or climacteric patients; hot flushes with drenching sweat and palpitations; excessive salivation with bad taste and mouth soreness; dryness of throat and mouth alternating with salivation; general weakness and trembling with easy fatigue
Worse_From: Warm rooms and beds; emotional excitement; menopause; exertion; hot drinks
Better_From: Cool, well-ventilated bedroom; light bedclothes; rest; cool drinks in small sips
Notes_Sphere: Glandular and climacteric sphere; night-sweats, hot flushes and excessive salivation with nervousness and weakness, especially around menopause or chronic wasting disease

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious and frightened on waking from sleep; especially in children who wake suddenly, sit up and grasp at the throat; very restless and peevish during attacks
General_Themes: Acts chiefly on respiratory organs and skin; spasmodic, suffocative coughs of children; tough, obstructing mucus in nose and larynx; profuse sweat that does not relieve
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sudden waking after first sleep with suffocative feeling, cannot get breath; dry, whistling, croupy cough with blocked nose so child must breathe with open mouth; nostrils stopped and dry, yet upper lip and face covered with sweat; skin dry and hot during fever, followed by profuse sweat
Worse_From: After first deep sleep at night (before midnight); lying flat; warm, close room; overheating in bed
Better_From: Cool, fresh air; sitting up; loosening clothing; gentle wiping of face and nose
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory and skin sphere; croupy, suffocative night attacks of children with blocked nose, whistling breathing and profuse sweat that brings little relief

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous, excitable and easily flushed; sensitive, restless and low-spirited; sick headaches driving from place to place, often with desire to be perfectly still in dark room
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes, especially of respiratory and digestive tracts; marked right-sided affinity; climacteric flushes; periodic sick headaches with vomiting; burning sensations in many parts
Key_Local_Symptoms: Right-sided sick headache beginning in occiput, spreading over head and settling over right eye, with nausea and vomiting, relieved by lying in dark and quiet; burning in stomach, oesophagus and chest; right-sided shoulder and deltoid pains; dry, tickling cough with burning behind sternum; climacteric hot flushes with redness of face and hands
Worse_From: Odours of flowers (especially), light, noise; motion; after missing meal or from gastric upset; climacteric changes
Better_From: Absolute rest in dark, quiet room; lying with head high; vomiting sometimes relieves headache; cool fresh air
Notes_Sphere: Head, mucous membranes and circulation; right-sided sick headaches, burning gastric and respiratory catarrh and menopausal flushes with marked heat and redness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, low-spirited and anxious; mental dulness from chronic catarrh and sinus trouble; easily discouraged when headaches recur
General_Themes: Acts on naso-pharyngeal mucosa and sinuses; chronic post-nasal catarrh; pharyngeal and laryngeal irritation; tendency to crust formation and obstruction
Key_Local_Symptoms: Frontal and maxillary sinus pain with thick, offensive nasal discharge; post-nasal dropping of tenacious mucus causing constant hawking; dry, burning sensation in throat and behind sternum; hoarseness from chronic catarrh
Worse_From: Damp, cold weather; dust and smoke; talking; sudden temperature changes
Better_From: Warm, moist air; warm drinks; gentle, continued expectoration; rest in quiet room
Notes_Sphere: Nasal and upper respiratory sphere; chronic sinusitis and post-nasal catarrh with burning pain and thick, sometimes offensive mucus

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, obstinate and sensitive; children cross, clingy and fearful; feel dirty or uncomfortable and want frequent washing or changing
General_Themes: Acts on skin, glands, digestive tract and spine; offensive perspiration and stools; failure to thrive in children; constipation with large, difficult stool; spinal weakness and backache
Key_Local_Symptoms: Offensive, rancid perspiration of feet, axillae and body; stool large, dry, crumbling, difficult to expel, followed by great exhaustion; excoriating, foul-smelling stools in infants; soreness of back and spine with weakness, child wants to be carried; rhagades and chapped skin on hands and lips
Worse_From: Cold and damp; uncovering; sitting long; irregular feeding in children
Better_From: Warmth; frequent small feeds; bathing and keeping skin clean and dry; being carried and supported
Notes_Sphere: Children’s, skin and digestive sphere; offensive sweats and stools, constipation with large crumbly stool, spinal weakness and failure to thrive in sensitive, clingy children

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Peevish, irritable, restless, especially in children; nervous and excited at night; frightful dreams and grinding of teeth during sleep
General_Themes: Chiefly a worm remedy; acts on intestinal tract and nervous system; symptoms from ascarides and oxyures; coloured vision and urinary changes; reflex nervous disturbances in children
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense itching and picking at nose and anus; restless sleep with crying, starting and grinding teeth; greenish, slimy or mucous stools with worms or worm fragments; abdomen hard, distended and tender round navel; peculiar coloured vision, objects or urine may appear yellowish or greenish
Worse_From: Night; eating sweets; lying in warm bed; irritation from intestinal worms
Better_From: Passing of worms with stool; light, simple diet; reduced sweets; rest after stool
Notes_Sphere: Intestinal and nervous sphere; worm affections in children with itching nose and anus, restless sleep and coloured vision or urine changes

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, dull and irritable; mental fatigue from chronic catarrh and skin troubles; anxious about persistent eruptions or discharges
General_Themes: Acts on skin, mucous membranes and glands; chronic catarrh of respiratory and genito-urinary tracts; eruptions with itching and scaling; tendency to glandular enlargement
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronic, loose catarrh with much mucus from nose and bronchi; rough, scaly or itchy eruptions, especially on limbs and trunk; glandular swellings; general lassitude and tired, bruised feeling
Worse_From: Damp, cold weather; getting chilled; prolonged exertion; washing with strong soaps
Better_From: Warmth; dry air; gentle exercise; mild, soothing local applications
Notes_Sphere: Skin and mucous membranes; chronic catarrh and scaly, itchy eruptions with glandular involvement and general tiredness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally dull, indifferent and irritable from fatigue; discouraged and low-spirited after slight efforts; cannot collect thoughts when tired
General_Themes: Remedy for muscle fatigue and lactic-acid states; great weakness and soreness after exertion; aching in limbs and back; chronic tiredness not relieved by sleep
Key_Local_Symptoms: Extreme muscular fatigue and soreness as if overtrained; backache and aching in thighs and calves after very little exertion; shortness of breath and palpitations from climbing stairs; unrefreshing sleep with morning tiredness and heaviness
Worse_From: Exertion, especially climbing or hurrying; prolonged standing; mental work added to physical fatigue
Better_From: Rest; lying down; gentle, non-strenuous movement after rest; regulating work–rest balance
Notes_Sphere: Muscular and nervous sphere; exhaustion and muscle soreness from lactic-acid build-up in overworked or weak patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, anxious and irritable; mental dulness from disordered heart and circulation; nervous and fidgety when palpitations come on
General_Themes: Acts on heart and circulation; influences blood pressure and rhythm; cardiac weakness with irregular, rapid or slow pulse; tendency to dropsy and faintness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Palpitation with irregular or intermittent pulse; oppression of chest and dyspnoea on exertion; tendency to oedema of ankles and legs; dizziness and faintness when standing or walking quickly
Worse_From: Exertion; going upstairs; emotional excitement; high blood pressure states
Better_From: Rest; sitting or lying with head and chest raised; quiet surroundings; regular, moderate regimen
Notes_Sphere: Cardiovascular sphere; functional and organic heart weakness with irregular pulse, dyspnoea and dependent oedema

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, dull and apathetic; miserable and heavy during low fevers; irritable when disturbed from sleep; mental oppression with bone pains
General_Themes: Acts on blood, skin and serous membranes; low, typhoid-like fevers; bone and joint pains; eruptive fevers (classically referenced in smallpox); great prostration
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dull, aching pains in back and limbs as if bones were bruised; headache with heaviness and stupor; low fever with chill, heat and sweat, patient drowsy and indifferent; skin eruptions that may be papular or pustular with soreness and itching; gastric disturbance with nausea and coated tongue
Worse_From: Night; motion; mental exertion; exposure to cold during fever; suppression of eruptions
Better_From: Rest in bed; warmth; free, natural evolution of eruptions; gentle nursing and frequent small drinks
Notes_Sphere: Blood and eruptive-fever sphere; low fevers with bone pains, stupor and slow, sometimes pustular eruptions resembling smallpox patterns in old literature

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, anxious and depressed; children scream before urinating from pain; adults low-spirited from chronic urinary trouble and gravel
General_Themes: Acts on urinary tract, skin and glands; gravel and calculi; painful urination, especially at close; eruptions and rheumatism in scrofulous or syphilitic subjects; emaciation of upper body with swollen legs
Key_Local_Symptoms: Severe burning in urethra at end of urination, child screams just as urine finishes; urine scanty, often with sandy or gritty sediment; renal colic with pain radiating from kidney down ureter; eruptions on skin, especially on face and extremities, often dry or scaly; cracked, painful skin on hands and feet
Worse_From: Close of urination; cold, damp weather; exposure to cold; at night; dairy or rich food in some patients
Better_From: Standing to urinate; warm applications to lumbar region; drinking plenty of water; dry, warm climate
Notes_Sphere: Urinary and cutaneous sphere; painful end-of-urination, gravel and skin eruptions in thin, irritable patients with scrofulous or syphilitic tendencies

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable and low from persistent gland and breast pains; anxious about lumps and nodes; mentally dull and weary in chronic gland disease
General_Themes: Acts on lymphatic glands and breasts; nodular and scrofulous swellings; tendency to induration and soreness; also affects haemorrhoids and some skin eruptions
Key_Local_Symptoms: Enlarged tender cervical axillary and inguinal glands; nodular swellings in breasts with shooting or throbbing pains; hard sore lumps in parotid and other glands; painful inflamed haemorrhoids with soreness of anus; rough or eczematous skin over affected glands
Worse_From: Pressure; prolonged standing; exertion; at night when lying on tender side
Better_From: Rest; gentle support of swollen glands or breasts; cool soothing applications; loose clothing
Notes_Sphere: Glandular and breast sphere; scrofulous nodes breast lumps and tender haemorrhoids with marked gland soreness and induration

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous exhausted and overworked; restless and fidgety yet mentally dull; anxiety at night so cannot sleep; impressionable and easily startled
General_Themes: Nervous sedative for functional insomnia; neurasthenia from prolonged worry or study; nervous twitchings and jerks in limbs; headaches from mental strain
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sleeplessness with constant turning and tossing; nervous jerking of legs and arms on going to sleep; dull heavy headache across forehead from overuse of brain; sense of tremulous weakness as if all over; palpitations in highly nervous persons
Worse_From: Mental overwork; worry and excitement; coffee and stimulants; loss of sleep; close warm rooms at night
Better_From: Rest and quiet; dark cool bedroom; regular sleep routine; gentle out of door exercise during day
Notes_Sphere: Nervous sphere; functional insomnia neurasthenia and nervous twitching in overstrained patients who are tired yet restless

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious restless and fearful yet often apathetic; complains little though very ill; great internal heat with desire to be uncovered; fear of death alternating with indifference
General_Themes: Acts on blood vessels and smooth muscle; intense vasoconstriction; passive haemorrhages with thin dark oozing; burning pains; gangrene and cramps; great prostration and emaciation; thin scrawny dried up subjects
Key_Local_Symptoms: Thin offensive dark blood oozing continuously from uterus or other parts; cold dry wrinkled skin with sensation of burning inside; cramps and tingling in limbs with formication; fingers toes or nose become bluish then black and shrivel; sinking faint feeling with almost imperceptible pulse yet wants covers off
Worse_From: Heat; warm room or bed; tight bandage; during labour or uterine haemorrhage; emotion in weak patients
Better_From: Cold; fanning; cool applications to head and face; loosening clothing
Notes_Sphere: Vascular and uterine sphere; passive haemorrhages collapse and dry gangrene in thin restless patients who feel burning inside yet want to be uncovered

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable depressed and worried about gastric and mouth symptoms; oversensitive when stomach is burning or ulcerated
General_Themes: Acts on stomach mouth and skin; gastric and duodenal ulcer; burning pains and acidity; aphthous or ulcerative conditions of mouth; warts and small excrescences
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning gnawing pain in stomach worse after food; sensation of rawness in epigastrium; sour risings and acidity; aphthous sore mouth and tongue with burning; small warts or hard papules on skin especially hands
Worse_From: Eating especially solid or spicy food; pressure over epigastrium; strong acids; mental worry with empty stomach
Better_From: Small bland meals; cool drinks in sips; rest after eating; avoiding acids and spices
Notes_Sphere: Gastric and mucous membrane sphere; ulcerative stomach and mouth complaints with burning pains and acidity

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally dull yet excitable; great irritability when tired; memory weak for words and names; sadness from sexual and nervous exhaustion
General_Themes: Acts on nervous system and sexual organs; profound debility after slight exertion; great weakness from heat and sweating; sexual weakness with emissions; hair loss and nail fragility
Key_Local_Symptoms: Great weakness after any effort out of proportion to exertion; trembling and fatigue in legs when walking; nightly emissions with or without dreams and marked prostration; dribbling of urine after voiding; early loss of hair from scalp and genitals; dry cracked nails splitting easily
Worse_From: Hot weather; sun heat; slightest exertion; mental work; loss of fluids especially semen
Better_From: Cool open air; rest; sleep though too much may still leave weakness; moderate gentle exercise in cool times of day
Notes_Sphere: Nervous sexual and trophic sphere; post sexual and heat exhaustion with hair loss weak nails and great debility from small efforts

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable anxious and sleepless from burning facial or oral pains; depressed when sores do not heal; hypersensitive to touch on affected parts
General_Themes: Acts on skin and mucous membranes especially lips tongue and cheeks; herpes and ulcerations; burning stinging pains; sometimes used in suspicion of malignant disease of tongue or breast
Key_Local_Symptoms: Herpetic eruptions or ulcers about lips tongue and mouth with intense burning and stinging; tongue sore with fissures and grey or whitish patches; burning shooting pains in suspected cancer of tongue or breast; raw cracked corners of mouth
Worse_From: Heat; warm food or drinks; talking or moving tongue; sour or salty food; touch and pressure
Better_From: Cool water held in mouth; cold applications; rest of part; bland simple diet
Notes_Sphere: Oral mucous membrane and skin; herpes and ulcerative or suspected malignant lesions of mouth lips and sometimes breast with intense burning and stinging pains

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous anxious and apprehensive; over conscientious; depressed from pelvic and urinary symptoms; feels run down and strained
General_Themes: Acts on female pelvic organs and urinary tract; delayed or suppressed menses in young girls; menorrhagia or metrorrhagia; irritable bladder; tendency to haemorrhoids; sometimes called male pulsatilla
Key_Local_Symptoms: Pelvic fulness and bearing down with backache; delayed scanty or suppressed menses with headache and nervousness; frequent urging to urinate with burning smarting and small quantities; mucous leucorrhoea in girls at puberty; dull sacral pain and weight in pelvis
Worse_From: Exposure to cold and damp; exertion; standing long; mental strain; onset of menses
Better_From: Warmth; rest; lying down with hips slightly raised; moderate regular exercise once circulation is improved
Notes_Sphere: Female pelvic and urinary sphere; menstrual irregularities and irritable bladder especially around puberty or in nervous sensitive patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious depressed and easily discouraged; feels chest symptoms will suffocate; old people fearful when expectoration is difficult
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes of respiratory tract; old people’s chronic bronchitis; much mucus with weakness; tough stringy expectoration hard to raise; pleurodynia and chest wall pains
Key_Local_Symptoms: Rattling in chest with abundant mucus which must be forced out by great effort; cough fatiguing with burning soreness behind sternum; pain in chest walls and sides as if bruised especially on coughing or deep breathing; oedema of lungs in cardiac disease; voice husky from laryngeal catarrh
Worse_From: Cold damp air; ascending stairs; slightest exertion; talking; at night when lying down
Better_From: Sitting up and leaning forward; warm drinks; slow deep breathing; gentle expectoration
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory sphere; chronic bronchitis asthma and cardiac lung troubles with much tough mucus difficult to expel especially in elderly or weakened patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Peevish fretful and dissatisfied especially in children; oversensitive to slightest discomfort; anxious from colic and distension
General_Themes: Acts on intestinal tract; cathartic remedy; colic with much flatus; green watery stools in children; sluggish digestion from drugging or overfeeding
Key_Local_Symptoms: Colicky griping pains about navel with much rumbling and gas; stools green watery slimy or mixed with undigested food especially in infants; abdomen hard and distended; urging to stool with only small evacuation; offensive flatus
Worse_From: Overfeeding especially sweets or rich food; drugging with laxatives; night; cold drinks on sensitive stomach
Better_From: Warmth to abdomen; gentle rubbing; passage of flatus and stool; light simple feeding
Notes_Sphere: Intestinal sphere; colic and green watery stools in overfed or drugged children with much wind and fretfulness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Indifferent to loved ones; wants to be alone and not bothered; easily irritated and offended; sadness with weeping yet feels better from vigorous exercise; sense of bearing heavy burden of duties
General_Themes: Acts on female pelvic organs portal system and nerves; venous congestion; prolapse and relaxation of uterus and vagina; yellow discharges; liver sluggishness; chilliness with hot flushes and perspiration; brownish chloasma across nose and cheeks
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sensation of bearing down in pelvis as if everything would fall out must sit with legs crossed or press vulva; dragging backache from sacrum to pelvis; yellow green or milky leucorrhoea often offensive; irregular menses with scanty or profuse flow and cramps; morning sickness and nausea from sight or smell of food; constipation with sense of lump in rectum; chilliness with hot flushes and perspiration especially at climacteric; yellow saddle across nose
Worse_From: Standing long; housework; pregnancy and lactation strain; before menses; from cold damp; in forenoon especially about eleven; after sexual excess; consolation when she wishes to be let alone
Better_From: Violent exercise such as brisk walking or dancing; warm applications; lying on right side; being in open fresh air; occupation of mind and body
Notes_Sphere: Female pelvic hepatic and nervous sphere; prolapse and venous congestion with bearing down sensation and emotional indifference in worn out chilly women who improve from vigorous motion and open air

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Great anxiety and restlessness from difficult breathing and suppression of urine; fear of impending death; mental dulness and apathy in advanced cardiac–renal failure
General_Themes: Acts sharply on kidneys, heart and blood; acute nephritis with oliguria or anuria; uremic states with dyspnoea and cyanosis; cardiac failure with oedema and pulmonary congestion
Key_Local_Symptoms: Rapidly diminishing or suppressed urine with dark, scanty output; oedema of legs, face and eyelids; severe dyspnoea with sense of suffocation and need to sit up; cyanosed lips and nails; headache, nausea and drowsiness of uremia; weak, irregular pulse and cardiac oppression
Worse_From: Acute nephritic attacks; exertion; lying flat; night; cold damp weather
Better_From: Sitting propped up; cool, fresh air; gradual increase of urine flow; absolute rest
Notes_Sphere: Renal and cardiac sphere; acute nephritis, uremia and heart failure with oliguria/anuria, oedema and suffocative dyspnoea

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Timid, yielding yet internally obstinate; lacks self-confidence, anticipates failure; easily discouraged and over-sensitive to criticism; fixed ideas and fear of pins, needles and sharp things; chilly and wants to be warmly wrapped
General_Themes: Deep-acting constitutional remedy; slow nutrition and defective assimilation; tendency to suppuration in glands, bones and connective tissue; weak spine and feet; profuse offensive foot-sweat; chilliness with lack of vital heat
Key_Local_Symptoms: Recurrent abscesses, boils and fistulous tracts that heal slowly or repeatedly break down; swollen, hard glands that suppurate; caries and necrosis of bone; headaches from the nape rising to vertex, worse mental exertion; offensive foot-sweat excoriating toes; constipation with stool partly expelled then recedes; nails brittle, distorted
Worse_From: Cold, especially feet; uncovering head or feet; drafts; mental exertion; new moon; vaccination or suppressed suppurations
Better_From: Warm, dry climate; wrapping up warmly, especially head and feet; gentle continued effort after starting; bringing out and discharging pus fully
Notes_Sphere: Nutritional, glandular and osseous sphere; chronic suppurations, bone and gland disease, and weakness in chilly, delicate patients lacking stamina

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious and fretful from constant tightness and irritation in chest; mentally depressed in chronic catarrhal or asthmatic states; children restless and worried by cough
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes of respiratory tract; chronic bronchial catarrh and asthma; hay asthma with much mucus; tendency to thick, tenacious secretions
Key_Local_Symptoms: Paroxysmal, asthmatic cough with profuse, stringy mucus difficult to raise; oppression and tightness across chest, worse at night; constant hemming and hawking from laryngeal irritation; hay-asthma attacks with wheezing and catarrh
Worse_From: Night; lying down; exposure to dust and pollen; cold damp air; exertion
Better_From: Sitting up, leaning forward; warm drinks; warm, evenly humid air; slow, deep breathing
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory sphere; chronic bronchitis, asthma and hay asthma with abundant, tenacious mucus and chest oppression

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless, irritable and anxious; mental oppression as if a weight on head and chest; fearful when laryngeal constriction is marked
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes of nose, throat and larynx; dry, burning catarrh; spasmodic laryngeal cough; sensations of localised burning spots, especially behind sternum and in throat
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dry, hacking, laryngeal cough with burning in throat and chest; sensation of a hot spot or plug behind sternum; dryness of nose and throat with little or no discharge, yet constant desire to clear; hoarseness and constriction in larynx; left-sided headaches and facial heat
Worse_From: Talking; dry, heated rooms; sudden changes of temperature; odors and smoke; night
Better_From: Cool, moist air (not cold); warm, bland drinks; rest of voice; gentle expectoration
Notes_Sphere: Upper respiratory and laryngeal sphere; dry catarrh, laryngitis and spasmodic cough with burning spots and constriction, often left-sided

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, irritable and mentally dull; depressed from chronic intestinal foulness; feels heavy and stupefied with headache and offensive flatus
General_Themes: Acts on intestinal tract and blood; auto-intoxication from putrid fermentation; foul flatus and stools; headaches and lassitude from intestinal toxemia
Key_Local_Symptoms: Offensive, putrid flatus and stools with much rumbling; coated tongue with bad taste and fetid breath; dull, heavy headache, worse in forehead and temples, improved after stool; nausea and fullness after small quantities of food; sallow complexion and dark under-eye circles
Worse_From: Rich, heavy food; long intervals between meals; sedentary habits; constipation or incomplete evacuation
Better_From: Regular, thorough stool; light, non-putrefactive diet; plenty of water; moderate outdoor exercise
Notes_Sphere: Digestive and systemic sphere; intestinal auto-intoxication with foul gas, dull headaches and lassitude in sedentary, dyspeptic patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, restless and uncomfortable from persistent itching and catarrh; children cross and wakeful from eczema or ear discharges
General_Themes: Acts on skin, mucous membranes and glands; chronic eczema and urticaria; otitis with profuse discharge; hay fever and allergic catarrh; glandular enlargement
Key_Local_Symptoms: Thick, scaly or moist eczema with intense itching, especially in flexures and behind ears; chronic otorrhoea with offensive discharge and excoriated skin; recurrent colds, hay fever and catarrh of nose and throat with much mucus; enlarged, tender lymph glands
Worse_From: Milk and certain foods; bathing with irritating soaps; heat of bed; spring and autumn for allergic complaints
Better_From: Cool, bland applications; simple diet avoiding known triggers; dry, pure air; gentle cleansing with non-irritant washes
Notes_Sphere: Skin, glandular and catarrhal sphere; eczema, otorrhoea and hay fever in scrofulous or allergic constitutions with much itching and gland swelling

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, confused and fearful; delirium with frightful visions; great nervous excitement passing into stupor; mental oppression in cerebral irritation
General_Themes: Acts on brain and spinal cord; produces convulsions, tremors and delirium; meningitic and encephalitic states; also gastro-intestinal irritation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Head hot, face flushed or dark; delirium with muttering or wild excitement; twitching of muscles and spasms, sometimes epileptiform; pupils dilated, eyes staring; vomiting and diarrhoea with abdominal colic; great prostration following convulsions
Worse_From: Bright light, noise and jarring; high fever; sudden movement; emotional excitement
Better_From: Dark, quiet room; absolute rest; head slightly raised; cool applications to head
Notes_Sphere: Cerebral and nervous sphere; convulsive, meningitic or encephalitic states with delirium, twitching and great prostration

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, depressed and hypochondriacal; mental dulness and low spirits in chronic kidney or bladder disease; feels sore and bruised in back
General_Themes: Acts on kidneys, ureters and bladder; nephritis, gravel and catarrh; lumbar backache from renal congestion; also some action on respiratory mucosa in catarrh
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dull aching or bruised pain in region of kidneys, worse pressure and motion; frequent urging to urinate with scanty, dark or albuminous urine; burning or smarting in urethra; back and loins feel tired and sore; sometimes catarrhal bronchitis or hay fever with kidney symptoms combined
Worse_From: Walking or standing long; pressure in renal region; cold damp weather; taking cold; using coffee or irritating drinks
Better_From: Warmth; rest with back supported; copious drinking of water (when tolerated); dry, mild climate
Notes_Sphere: Renal and urinary sphere; kidney and bladder catarrh, gravel and lumbar backache in irritable, sensitive patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, fearful and apprehensive, especially about the heart; sensitive to noise and touch; nervous, excitable and easily startled; feels heart will stop if he moves
General_Themes: Acts on trigeminal nerve and heart; left-sided neuralgia of face and eye; acute carditis and angina; rheumatic heart disease; marked periodicity of pains
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent, stabbing, neuralgic pains over left eye and orbit, radiating to temple and occiput; eye feels too large for orbit, very sensitive to motion and touch; palpitation with violent, visible beating of heart, worse on slightest motion and lying on left side; precordial pains radiating to left arm and back; pulse weak and irregular
Worse_From: Motion, especially of arms or trunk; lying on left side; noise and jarring; morning for neuralgia; cold air on face
Better_From: Rest; lying on right side with head high; warm applications; dark, quiet room
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and cardiac sphere; left-sided trigeminal neuralgia and rheumatic heart/anginal pains with great anxiety and motion-aggravation

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, irritable and anxious about sexual weakness; mentally dull and apathetic after repeated emissions; emotional lowness in old men with prostatic trouble
General_Themes: Acts on genito-urinary organs and spine; spermatorrhoea and nocturnal emissions; sexual weakness; prostatic enlargement with dribbling; nervous exhaustion from sexual excess
Key_Local_Symptoms: Frequent involuntary emissions with great weakness and trembling; loss of sexual desire and power; dull aching in lumbosacral region and along spine; frequent urging to urinate with dribbling and incomplete emptying, especially in older men; general lassitude and want of stamina
Worse_From: Sexual excesses or masturbation; dwelling on sexual ideas; prolonged standing or sitting; night in bed
Better_From: Abstinence and regulation of sexual life; rest lying down; warmth to back and pelvis; moderate, non-fatiguing exercise
Notes_Sphere: Genito-urinary and nervous sphere; spermatorrhoea, prostatic irritation and spinal weakness with depression and great post-emission exhaustion

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited and dull from long-standing gastric or rheumatic trouble; easily worried and oversensitive when digestion is upset; children peevish with sour stomach
General_Themes: Acts on stomach, liver and joints; atonic dyspepsia with sourness and heartburn; tendency to rheumatic and gouty pains in limbs; often suited to sluggish, acid subjects
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sour eructations and heartburn after rich food; dull aching or weight in epigastrium and right hypochondrium; bilious headaches with nausea; wandering rheumatic pains in limbs, worse damp; tendency to acid, offensive perspiration
Worse_From: Rich or fatty food; beer and fermented drinks; damp, chilly weather; overeating; mental worry after meals
Better_From: Light, simple diet; warm drinks; gentle exercise after eating; dry, warm climate or room
Notes_Sphere: Digestive and rheumatic sphere; acid dyspepsia with bilious headaches and wandering rheumatic pains in sluggish, acid, worry-prone patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious and fearful, especially about suffocation; wakes from sleep in fright, clutching at the larynx; restless and irritable during croupy attacks
General_Themes: Acts on larynx, trachea and heart; dry, barking, sawing cough; croup and laryngitis with great dryness; valvular heart troubles with palpitation and anxiety; glandular swellings of neck
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dry, hoarse, barking cough as if a saw were driven through a board; larynx dry, burning, sensitive to touch; must sit up and lean forward to breathe; suffocative spells on waking; palpitation with throbbing in chest and carotids, worse lying; thyroid and cervical glands swollen and tender
Worse_From: Before midnight; during sleep (sudden waking in suffocation); dry, cold wind; talking; lying with head low
Better_From: Sitting up and leaning forward; warm room and warm drinks; eating or drinking something warm during croup; gentle reassurance
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory and cardiac sphere; dry croupy coughs and valvular heart complaints with marked suffocation anxiety and dryness of air-passages

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, restless and easily startled; peevish and low from constant cough and chest irritation; mental dulness in long-standing bronchial trouble
General_Themes: Acts on respiratory and serous membranes; violent cough with copious mucous expectoration; hydrothorax and dropsy; marked sneezing and nasal catarrh; cutting abdominal pains with urging
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent, exhausting cough ending in copious, thin mucus and often involuntary urination; sharp stitching or tearing pains in chest and abdomen when coughing or sneezing; frequent sneezing with watery coryza; sharp, cutting colic before stool with copious thin evacuations
Worse_From: Coughing, sneezing and deep breathing; motion; cold, damp weather; lying on painful side; early morning
Better_From: Sitting bent forward while coughing; warm room; after free expectoration or stool; gentle rest
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory and serous sphere; violent cough with chest and abdominal pains, copious mucus and tendencies to hydrothorax or dropsical states

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, apprehensive and easily alarmed; melancholic and hypochondriacal; mentally dull with tendency to brood over trifles
General_Themes: Acts on head and nerves; congestive and nervous headaches; vertigo; functional nervous states with palpitations and faintness; some action on digestive tract with flatulence
Key_Local_Symptoms: Heavy, congestive headaches in forehead and temples, worse mental exertion and stooping; vertigo with tendency to fall forward; fluttering and palpitation with fainty feeling; flatulence with rumbling and abdominal discomfort
Worse_From: Mental exertion; stooping or bending head low; close rooms; emotional excitement
Better_From: Open, cool air; gentle motion in fresh air; rest with head supported; light food
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and cephalic sphere; congestive, nervous headaches and vertigo in anxious, hypochondriacal patients with flatulent dyspepsia

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Profoundly weak, despondent and tearful; feels all strength has gone; better for talking though it soon exhausts; fears some serious disease of lungs or nerves
General_Themes: Acts on nervous system and respiratory organs; extreme weakness from least exertion; catarrhal and suppurative lung disease; ptosis and prolapse from muscle weakness; sensation of emptiness in chest
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense weakness in chest as if all strength were gone, must sit or lie down; cough with copious, thick, sweet or salty expectoration, leaving patient exhausted; voice weak, easily tired from talking or singing; bruised, aching pains in limbs, especially flexor muscles, better pressure and support
Worse_From: Talking or using voice; climbing stairs; slightest exertion; from 10 a.m. to afternoon; prolonged coughing
Better_From: Rest; firm pressure or support on painful parts; sitting bent forward with elbows on knees; open air in moderation
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory and nervous sphere; chronic bronchitis or phthisis and neurasthenia with great prostration, empty chest feeling and relief from pressure and support

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Very sensitive, refined and easily offended; bottled-up anger from indignation or humiliation; ailments from wounded pride, insults or sexual abuse; throws things when alone yet appears mild in company
General_Themes: Acts on nerves, urinary and genital organs and skin; effects of suppressed anger and sexual excess or abuse; cystitis after instrumentation; styes, chalazia and dental caries; tendency to nervous tremors
Key_Local_Symptoms: Urging to urinate with burning and cutting during and after urination, especially after catheterization or coitus; sensation of ball or plug in rectum or bladder; styes and recurrent chalazia along eyelids; teeth crumble or decay quickly with toothache from slightest touch; itching, pediculosis and excoriated eruptions from scratching
Worse_From: Emotional shocks, insults and indignation; sexual excess or onanism; touch of affected parts; after operations or instrumentation (especially urinary)
Better_From: Gentle expression of feelings; warm applications; rest and quiet; consolation when anger is acknowledged rather than suppressed
Notes_Sphere: Nervous, genito-urinary and cutaneous sphere; consequences of suppressed anger, humiliation and sexual trauma with cystitis, eye-styes and dental or skin troubles

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, despondent and weary; mental dulness in chronic rheumatic and gouty states; easily discouraged by persistent pains
General_Themes: Acts on fibrous tissues, joints and muscles; rheumatism and gout; fibrositis of shoulders and hips; also some action on abdominal wall and ovaries
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sharp, darting, rheumatic pains through shoulders, chest walls, hips and knees; pains shift about and may be worse right shoulder and hip; soreness of abdominal wall and ovarian region; aggravated by motion and touch
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; motion and walking; pressure on sore muscles; sudden strain
Better_From: Rest; warmth; dry climate; gentle stretching once acute pain subsides
Notes_Sphere: Musculo-skeletal sphere; rheumatic and gouty fibrositis with shifting sharp pains, especially shoulder and hip, in chilly, easily discouraged patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless, fidgety and cannot keep still; mind feels dull and heavy from head and nasal congestion; irritable from constant desire to blow nose without result
General_Themes: Acts on upper respiratory tract; dry catarrh of nose and sinuses; dull, bursting frontal headaches; laryngeal and tracheal irritation with dry, backing cough
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense stuffiness of nose with sensation as if it would burst, yet little or no discharge; constant desire to blow nose but nothing comes; dull, heavy frontal headache; dry, hacking, teasing cough from tickling in larynx and trachea; catarrh extending to bronchi
Worse_From: Change of weather; cold, damp air; night; lying down; talking
Better_From: Warm, dry air; sitting propped up; warm drinks; gradual onset of free nasal discharge
Notes_Sphere: Nasal and respiratory sphere; dry, obstructive catarrh and sinus headache with useless nose-blowing and teasing dry cough

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, irritable and anxious about urinary troubles; mental dulness and fatigue in chronic kidney or bladder conditions
General_Themes: Acts on kidneys, bladder and prostate; catarrhal cystitis; gravel and phosphatic deposits; enuresis in children; urinary irritation of menopause or old age
Key_Local_Symptoms: Frequent urging to urinate with burning in urethra and bladder; urine cloudy, with mucus, phosphates or fine gravel; dull aching in kidneys and across small of back; in children, bed-wetting from irritability of bladder; in women, urinary frequency and burning at climacteric
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; getting chilled; acids and highly seasoned food; long standing or walking
Better_From: Warmth; copious intake of water (when tolerated); rest with back supported; bland, non-irritating diet
Notes_Sphere: Urinary sphere; catarrhal cystitis, gravel and enuresis with mucous or phosphatic sediment and lumbar aching

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, irritable and hypochondriacal; anxious about bones, throat or glands; mentally dull in chronic syphilitic or rheumatic states
General_Themes: Acts on periosteum, bones, glands and mucous membranes; syphilitic and rheumatic affections; bone pains, especially at night; chronic laryngitis and bronchial catarrh; glandular enlargement
Key_Local_Symptoms: Boring, aching pains in bones of legs and head, worse at night and damp; chronic laryngitis with hoarseness, scraping and constant inclination to clear throat; dry, teasing cough with rawness in chest; enlarged cervical and other glands, sometimes indurated; eruptions or ulcers in throat and on skin in syphilitic diathesis
Worse_From: Night, especially after midnight; damp cold weather; exertion; sudden temperature changes
Better_From: Dry, warm air; gentle, continued motion; rest with part supported; warm drinks for throat
Notes_Sphere: Osseous, glandular and respiratory sphere; bone and gland pains, chronic laryngitis and syphilitic or rheumatic complaints with night aggravation and raw, scraping sensations

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Violent, terrified, delirious; intense fear of darkness, being alone, water, animals and shining objects; clings to people, prays, talks incessantly or screams with wild eyes; rage, mania and loquacity alternating with stupor
General_Themes: Intense action on brain and nerves; delirium, convulsions and spasms after fright or fever; choreic movements; marked dryness of mouth and throat; great sensitivity to light and glittering objects
Key_Local_Symptoms: Wild staring eyes with dilated pupils; face flushed, distorted, with grimaces; dryness of mouth and throat, cannot swallow liquids though asks for water; violent convulsions with opisthotonos and jerks; spasmodic cough and asthma with suffocative fear; no thirst in fever or intense thirst for cold water in spells
Worse_From: Darkness; being alone; sight of water or mirror; after fright or sunstroke; during sleep and on waking; bright light and noise
Better_From: Company; bright light in room (compared to dark); warmth; being held or reassured; sitting partially upright
Notes_Sphere: Brain and nervous system; acute delirium, night-terrors and spasmodic conditions after fright, with extreme fear, violence and dryness of throat

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, restless and depressed; fearful and easily startled after shock or injury; feels forsaken and lonely at night; apprehensive about heart and circulation
General_Themes: Acts on bones, blood-vessels and circulation; chronic effects of fractures and sprains; poor reaction after shock, operation or haemorrhage; hot flushes and vascular disturbances in elderly or climacteric patients
Key_Local_Symptoms: Coldness and weakness with sudden flushes of heat and sweat; painful, slow-healing joints after sprains; burning in feet at night; throbbing in head and limbs with weak, irregular pulse; diarrhoea after fruit or cold food in delicate old people
Worse_From: Standing or walking long; exertion after weakness or shock; cold, damp weather; fruit and cold food
Better_From: Rest; warmth; lying with head high; gentle, gradual exercise after convalescence
Notes_Sphere: Circulatory and osseous sphere; poor recovery after trauma, fractures or shock, with vascular instability, flushes and joint pain in weakened patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, fearful and depressed about heart; easily frightened by palpitations; mentally tired and irritable from least exertion
General_Themes: Powerful heart tonic; acts on myocardium and circulation like digitalis but milder; dilated, weak heart with breathlessness; dropsy of ankles and lungs; supports compensation in valvular disease
Key_Local_Symptoms: Palpitation and precordial oppression from slight effort; pulse weak, irregular or rapid; dyspnoea on ascending, must stop and hold chest; oedema of ankles and feet; cyanosis and cold extremities in failing heart; sometimes scanty urine in cardiac dropsy
Worse_From: Exertion, especially climbing stairs or uphill; emotional excitement; lying flat in bed; warm, close rooms
Better_From: Rest; sitting propped up in bed or chair; cool, fresh air; slow, measured movements
Notes_Sphere: Cardiac and circulatory sphere; dilated, failing heart with breathlessness, ankle oedema and easy exhaustion from minimal exertion

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Extremely irritable, tense and anxious; easily startled by slightest noise or touch; fearful and apprehensive, cannot relax; mind over-excited yet soon exhausted
General_Themes: Acts intensively on spinal cord and motor nerves; great hyperaesthesia of all senses; tetanic spasms and convulsions; rigid muscles and exaggerated reflexes; small stimuli cause violent reactions
Key_Local_Symptoms: Twitching and jerking of muscles passing into tetanic spasms; slightest touch, noise or draft causes violent start or spasm; back stiff, arched; jaws clenched; pains in spine as if broken; insomnia from spinal irritation and over-excitement
Worse_From: Sudden noise, touch or motion; cold drafts; emotional excitement; attempting voluntary movement
Better_From: Complete rest in quiet, dark room; warmth; absolute avoidance of sudden stimuli
Notes_Sphere: Spinal and motor nervous sphere; convulsive and hyperreflex states with extreme sensitivity to impressions and tendency to tetanic spasms

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Overstrained, irritable and anxious; mental confusion and poor memory; depressed from spinal and nervous exhaustion; dreads exertion yet feels driven
General_Themes: Acts on spinal cord and brain; neurasthenia from overwork, worry or sexual excess; weakness with trembling and twitching; insomnia from nervous irritability
Key_Local_Symptoms: Backache and spinal soreness with great weakness after slight exertion; trembling of hands and legs; twitching of muscles when trying to fall asleep; occipital or spinal headaches from mental strain; palpitation from minor effort with sense of collapse
Worse_From: Mental or physical overwork; worry; sexual excess; cold drafts on spine; attempting sustained effort
Better_From: Rest; warmth to back; short breaks during work; gentle, non-straining exercise once steadier
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and spinal sphere; neurasthenia and spinal irritation with trembling, twitching and easy exhaustion after slight exertion or overwork

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, gloomy and apprehensive; irritable and hypersensitive to noise and contradiction; mental dullness with spinal pains
General_Themes: Acts on spinal cord, peripheral nerves and skin; paralytic states following infections or toxins; neuralgia and spinal pains; used in some chronic skin and leprous conditions in old literature
Key_Local_Symptoms: Tingling, numbness and weakness in limbs; unsteady gait with tendency to stumble; aching and soreness along spine; neuralgic pains in peripheral nerves; sometimes anaesthetic or discoloured skin patches in chronic cases
Worse_From: Exertion; prolonged standing; cold damp weather; emotional upset in weakened state
Better_From: Rest; warmth; gentle rubbing of affected limbs; gradual exercise as strength allows
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and trophic sphere; spinal and peripheral nerve weakness with numbness, neuralgia and gradual loss of power in chronically debilitated patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless, fidgety and anxious children; frightened easily with night-terrors; oversensitive, nervous types who react strongly to pain and noise
General_Themes: Traditional amber remedy; antispasmodic and calming; dentition troubles; spasmodic coughs and whooping-cough; nervous convulsions in delicate children
Key_Local_Symptoms: Spasmodic, choking cough in fits, child becomes blue and rigid; teething with great irritability, biting and crying; twitching of limbs or slight convulsive movements from excitement; disturbed sleep with sudden waking in fright
Worse_From: Teething; excitement; fright; night on falling asleep; cold air during cough attacks
Better_From: Being carried and soothed; warm room; gentle rubbing and holding; expectoration after cough
Notes_Sphere: Paediatric nervous and respiratory sphere; teething, spasmodic coughs and mild convulsive tendencies in overreactive, easily frightened children

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Hurried, anxious and easily startled; feels everything must be done quickly; internally trembling; melancholic and irritable with sense of weakness and sinking
General_Themes: Acts on blood-vessels, mucous membranes and digestive tract; tendency to haemorrhages and easy bruising; chronic alcoholism; sourness and heartburn; rapid debility and tremor
Key_Local_Symptoms: Extreme weakness with internal trembling; ecchymoses and bruises from slight knocks; haemorrhages of dark, thin blood that oozes and clots poorly; sour, acrid eructations and vomiting that set teeth on edge; heartburn with craving for alcohol or stimulants; sensation of rawness and soreness in throat and stomach
Worse_From: Motion and exertion; alcohol in sensitive states; cold, damp weather; mental strain when exhausted
Better_From: Rest; cool, bland drinks; gentle support and feeding in small quantities; avoidance of stimulants
Notes_Sphere: Vascular and digestive sphere; haemorrhagic tendencies, easy bruising and sour gastric states with great weakness and hurried, trembling feeling

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless, irritable and easily overheated; nervous and excitable with alternating depression; adolescents sensitive about appearance and glands
General_Themes: Combines features of Sulphur and Iodum; acts on lymphatic glands, skin and respiratory tract; scrofulous and tubercular tendencies; enlarged tonsils and glands; acne and chronic eruptions
Key_Local_Symptoms: Chronic enlargement of tonsils and cervical glands; adenoids with mouth-breathing; persistent catarrh of nose and throat; acne, pustules and papular eruptions on face, shoulders and back; tendency to emaciation above with relatively large abdomen in youth
Worse_From: Warm, stuffy rooms; overheating in bed; exertion in hot weather; milk and rich food in some subjects
Better_From: Cool, fresh air; moderate, regular exercise; light, simple diet; open-air life
Notes_Sphere: Glandular, cutaneous and respiratory sphere; scrofulous children and youths with enlarged tonsils and glands, acne and chronic catarrh who are warm-blooded and restless

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, apathetic and mentally dull; stupefied, as if intoxicated; irritable when roused from heavy, unrefreshing sleep; fear of losing control
General_Themes: Drug-remedy for effects of hypnotic poisoning; profound drowsiness with poor coordination; vertigo, staggering gait and paraesthesia; circulatory and nervous depression
Key_Local_Symptoms: Great drowsiness yet sleep unrefreshing; staggering, ataxic gait as if drunk; heaviness of head with vertigo; numbness and tingling in extremities; coldness of hands and feet; prostration after smallest effort
Worse_From: After doses of hypnotic drugs; mental exertion; standing or walking; sudden rising from bed
Better_From: Lying down; absolute rest; fresh air in moderation; discontinuance of drug and gentle nursing
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and drug-toxic sphere; ataxia, vertigo and prostration from hypnotic or sedative overuse with heavy, unrefreshing sleep and numbness of extremities

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, anxious and depressed during septic or catarrhal states; mentally dull and heavy with sense of oppression and foulness; discouraged by persistent throat and chest symptoms
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes and blood; low septic or catarrhal conditions of throat, bronchi and stomach; foul breath and discharges; great prostration with chilliness and periodic feverish attacks
Key_Local_Symptoms: Raw, burning, ulcerated throat with foetid breath; thick, offensive mucus in nose and chest; short, hacking cough with soreness behind sternum; sour, offensive eructations and gastric irritation; general chilliness with low-grade fever and night sweats
Worse_From: Cold, damp air; exertion; night; lying flat when chest is oppressed; suppression of natural discharges
Better_From: Warmth; rest; gentle expectoration of mucus; warm, bland drinks
Notes_Sphere: Catarrhal and septic sphere; foul throat and chest catarrh with burning, ulcerated mucosa, offensive odour and marked fatigue

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Careless, philosophical, somewhat egotistical; imaginative, theorizing; indolent yet restless; irritable and critical when disturbed; aversion to bathing; anxiety about health and salvation, especially at night; feels he will not recover but is not much afraid
General_Themes: Deep antipsoric acting on skin, circulation and all organs; venous congestion; heat at vertex and in soles; offensive discharges; tendency to chronic eruptions and catarrh; aggravation from standing and from bathing; “ragged philosopher” type who neglects appearance
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning itching eruptions that are worse from warmth of bed and scratching, then become sore; unhealthy skin, every little injury suppurates; offensive foot-sweat; morning diarrhoea driving out of bed; piles that itch and burn; heat on top of head, must uncover; red orifices (nose, lips, anus, vulva); sense of sinking at 11 a.m. with hunger-faintness
Worse_From: Heat, especially in bed; standing long; bathing; suppression of eruptions or discharges; 11 a.m.; rich food and alcohol
Better_From: Dry, warm weather (not too hot); open air though patient easily chilled; lying on right side; loosening tight clothing; bringing out eruptions or discharges
Notes_Sphere: Constitutional, cutaneous and portal sphere; chronic skin and catarrhal complaints, haemorrhoids and venous congestion in warm-blooded, untidy, critical patients who are worse heat and bathing

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Highly emotional, impressionable and hysterical; alternation of exaltation and depression; nervous, tremulous and oversensitive to noise and odours; feels heart and nerves are overstrained
General_Themes: Acts on nervous system and circulation; hysterical and neurasthenic states; functional palpitations; smelling remedy with action like musk; nervous digestive complaints and menstrual irregularities
Key_Local_Symptoms: Palpitations and fluttering of heart from emotions or slight exertion; sighing and gasping with nervous tightness in chest; globus hystericus and choking sensations; flatulent distension with sinking at pit of stomach; irregular or suppressed menses with hysterical outbursts
Worse_From: Emotional excitement; coffee and stimulants; fatigue; closed, stuffy rooms and strong odours
Better_From: Open, fresh air; rest; gentle company and soothing conversation; light, easily digested food
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and circulatory sphere; functional palpitations, hysteria and neurasthenia in sensitive, perfumelike-smell-responsive patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous, excitable and imaginative; hysterical laughing and crying; fearful, anxious and oversensitive to impressions; better from pleasant diversion and music
General_Themes: Marked action on nervous system, circulation and female organs; hysterical and syncopal attacks; functional heart disorders; irregular menses with nervous symptoms; tendency to spasmodic and fainting fits
Key_Local_Symptoms: Palpitation with throbbing carotids and tendency to faint; hysterical attacks with globus, choking and functional aphonia; nervous spasmodic cough; irregular, painful or suppressed menses with great nervous unrest; chilliness followed by flushes and sweat in delicate women
Worse_From: Emotional disturbance; strong smells and close rooms; mental strain; sexual excitement; fatigue
Better_From: Fresh, cool air; quiet, sympathetic company; music; gentle rest with head raised
Notes_Sphere: Nervous, circulatory and female sphere; hysterical and functional cardiac complaints, menstrual irregularities and faintness in sensitive, perfumy-remedy type patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Despondent, miserable and anxious from constant nausea; aversion to food and company; pregnant women feel wretched and hopeless about ever being free of sickness
General_Themes: Acts strongly on stomach, especially in pregnancy; obstinate nausea and vomiting of pregnancy; seasickness-like states; some action in menstrual nausea and uterine derangements
Key_Local_Symptoms: Persistent nausea with inclination to vomit at sight or smell of food; vomiting of food and bile, especially in pregnancy; extreme aversion to food, even thought of it sickens; sense of weight and sinking at pit of stomach; constipation often accompanying pregnancy vomiting
Worse_From: Motion, especially riding in vehicles; sight or smell of food; pregnancy; least attempt to eat
Better_From: Absolute rest; small sips of cold water or ice; avoidance of food odours; lying quietly on right side or back
Notes_Sphere: Gastric and uterine sphere; obstinate vomiting of pregnancy and motion-sickness-like nausea with profound aversion to food and great despondency

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, low and oversensitive from bone and periosteal pains; anxious about results of injuries; children peevish when traumatized parts ache
General_Themes: Specific bone-repair remedy; promotes union of fractures; injuries to bone, cartilage and periosteum; traumatic eye injuries from blunt objects; non-union and painful callus
Key_Local_Symptoms: Excessive soreness and pain in region of fractures, as if bone were being scraped; slow or delayed union of broken bones; bruised, thrust-like pain in eyeball after blow from fist or stone; periosteal soreness and aching after contusions
Worse_From: Local injury and pressure; movement of fractured limb; cold, damp weather; too early use of limb
Better_From: Rest and immobilization of part; firm but gentle support or bandaging; warmth; time and proper alignment
Notes_Sphere: Osseous and traumatic sphere; promotes healing and relieves pain in fractures, bone bruises and periosteal injuries, and blunt trauma to the eyeball

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Hopeless, despairing and haunted by sense of doom; feels cursed or fated to disease; compulsive washing of hands and body; fears losing reason; insomnia from anxiety and bone pains
General_Themes: Deep-acting nosode of syphilitic miasm; destructive processes in bones, mucous membranes and skin; ulceration, caries and deformity; marked night aggravation and periodicity; inherited or acquired taint
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent bone pains, especially at night, driving from bed (worse 2–4 a.m.); headaches as if skull would burst, often from occiput to forehead; recurrent ulcerations of mouth, throat and genitals; deep fissures and rhagades about orifices; offensive, thin discharges; recurring complaints with fixed periodicity or “never well since” syphilitic history
Worse_From: Night, especially after midnight; damp, cold; change of weather; rest in bed; suppression of discharges; mental exertion
Better_From: Dry, warm climate; moving about gently at night; hot applications to painful bones; free, natural discharges
