Notes_Sphere: Chronic destructive sphere; inherited or acquired syphilitic states with bone pains, ulceration, offensive discharges and strong night aggravation with despair and obsessive washing

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, weak and apathetic; worried and anxious about diabetes and its complications; irritable when hungry or when thirst is unrelieved
General_Themes: Acts on pancreas and metabolism; lowers blood sugar in many diabetics; intense polyuria and polydipsia; emaciation despite good appetite; boils and skin irritations in diabetics
Key_Local_Symptoms: Profuse urination, often pale and copious, with intense thirst; excessive appetite yet loss of flesh; furuncles, carbuncles and itching eruptions in diabetic subjects; dry mouth and tongue; fatigue and heaviness after meals
Worse_From: Overeating, especially sweets and starches; mental or physical strain; infections or skin irritations; neglect of hygiene
Better_From: Moderation in diet; plenty of water within metabolic limits; rest after meals; good skin care and cleanliness
Notes_Sphere: Metabolic and pancreatic sphere; adjunct in diabetes with profuse urine, excessive thirst and diabetic skin boils or itching

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Deathly pale, icy cold, bathed in cold sweat; intense nausea with sinking at epigastrium; anxiety and fear of death; wants abdomen uncovered and fresh air, feels better in open air though chilly
General_Themes: Acts on vagus, circulation and digestive tract; collapse states with extreme nausea and vomiting; seasickness and travel sickness; angina-like chest oppression with coldness and faintness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Seasick-type nausea with violent vomiting, cold sweat and deadly pallor; sinking, empty feeling at pit of stomach; coldness of limbs and clammy perspiration; intermittent pulse with chest oppression and angina-like pains; desire to uncover abdomen while rest of body craves warmth
Worse_From: Least motion, especially on ship or in vehicle; tobacco use in sensitive persons; warm, stuffy rooms; anxiety and fear
Better_From: Open, cool, fresh air; lying perfectly still; uncovering abdomen; closing eyes; cold applications to head
Notes_Sphere: Vaso-vagal and gastric sphere; seasickness, collapse and anginal states with extreme nausea, cold sweat, pallor and relief from fresh air and absolute rest

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, nervous and restless; children cross, excitable and hard to control; anxious and frightened during spasms or worm attacks
General_Themes: Worm and nervous remedy; especially for roundworms; spasmodic and convulsive states; chorea and twitchings in children; menstrual and uterine colic
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense itching of nose and anus, grinding of teeth and restless sleep from worms; colicky abdominal pains with rumbling and frequent small stools; twitching and jerking of limbs, sometimes choreic movements; in women, cramping menstrual pains with expulsion of clots; tendency to spasmodic attacks in children
Worse_From: Night; eating sweets; excitement; suppression of menses or sudden chill; intestinal worm infestation
Better_From: Passing of worms after proper treatment; warmth; quiet environment; reduction of sweets and irritant foods
Notes_Sphere: Intestinal and nervous sphere; worm colic, pruritus ani and choreic or spasmodic symptoms in excitable, irritable children and women with uterine colic

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious and worried by persistent bleeding or diarrhoea; mentally dull and easily fatigued during long-standing mucous or venous troubles
General_Themes: Astringent action on mucous membranes and vessels; passive haemorrhages; chronic varicose and haemorrhoidal conditions; watery, debilitating diarrhoea; ulcerations that ooze dark blood or serum
Key_Local_Symptoms: Thin, dark, oozing haemorrhages from nose, womb or bowels; passive bleeding from piles or varicose ulcers; watery, exhausting diarrhoea with soreness of anus; relaxed, flabby mucous membranes and tissues that bleed easily
Worse_From: Exertion; hot drinks and stimulants; standing long; local irritation or friction of affected parts
Better_From: Rest; firm but gentle pressure and bandaging; cool applications; cold, bland drinks
Notes_Sphere: Vascular and mucous membrane sphere; passive bleedings, watery diarrhoea and relaxed varicose or ulcerated tissues needing an astringent-type remedy

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, gloomy and oversensitive when digestion is out of order; easily annoyed by slightest disturbance during gastric attacks
General_Themes: Acts on liver, stomach and digestion; atonic dyspepsia; bilious headaches; map-tongue with denuded red patches; much wind and rumbling with sense of fulness and weight
Key_Local_Symptoms: Tongue coated with white, peeled spots like a map; bitter or sour taste; constant shifting of gas with loud rumbling, but little relief; heaviness and soreness in liver region; headache and nausea after eating, especially fatty or rich food
Worse_From: After eating, especially fats and pastries; night; lying on left side; mental effort after meals
Better_From: Light, simple diet; warm drinks; passing flatus or stool; gentle movement after eating
Notes_Sphere: Digestive and hepatic sphere; atonic, gassy dyspepsia with mapped tongue, bitter taste and hepatic soreness in irritable, bilious patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Intensely restless, hurried and impulsive; alternates between excitement and depression; jealous, suspicious and destructive; great desire for music, dancing and rapid motion which relieve
General_Themes: Acts on nervous system and female pelvic organs; chorea, hysteria and convulsive movements; burning, tearing neuralgias; congestive and painful ovarian and uterine conditions; extreme hyperaesthesia
Key_Local_Symptoms: Constant need to move, dance, work or fidget; sudden violent pains, burning, stabbing or tearing, compelling motion; twitching and choreic movements of limbs; intense sexual excitement or perversion; uterine and ovarian pains, often right-sided, with great restlessness
Worse_From: Rest; touch; contradiction; bright colours and noise when not in harmony; evening and night; before menses
Better_From: Rapid, continued motion; dancing and rhythmic music; occupation and busy work; cool, fresh air
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and female pelvic sphere; chorea, hysterical states and ovarian pains in intensely restless, music-loving, over-stimulated patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dull, toxic, apathetic; indifference to suffering alternating with moaning and irritability; anxious and low from intense septic pains and prostration
General_Themes: Powerful septic and abscess remedy; carbuncles, boils and cellulitis with bluish or black centres; burning, bruised, tearing pains; great weakness and collapse tendency
Key_Local_Symptoms: Enormously swollen, dark-purple or bluish carbuncles and abscesses with horrible burning, bruised pains; skin around lesions oedematous, shining, very sensitive; foul, ichorous discharges; septic fevers with great prostration and trembling
Worse_From: Night; slightest touch; motion; pressure on affected area; advancing sepsis and suppuration
Better_From: Absolute rest; warm applications that promote ripening or drainage; free discharge of pus; gentle, careful handling
Notes_Sphere: Septic and cellular tissue sphere; malignant carbuncles, abscesses and cellulitis with dark discoloration, intense burning pain and marked prostration

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, dull and indifferent; very irritable when digestive or rheumatic pains are marked; depressed by slightest exertion
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes and metabolism; gastric catarrh with sourness and heartburn; muscular soreness and rheumatism; states of lactic and uric-acid excess with weakness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sour eructations and heartburn with heaviness in stomach; nausea and vomiting of sour, acrid fluid; colicky, griping pains with loose, sour stools; general muscular soreness after slight exertion; rheumatic pains worse damp and cold
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; iced or very acid drinks; overeating; exertion when already weak
Better_From: Warmth; warm, bland drinks; light, simple food; rest and gentle movement after acute pains
Notes_Sphere: Gastric and rheumatic sphere; sour dyspepsia and muscular soreness or rheumatism in tired, easily exhausted patients sensitive to cold and acids

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Gloomy, despondent and easily angered; anxious and hypochondriacal about health; irritable, especially with pelvic or skin symptoms
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes, skin and female pelvic organs; warts and excrescences; ovarian and uterine irritability; rheumatic and neuralgic pains; toxic states from yew in old literature
Key_Local_Symptoms: Pricking, stitching or neuralgic pains in ovaries and uterus; sense of weight and dragging in pelvis; warty growths and corns on hands and feet, often tender; rheumatic shooting pains in limbs and small joints; headache with scalp tenderness
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; pressure on corns or warts; exertion; mental anxiety
Better_From: Warmth; rest; soft footwear and removing pressure from corns; gentle exercise in dry air
Notes_Sphere: Cutaneous and pelvic sphere; warty growths and ovarian or uterine pains with neuralgic, stitching character in gloomy, irritable patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, sensitive and low-spirited; easily offended; mental discomfort from persistent offensive discharges and skin eruptions
General_Themes: Acts on skin and mucous membranes, especially ears and back; ringworm-like eruptions; fissures behind ears; very offensive otorrhoea and perspiration; spinal irritability and neuralgic pains
Key_Local_Symptoms: Vesicular, circular or ring-shaped eruptions (tinea-type) with intense itching and burning; raw, cracked skin behind ears with offensive discharge; otorrhoea of horribly foetid odour, worse lying on back; offensive sweat and foot odour; sharp, stitching back pains along spine
Worse_From: Lying on back (ear discharge and back pains); washing or wetting parts; changes of weather; night
Better_From: Dry warmth; lying on side rather than back; gentle, dry cleansing; open air in mild weather
Notes_Sphere: Skin, ear and spinal sphere; ringworm, cracked retro-auricular skin and very offensive ear discharges with spinal neuralgia in irritable, sensitive patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, restless and depressed; low-spirited and fearful from abdominal and urinary pains; dull, heavy and drowsy in toxic states
General_Themes: Acts on kidneys, urinary tract, intestines and blood; haemorrhagic nephritis; intestinal ulceration and tympanites; sepsis with tar-like stools and blood in urine; marked tenesmus and burning
Key_Local_Symptoms: Scanty, smoky, coffee-coloured or bloody urine with burning in kidneys and bladder; great tympanitic distension of abdomen with rumbling and colic; burning, raw feeling in intestines with tarry, bloody or foul stools; tongue red and dry, or dark with glossy appearance; dull headache and prostration
Worse_From: Cold, damp exposure; septic or typhoid states; motion; pressure over abdomen
Better_From: Warmth; rest in recumbent posture; passing urine and flatus; light, bland fluids in small amounts
Notes_Sphere: Renal, intestinal and septic sphere; haemorrhagic nephritis, tympanitic abdomen and dark, tar-like stools in low septic or typhoid conditions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, restless and very sensitive to local irritation; children obstinate and cross, constantly picking at nose or anus; adults low-spirited from chronic polypi or worms
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes of nose and rectum; nasal polypi; chronic catarrh; threadworms and itching at anus; reflex nervous symptoms in children
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intolerable itching and crawling in rectum from ascarides, worse evening and in bed; constant picking and boring in nose; nasal polypi with blocked nose, loss of smell and chronic discharge; sneezing and catarrh, especially in warm rooms; sometimes dry, hacking cough from naso-pharyngeal irritation
Worse_From: Evening and night in bed; warmth of room; sweets (for worms); lying on back or side with thighs together
Better_From: Cool, fresh air; passing stool or worms; cleansing nostrils and rectum gently; light, simple diet with less sugar
Notes_Sphere: Nasal and rectal sphere; nasal polypi and threadworm irritation with intense itching of nose and anus and restless picking behaviour, especially in children

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Deeply depressed, anxious and apathetic; fears paralysis and mental decline; mentally dull and forgetful after severe illness; hopeless about recovery when pains and weakness persist
General_Themes: Acts on peripheral nerves, hair follicles and nutrition; multiple neuritis after infections or toxins; burning, numbness and weakness in limbs; rapid falling of hair from scalp and body; emaciation and prostration
Key_Local_Symptoms: Progressive weakness and numbness of legs and feet with burning, shooting pains; staggering gait and foot-drop; intense burning in soles, worse at night; rapid, diffuse hair loss of scalp, brows and sometimes pubic hair; skin dry, rough and scaly in affected areas
Worse_From: Night in bed; motion or exertion; cold; convalescence after severe infectious disease or heavy metal exposure
Better_From: Rest; warmth; gentle nursing; protection of sensitive limbs and scalp from cold and friction
Notes_Sphere: Peripheral nervous and trophic sphere; post-infectious or toxic polyneuritis with burning, numb limbs and marked alopecia in profoundly weakened patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Overexcitable and restless; nervous, hurried and sleepless from tea and mental strain; anxious and tremulous with palpitations and head-congestion after excitement or late work
General_Themes: Acts on brain, heart and stomach; “tea-drinker’s” neurasthenia with insomnia, palpitation and congestive headaches; great nervous irritability and oversensitivity to noise and light
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent frontal or temporal headache with throbbing and fullness, worse after strong tea; palpitation with fluttering and oppression in precordia; gastric acidity and nausea with eructations after tea or emotional strain; hands tremble and sleep is light, dreamy and unrefreshing
Worse_From: Strong tea; late evening work; mental excitement or emotion; close, heated rooms
Better_From: Rest; quiet, dark room; cool, fresh air; avoiding tea and stimulants
Notes_Sphere: Nervous, cardiac and gastric sphere; tea-neurasthenia with palpitations, throbbing headache and gastric acidity in nervous, over-stimulated subjects

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Exceedingly nervous and oversensitive; slightest noise or vibration goes through the whole body; anxious, timid and easily exhausted, with dread of motion and travel
General_Themes: Acts on nerves and special senses, especially auditory and vestibular; seasickness and motion sickness; migraine with extreme sensitivity to noise; spinal weakness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Vertigo and deathly nausea from slightest motion or least noise, as if brain were turning; sick, sinking feeling at pit of stomach; headaches with throbbing and crawling in head, worse noise and motion; back feels weak and spine sensitive to touch or pressure
Worse_From: Least noise, vibration or motion (carriage, train, boat); bright light; closing eyes while in motion; warm, stuffy rooms
Better_From: Absolute stillness; dark, quiet room; cool, fresh air; lying with head high and perfectly at rest
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and vestibular sphere; seasickness, motion sickness and noise-aggravated migraine in hyper-sensitive, easily exhausted patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious and depressed about deformity or stiffness from scars; worried, impatient and discouraged in long-standing cicatricial conditions
General_Themes: Promotes absorption of scar tissue and adhesions; useful in strictures, contracting cicatrices, keloids and fibrous adhesions after inflammation or surgery
Key_Local_Symptoms: Hard, contracting cicatrices that draw and distort parts; painful or tender scar-tissue around joints, spine or abdomen; strictures of ducts, urethra or oesophagus from fibrosis; thickened, adherent middle ear structures with loss of hearing
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; strain or stretching of scarred parts; pressure from clothing or bandages; overuse of affected joint or region
Better_From: Gentle massage; steady warmth; gradual, careful stretching of contracted parts; rest from strain
Notes_Sphere: Connective-tissue sphere; keloids, contracting scars and fibrous adhesions or strictures where gradual softening and absorption of cicatricial tissue are needed

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, anxious and irritable from repeated or profuse uterine bleeding; feels exhausted and discouraged, afraid something serious is wrong with womb or bladder
General_Themes: Powerful haemostatic for uterus and urinary tract; menorrhagia, metrorrhagia and postpartum haemorrhage; fibroids and uterine congestion; haematuria and gravel
Key_Local_Symptoms: Profuse, often clotted uterine bleeding with cramps and bearing-down in pelvis; flow may recur too soon and last too long; aching across sacrum and down thighs; frequent desire to urinate with burning, bloody or sedimentous urine; pelvic fulness and soreness in fibroid or congestive states
Worse_From: Motion and exertion; standing or walking; slightest strain during menstruation or postpartum period; climacteric changes
Better_From: Absolute rest; lying flat with pelvis supported; cool compresses over pelvis; regular, moderate intake of cool fluids
Notes_Sphere: Uterine and urinary sphere; menorrhagia, fibroid and postpartum haemorrhage, and haematuria with marked pelvic soreness and repeated, exhausting flows

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Fixed ideas and secretive nature; feels fragile, as if made of glass; low self-esteem with shame, especially about sexual history or bodily imperfections; anxious, hurried and suspicious; weeps alone yet hides feelings in company
General_Themes: Acts on skin, glands, genito-urinary tract and mucous membranes; warts, condylomata and soft excrescences; ill-effects of vaccination and suppressed gonorrhoea; catarrhs of urethra, cervix and rectum; left-sided ovarian and pelvic troubles
Key_Local_Symptoms: Soft, moist, cauliflower-like warts and condylomata on genitals, anus and face; chronic urethral discharge with cutting at end of urination; sensation of something alive or moving in abdomen; splitting, forked stream of urine; headaches as if a nail driven in; oily, shiny skin and tendency to sweats with onion-like odour
Worse_From: Damp, cold weather; night; vaccination and suppression of discharges; tea, coffee and tobacco in some subjects
Better_From: Dry, warm air; gentle exercise; free, natural discharges (when allowed); warm covering without overheating
Notes_Sphere: Skin, genito-urinary and glandular sphere; warts, condylomata, post-vaccinal troubles and suppressed gonorrhoeal states with “as if fragile or unnatural” feelings and secretive, anxious temperament

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, depressed and mentally dull from chronic intestinal or parasitic troubles; anxious and weary when diarrhoea and foul discharges persist
General_Themes: Acts on intestinal mucosa and blood; hookworm and other parasites; foul, fermentative diarrhoea; septic and putrid states; some urinary and skin involvement
Key_Local_Symptoms: Offensive, watery or mucous diarrhoea with much gas and abdominal rumbling; stools and flatus smell putrid; itching of anus and perineum, especially at night, with evidence of worms; coated tongue and foul breath; general weakness and pallor from chronic intestinal loss
Worse_From: Rich, heavy food; sweets; neglect of hygiene; damp, hot weather; night in bed (itching)
Better_From: Light, simple diet; good hygiene; passing stool and gas; rest and gradual rebuilding of strength
Notes_Sphere: Intestinal and parasitic sphere; foul diarrhoea, hookworm and worm complaints with great debility, pallor and offensive evacuations

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Restless, anxious and irritable, especially children with cough; nervous and wakeful in evening; mentally tired but over-excitable from chronic catarrh
General_Themes: Acts on respiratory tract and nerves; spasmodic and whooping cough; chronic bronchial catarrh; “nervous cough” in excitable children; some gastric irritability
Key_Local_Symptoms: Spasmodic, suffocative cough, often whooping-like, worse at night; long paroxysms ending in exhaustion and sometimes vomiting; much laryngeal tickling and irritation; chest sore from repeated coughing; children clingy and frightened during attacks
Worse_From: Night, especially after first sleep; lying down; excitement and laughing; cold, damp air
Better_From: Being carried upright; cool, fresh air (not cold); warm drinks in small sips; quiet, dark room
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory and nervous sphere; spasmodic or whooping coughs and nervous cough in excitable, restless children and adults with laryngeal irritation

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, sluggish and easily exhausted; poor concentration and memory; anxious and irritable, especially about health and heart; feels cold, heavy and mentally slow
General_Themes: Endocrine remedy acting on thyroid and metabolism; hypothyroid states with obesity, chilliness and dry skin; some hyperthyroid features with palpitation and nervousness; delayed development, cretinism and myxoedema; menstrual and ovarian irregularities
Key_Local_Symptoms: Tendency to put on weight despite modest eating; chilliness with cold hands and feet; dry, rough skin and falling hair; puffiness of face and eyelids; constipation and slow digestion; menstrual disturbance with fatigue and depression; palpitations and shortness of breath on slight exertion
Worse_From: Cold and damp; exertion; mental strain; emotional excitement; rapid change of temperature
Better_From: Warmth; regular, moderate exercise; open air; balanced diet and regular routine
Notes_Sphere: Endocrine and metabolic sphere; hypothyroid or disordered thyroid states with obesity, chilliness, fatigue and menstrual or cardiac symptoms

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous, anxious and overstrained; tendency to panic, palpitations and sleeplessness from worry; children fretful and overexcited at night
General_Themes: Acts on circulation and nerves; functional cardiac palpitations from emotion; nervous headaches and insomnia; mild sedative in excitable, sensitive constitutions
Key_Local_Symptoms: Flushing and palpitation from slight emotion or exertion; throbbing in head with fullness and tightness in temples; nervous sleeplessness, especially in overworked or over-worried people; tendency to sweat with palpitations; tense neck and shoulder muscles in stress states
Worse_From: Emotional excitement; mental worry; caffeine and stimulants; overheating in close rooms
Better_From: Cool, quiet environment; gentle, warm drinks; rest and relaxation routines; walking in open air
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and circulatory sphere; functional palpitations, stress-headaches and insomnia in sensitive, worried, overworked patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally confused, forgetful and self-conscious; stage-fright and fear of failure when reading or speaking; stammering worsened by anxiety; easily discouraged by slightest effort
General_Themes: Acts on nerves of speech, vision and coordination; stammering and dyslexia-type reading troubles; eye strain with blurred vision; general nervous weakness with prostration after exertion
Key_Local_Symptoms: Stammering or stumbling over words, especially when reading aloud or under observation; visual fatigue with blurring and smarting of eyes after reading; headaches with heaviness and confusion of mind; weakness and trembling of limbs on slight effort
Worse_From: Mental exertion, especially reading aloud or public speaking; close eye work; emotional excitement; heat and stuffy rooms
Better_From: Quiet, calm atmosphere; reading or speaking alone, without pressure; rest for eyes; open, cool air
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and special-sense sphere; stammering, reading difficulty and eye strain with mental confusion and easy exhaustion, worsened by scrutiny or performance situations

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Sensual, impressionable and easily excited; nervous and restless from local pains or genital irritation; low-spirited and dissatisfied when chronic neuralgic or sexual symptoms persist
General_Themes: Acts on nerves and skin; neuralgia of face, teeth and ears; itching eruptions; some influence on male sexual sphere with irritability and weakness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Facial and dental neuralgia with throbbing, shooting pains, worse at night; itching papular eruptions on trunk and limbs with burning after scratching; in some cases genital irritation with local hypersensitivity and nocturnal emissions
Worse_From: Night; emotional excitement; warmth of bed; wine, coffee or stimulants in sensitive subjects
Better_From: Rest; cool air to hot, itching parts; gentle rubbing; moderate, non-stimulating diet
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and cutaneous sphere; neuralgia and itching eruptions, sometimes with sexual irritability, in sensitive, over-stimulated constitutions

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, dull and despondent; mental heaviness after meals, especially starchy or sweet; anxious and depressed about weight, blood sugar or chronic headaches
General_Themes: Acts on nutrition, liver and digestion; fermentative dyspepsia with much gas; tendency to obesity or disordered carbohydrate metabolism; dull, heavy headaches in stout, overfed subjects
Key_Local_Symptoms: Fullness and distension of stomach with noisy rumbling and sour or fermenting eructations; heaviness and sleepiness after bread, pastry or sweets; dull frontal or temporal headache with blurred mind; tendency to sluggish bowels and coated tongue
Worse_From: Rich, yeasty, bready or sugary foods; overeating; lack of exercise; late evening meals
Better_From: Simple, low-starch diet; regular walking or gentle exercise; drinking water between meals rather than with them
Notes_Sphere: Digestive and metabolic sphere; fermentative dyspepsia, heavy post-prandial headaches and weight or sugar concerns in stout, carbohydrate-sensitive patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, irritable and anxious about sexual or urinary weakness; low confidence, feels prematurely old and drained; restless and dissatisfied when virility seems reduced
General_Themes: Acts on genito-urinary organs in both sexes; sexual weakness, infertility and diminished libido; prostatic irritation; urinary frequency, gravel and burning; some action in fatigue states
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dull aching in kidneys, bladder and genital region; frequent urging to urinate with burning or dragging in urethra; weak or diminished erections with loss of desire; backache and heaviness in pelvis after exertion or intercourse
Worse_From: Sexual excesses; suppression of sexual function or frustration; cold, damp; exertion in weakened states
Better_From: Rest; warmth to lumbar and pelvic region; regulated sexual activity; adequate fluids when kidneys are not failing
Notes_Sphere: Genito-urinary and sexual sphere; urinary irritation and sexual debility or infertility with lumbar pain and despondency in men and women

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous, fretful and excitable, especially children with spasmodic cough; adults low-spirited and tired from chronic catarrh and gland trouble
General_Themes: Acts on respiratory tract and glands; spasmodic, whooping and suffocative coughs in scrofulous children; chronic bronchitis; enlargement of cervical glands; catarrh with much mucus
Key_Local_Symptoms: Spasmodic cough, often whooping-like, with difficult breathing and bluish face; copious, thick mucus in bronchi and trachea; swollen, tender cervical glands; chronic nasal and throat catarrh in scrofulous or tubercular constitutions
Worse_From: Night; lying down; cold, damp air; excitement and laughter in children
Better_From: Sitting up; cool but not cold fresh air; warm drinks in small sips; gentle expectoration of mucus
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory and glandular sphere; spasmodic or whooping coughs and chronic catarrh in lymphatic, gland-swelled, scrofulous children and adults

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, weak and pale from repeated uterine haemorrhage; fear of bleeding to death; very low-spirited and faint with slightest exertion during menses or after miscarriage
General_Themes: Marked uterine haemorrhage remedy; profuse bleeding from fibroids, miscarriage or at climacteric; passive flooding with faintness; great sacro-iliac and hip pains during loss
Key_Local_Symptoms: Profuse, bright red uterine bleeding with gushing, often on the least movement; sensation as if hips and back were falling apart, severe pain across sacrum into hips and thighs; feeling of emptiness and sinking at stomach; faintness on rising, with cold sweat and pallor
Worse_From: Least motion or rising; standing or walking; strain during menstruation or after delivery; warm rooms
Better_From: Absolute rest lying flat; firm bandaging around pelvis; cool, well-ventilated room; small sips of cool water
Notes_Sphere: Uterine and pelvic sphere; menorrhagia, flooding and threatened miscarriage with gushing bright blood and sacro-iliac pains as if pelvis would separate

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, apathetic and mentally dulled; anxious and fearful about heart, blood and sudden collapse; irritable and oversensitive to exertion and noise
General_Themes: Acts on blood, heart and nervous system; toxic anaemia and haemolysis; cyanosis and dyspnoea; headaches, vertigo and neuritis in workers exposed to TNT; marked prostration
Key_Local_Symptoms: Persistent headache, often frontal or throbbing, with dizziness and tendency to faint; pallor or cyanosis with shortness of breath on exertion; palpitations and irregular pulse; tingling and numbness in fingers and toes with weakness of limbs; easy bruising and nosebleeds from blood changes
Worse_From: Exertion; warm, close rooms; further toxic exposure; rapid change of position; mental strain when already weak
Better_From: Rest in cool, fresh air; lying flat with head slightly raised; gentle, gradual exertion only as strength returns
Notes_Sphere: Blood, cardiac and nervous sphere; toxic anaemia, cardiac weakness and neuritis from TNT-like exposure, with headaches, cyanosis and great prostration

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dull, miserable and irritable; complains constantly of aching and chilliness; gloomy and restless during influenza or bilious attacks
General_Themes: Acts on liver, stomach and mucous membranes; bilious colic and diarrhoea; influenza with bone pains; gastric disturbances from cold and damp
Key_Local_Symptoms: Deep aching in back and limbs as if bones were bruised; bilious vomiting and diarrhoea with cramping abdominal pains; chilliness with shivering before or during stool; thickly coated tongue and foul taste; headache and soreness of eyeballs in influenza
Worse_From: Cold, damp exposure; getting wet feet; night and early morning; eating heavy or greasy foods
Better_From: Warmth; hot drinks; rest in bed; perspiration which often relieves aching and chilliness
Notes_Sphere: Gastro-intestinal and febrile sphere; bilious diarrhoea and influenza-like states with bone pains, chills and gastric upset from cold, wet exposure

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, anxious and low-spirited from chronic urinary discomfort; children fretful and wakeful with bladder irritation; adults tired and gloomy when cystitis persists
General_Themes: Acts on kidneys, bladder and prostate; catarrhal cystitis; irritable bladder with tenesmus; phosphatic or mucous sediment; mild diuretic effect
Key_Local_Symptoms: Frequent urging to urinate with scanty, cloudy urine containing mucus or phosphates; burning or smarting in urethra and bladder; dull aching in loins and suprapubic region; enuresis or dribbling in excitable children or elderly
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; getting chilled or sitting on cold stones; acids and highly seasoned food; fatigue
Better_From: Warmth; liberal intake of plain water when appropriate; rest with back supported; bland, non-irritating diet
Notes_Sphere: Urinary sphere; chronic bladder catarrh, irritable bladder and mild gravel with cloudy urine and lumbar aching

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, anxious and distressed by violent bowel and rectal pain; restless and gloomy during dysenteric attacks; children cross and cry before stool
General_Themes: Acts on intestines and rectum; dysentery and mucous colitis; tenesmus and cutting colic; stools of mucus and blood especially in late summer or autumn
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sudden urging to stool with violent cutting round umbilicus; stools slimy, mucous or bloody, often in small quantities and frequent; severe burning and soreness in rectum and anus after stool; symptoms often worse in the morning and around meals
Worse_From: Morning, especially on waking; after eating or drinking; late summer and autumn; cold, damp weather
Better_From: Warmth to abdomen; lying quietly on back with knees drawn up; passing stool and gas (though often scanty); light, bland diet in small amounts
Notes_Sphere: Intestinal and rectal sphere; dysentery and mucous colitis with frequent small, mucous-bloody stools, intense tenesmus and post-stool burning

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Deeply dissatisfied, restless and change-loving; never content where they are, desire constant travel and change; melancholic yet easily excited; irritable, obstinate children with destructive impulses and sudden rages
General_Themes: Deep-acting tubercular nosode; tendency to recurring respiratory infections, enlarged glands and wasting; rapid changes of symptoms; alternating diarrhoea and constipation; headaches, night-sweats and fatigue; family history of tuberculosis common
Key_Local_Symptoms: Recurrent colds, bronchitis and spasmodic cough with oppressed breathing; enlarged cervical and other glands; night-sweats and emaciation despite good appetite; headaches from occiput to forehead, worse change of weather; fatigue and aching in spine and limbs; tendency to catarrh of ears, nose and chest in changeable climates
Worse_From: Change of weather; cold, damp; closed, stuffy rooms; exertion; mental strain; suppression of eruptions or discharges
Better_From: Dry, warm climate and open air; mountains or seaside; gentle, regular exercise; full, nourishing diet taken regularly
Notes_Sphere: Constitutional tubercular sphere; restless, change-seeking patients with recurrent chest and gland troubles, night-sweats and poor resistance, often with family or personal tubercular history

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, gloomy and dissatisfied; feels heavy, dull and out of sorts when liver and digestion are sluggish; mental cloudiness and lack of initiative
General_Themes: Acts on liver, gall-bladder and digestive tract; congestion of liver with biliousness; dull headaches from hepatic torpor; rheumatic and arthritic pains in stiff, overused joints
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dull, aching pain and fullness in right hypochondrium; yellow-coated tongue with bitter or metallic taste; flatulence and heaviness after rich or fried food; stools light, pasty or difficult; stiffness and aching in small joints and knees, worse after rest
Worse_From: Rich, oily or fried foods; alcohol and heavy meals at night; long sitting and lack of exercise; damp, chilly weather
Better_From: Light, simple diet; warm drinks; gentle exercise after eating; warmth and continued, moderate movement for stiff joints
Notes_Sphere: Hepatic, digestive and rheumatic sphere; sluggish liver, flatulent dyspepsia and joint stiffness in heavy, torpid, easily-irritated patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Low-spirited, fretful and anxious from constant cough and chest oppression; mentally dull and weary in chronic bronchial states
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes of bronchi and naso-pharynx; long-lasting coughs after influenza; chronic catarrh with much mucus; asthmatic tendency in damp climates
Key_Local_Symptoms: Loose, rattling cough with profuse, thick mucus that is hard to raise; oppression and weight on chest, worse in damp, foggy weather; post-nasal catarrh with hawking of mucus; easy fatigue and shortness of breath on slight exertion
Worse_From: Cold, damp and foggy weather; evening and night in bed; exertion in moist air; lying flat
Better_From: Dry, warm atmosphere; gentle, continued expectoration; sitting up propped with pillows; warm herbal drinks
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory sphere; chronic catarrhal bronchitis and post-influenza coughs with abundant mucus and damp-weather aggravation

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, anxious and fearful; great nervous excitability with dread of losing self-control; easily angered, then repentant and depressed
General_Themes: Acts intensely on spinal cord and peripheral nerves; convulsions, spasms and paralytic weakness; exaggerated reflexes; neuralgia and shooting pains; states resembling tetanus in old descriptions
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent spasmodic contractions of muscles, especially of back and neck; twitching and jerking in limbs from slight stimuli; hyperaesthesia of spine, cannot bear slightest touch; sharp, shooting pains along nerves; tendency to collapse and weakness after spasms
Worse_From: Sudden noise, touch or draft; emotional excitement; overexertion; cold, damp weather
Better_From: Absolute rest in quiet, dark room; warmth to spine and extremities; gentle, steady pressure rather than light touch
Notes_Sphere: Spinal and motor nervous sphere; spasmodic, convulsive and hyper-reflex states with great sensitivity to impressions and post-spasm exhaustion

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, anxious and despairing about health; gloomy, hopeless feeling in chronic digestive and kidney disease; mentally dull and forgetful from systemic weakness
General_Themes: Acts on stomach, intestines, liver and kidneys; causes destructive catarrh and ulceration; diabetes, glycosuria and albuminuria; emaciation with great thirst and hunger
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning in stomach with gnawing hunger, yet food aggravates; profuse, offensive diarrhoea with much gas and ulcerative tendency; intense thirst, frequent urination with sugar or albumen in urine; progressive emaciation despite good appetite; dull pain and tenderness in kidney region
Worse_From: Eating, especially bread and sweets; mental exertion; cold damp; overstrain in weakened state
Better_From: Simple, non-irritating diet; warmth; rest; regular small meals rather than large ones
Notes_Sphere: Metabolic, gastric and renal sphere; diabetes, albuminuria and ulcerative gastric–intestinal states with great prostration, thirst and progressive weight loss

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dull, apathetic and indifferent; mental cloudiness and confusion in uraemic states; anxious and restless at night with fear of suffocation or death
General_Themes: Acts on kidneys and blood; uraemic intoxication; oedema and dropsy; dyspnoea and headache from retained waste; itching and eruptions from excretory insufficiency
Key_Local_Symptoms: Scanty or suppressed urine with puffiness of face and ankles; dull frontal headache with heaviness and confusion; drowsiness passing into stupor; shortness of breath on slight exertion; dry, itchy skin with uremic pruritus; foul breath and coated tongue
Worse_From: Cold, damp; fatigue; mental exertion; lying flat when dyspnoeic; errors of diet overloading kidneys
Better_From: Rest in semi-recumbent position; cool, fresh air; restricted, bland diet; free action of skin and bowels (when obtainable)
Notes_Sphere: Renal and blood sphere; uraemic states with oedema, headache, breathlessness and mental dullness from deficient elimination

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, restless and distressed by intense burning and itching of skin; anxious about recurring hives or ‘milk coming in’ troubles; children cross and cannot keep from scratching
General_Themes: Acts on skin, kidneys and breasts; nettle-rash and urticaria; burns and scalds of superficial degree; promotes or regulates lactation; some gravel and kidney irritation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Red, raised wheals and blotches with violent burning and stinging as from nettles; urticaria from shellfish, fish or bathing; itching worse warmth and scratching; superficial burns and scalds with tingling and burning; deficient or suppressed milk with painful breasts; gravel with burning on urination
Worse_From: Heat of bed; hot bathing; eating shellfish or certain foods; exposure to nettles or prickly plants; suppression of milk or eruptions
Better_From: Cool applications; cool bathing or compresses; fresh, cool air; gradual reappearance of eruptions or milk flow
Notes_Sphere: Skin, renal and mammary sphere; urticaria, superficial burns, milk-supply troubles and some gravel with intense burning and stinging sensations

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, oppressed and fearful when head or chest feel too full; mental confusion and heaviness in congestive states; depressed and irritable from persistent headaches
General_Themes: Acts on blood-vessels and mucous membranes of head and chest; congestive headaches; passive haemorrhages; catarrh of sinuses and bronchi; sensation of tight bands or fulness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Severe congestive headache as if head would burst, especially forehead and temples, worse slightest motion; sense of weight and fulness in head and chest; epistaxis relieving pressure; tightness around chest with difficult breathing and oppressed feeling; catarrhal states of sinuses with fullness and pressure
Worse_From: Motion and jar; stooping; warm, stuffy rooms; mental exertion; change to hot weather
Better_From: Rest in dark, cool room; cold applications to head; epistaxis or free nasal discharge; cool, fresh air
Notes_Sphere: Vascular and respiratory sphere; congestive headaches and chest oppression with bursting sensations and relief from bleeding or cold applications

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, irritable and hypersensitive; gloomy about sexual and uterine health; feels exhausted and weak after slight exertion or loss of fluids
General_Themes: Acts on sexual organs, blood and scalp; ovarian and uterine haemorrhages; menorrhagia with dark clots; sexual weakness; falling of hair and unhealthy scalp; resemblance to ergot on generative organs
Key_Local_Symptoms: Profuse, dark, clotted bleeding from uterus, often with oozing between periods; constant sense of pelvic fullness and bearing-down; ovarian pains with ache and soreness; scalp itchy and hair falls out in handfuls; tendency to small, dark clots in menses or haemorrhages
Worse_From: Exertion; standing or walking; mental excitement; during menses or after coitus; warm rooms
Better_From: Rest lying flat; cool room; firm support around pelvis; gentle, cool applications
Notes_Sphere: Uterine, sexual and trophic sphere; dark, clotted menorrhagia, ovarian pains and hair loss with weakness and pelvic congestion

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, anxious and despondent from chronic bladder trouble; mentally dull and weary when urinary pain and frequency are marked
General_Themes: Acts on bladder and kidneys; catarrhal cystitis; chronic urinary irritation with mucus, blood or gravel; tenesmus and burning
Key_Local_Symptoms: Frequent urging to urinate with scanty, cloudy, often foul urine containing mucus, pus or blood; burning and cutting in bladder and urethra during and after urination; dull, aching pain in loins and suprapubic region; sense of weight and soreness over bladder
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; getting chilled, especially feet; acids and highly seasoned foods; long retention of urine
Better_From: Warmth; copious drinking of water or bland fluids (if kidneys can bear it); rest with back supported; bland, non-irritating diet
Notes_Sphere: Urinary sphere; chronic cystitis and bladder catarrh with burning, mucous or bloody urine and lumbar aching in chilly, easily-irritated patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious, irritable and hypersensitive; children peevish and sleepless during and after vaccination; adults low-spirited and suspicious that they will never be well since a vaccination
General_Themes: Nosode of vaccine; ill-effects of vaccination; chronic skin eruptions, neuralgia and headaches appearing after vaccine; lingering malaise and recurrent ‘flu-like’ or catarrhal states
Key_Local_Symptoms: Eruptions like small pimples, pustules or eczema around vaccination site or elsewhere, itching and burning; recurrent headaches, neuralgias or rheumatic pains dating from vaccination; recurring colds, sore throats or catarrh since being vaccinated; general tiredness and low resistance without clear cause
Worse_From: Cold, damp and changes of weather; overexertion; mental strain; suppression of vaccine or other eruptions
Better_From: Dry, warm air; open air in moderation; bringing out rather than suppressing eruptions; rest and gentle exercise
Notes_Sphere: Post-vaccinal and constitutional sphere; chronic complaints, skin eruptions and lowered vitality traceable to vaccination, especially when other indicated remedies fail to hold

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Hysterical, over-excitable and changeable; great nervousness with alternation of cheerfulness and depression; complaints seem out of proportion to objective findings; sensitive to contradiction and noise
General_Themes: Acts on nervous system and reflexes; hysterical conditions, nervous palpitation and spasmodic pains; symptoms often change place and character suddenly; suited to nervous, thin, overstrained people, especially women and children
Key_Local_Symptoms: Neuralgic, tearing or jerking pains that suddenly shift from one part to another; sensation as if something alive were moving in limbs; hysterical globus with choking and sighing; nervous palpitations and flushing; erratic, twitchy sensations in legs and feet, worse at rest
Worse_From: Rest; sitting still; emotional excitement; contradiction; evening and night
Better_From: Gentle motion and walking in open air; diversion and occupation; moderate, steady routine without shocks
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and hysterical sphere; erratic neuralgias, palpitations and shifting, exaggerated sensations in highly nervous, over-sensitive patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally dull, apathetic and easily fatigued; memory weak and concentration poor; depressed and anxious about heart and lungs in chronic degenerative states
General_Themes: Acts on nutrition, especially of heart, liver and lungs; supports oxidation processes; anaemia and general weakness; some references to early phthisical and cardiac states in traditional literature
Key_Local_Symptoms: Great fatigue and shortness of breath on slight exertion; palpitations with sense of precordial weakness; anaemic murmurs, dizziness and buzzing in ears; poor appetite with emaciation despite eating; sometimes dry, teasing cough with chest oppression
Worse_From: Exertion; rapid movement; mental strain; loss of sleep; long-standing debilitating illness
Better_From: Rest; fresh, well-ventilated air; nourishing but easily digested food; gradual, graded exertion
Notes_Sphere: Nutritional and circulatory sphere; anaemic, wasting and cardiac–pulmonary weakness with breathlessness and prostration in long-standing illness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Sensual, impressionable and emotionally reactive; mood swings between elation and depression; nervous, easily excited and then quickly exhausted
General_Themes: Acts on nervous and sexual spheres; nervous exhaustion from over-stimulation, indulgence or emotional strain; some reference to hysterical states and menstrual irregularities
Key_Local_Symptoms: Nervous palpitations with fluttering in precordia; head feels light with tendency to faint in close rooms; general tiredness and heaviness of limbs after excitement; in some cases, menstrual irregularity or sexual over-stimulation with subsequent weakness
Worse_From: Emotional excitement; strong odours and stimulants; late nights; overcrowded, warm rooms
Better_From: Quiet, cool environment; moderate routines; rest after excitement; simple food without stimulants
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and sexual sphere; over-stimulation, excitability and subsequent fatigue in impressionable, sensual temperaments

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Deep anxiety and dread, fear of death during acute illness; irritable and depressed, feels poisoned and wretched; children fretful and clingy in eruptive states
General_Themes: Nosode prepared from smallpox material in homeopathic tradition; used in relation to variola-like eruptive illnesses; intense backache, fever and prostration preceding and accompanying eruption; pitted scarring tendency historically noted
Key_Local_Symptoms: Severe aching and bruised pain in back and limbs before and during eruption; high fever with chill, vomiting and intense headache, especially in forehead and occiput; eruption in successive crops with burning, itching and later pustulation; offensive odour from skin and secretions; great prostration
Worse_From: Movement; warmth of bed when fever high; suppression or checking of eruptions; cold drafts during eruption
Better_From: Rest; cool, well-ventilated room; free, natural evolution of eruption; gentle sponging when tolerated
Notes_Sphere: Eruptive and constitutional sphere; variola-like fevers and pustular eruptions with intense backache, headache and prostration in traditional homeopathic use

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Despairing, anxious and often religiously delusional; alternates between collapse and violent excitement; loquacity, shrieking or praying; great anguish during attacks, with fear of death or insanity
General_Themes: Acts powerfully on gastro-intestinal tract and circulation; profuse vomiting and diarrhoea with collapse; coldness, blueness and cold sweat, especially on forehead; cramps in limbs and abdomen; violent, sudden purging states
Key_Local_Symptoms: Violent vomiting and rice-water-like diarrhoea with intense colic; cold sweat on forehead with icy coldness of hands and feet; face pinched, blue and sunken; cramps in calves, hands and feet; extreme weakness with faintness on slightest movement; pulse weak, thready and rapid
Worse_From: Smallest movement; least attempt to sit up; cold drinks on sensitive stomach; night; sudden chill or fright in predisposed subjects
Better_From: Lying flat and perfectly still; warmth, especially external heat; tiny sips of warm liquids; gentle covering without over-heating
Notes_Sphere: Circulatory and gastro-intestinal sphere; cholera-like collapse with profuse vomiting and diarrhoea, cramps and icy coldness with forehead sweat and great anguish

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, dull and apathetic with heavy stupor; may be delirious, muttering or semi-conscious; anxious about heart and pulse when aware; mental dulness with violent vascular excitement
General_Themes: Acts on vasomotor centre and heart; marked arterial tension with slow, full or rapid, feeble pulse; high fevers with violent congestion; used traditionally in early inflammatory states of lungs and serous membranes
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense headache with flushed face, throbbing carotids and sense of fullness in head; very slow, full or small, weak pulse with great arterial excitement; nausea and vomiting with faintness on sitting up; chest oppression and difficult breathing in congestive pneumonia-type states; profuse sweat following vascular crises
Worse_From: Sudden motion; upright posture; overheating; strong emotions; early stages of acute, high-fever inflammations
Better_From: Rest in semi-recumbent position; cool room; quiet; gradual change of posture
Notes_Sphere: Cardio-vascular and febrile sphere; violent vascular tension and congestive, high-fever states with marked pulse irregularity and nausea in traditional homeopathic use

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Dull, heavy and somewhat low-spirited; children fretful and sleepy with catarrh; adults irritable from constant, painful cough and facial neuralgia
General_Themes: Acts on mucous membranes of respiratory tract and on sensory nerves of face; catarrhal laryngitis and bronchitis; deep, resonant, “bass” cough; prosopalgia and ear pains
Key_Local_Symptoms: Cough loud, hoarse and deep-toned, as from a cavern, with soreness in chest and larynx; worse talking or in cold air; facial neuralgia, especially along infraorbital nerve, with pressing, crushing pains; earache with shooting pains to jaw and temples; catarrhal states of nose and throat with much mucus
Worse_From: Talking and reading aloud; cold air; early morning and evening; pressure on affected nerve in some cases
Better_From: Warm room and warm drinks; covering mouth and nose in cold air; gentle pressure or support to painful side; rest and quiet
Notes_Sphere: Respiratory and neuralgic sphere; deep, hollow coughs and infraorbital neuralgia with pressing, crushing pains and catarrh

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous, anxious and easily overstrained; “type A” temperament—driven, intense and self-sacrificing; mental restlessness with difficulty relaxing even when exhausted
General_Themes: Acts on nervous system, muscles and female pelvic organs; nervous exhaustion from strain and overwork; headaches and neck–shoulder tension; menstrual irregularities and cramps in highly strung patients
Key_Local_Symptoms: Tense, band-like headaches with tight neck and shoulder muscles; insomnia from mental over-activity and worry; muscular twitching or crampy pains from overexertion; in women, pelvic cramping and irregular menses associated with strain and nervous tension
Worse_From: Overwork and emotional strain; prolonged mental concentration; stimulants; late nights without rest
Better_From: Rest and relaxation; warm baths; gentle stretching and outdoor walking; regular sleep routines
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and musculo-pelvic sphere; stress headaches, insomnia and strain-related menstrual or muscle tension in over-conscientious, overdriven patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, restless and excitable; angered easily, especially by pain or contradiction; anxious and distressed by intense burning, stinging and swelling of parts
General_Themes: Acts on skin, blood and mucous membranes; oedema and urticaria-like swellings; burning, stinging pains like hornet-stings; bladder and uterine irritation with inflammation and soreness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Sudden, intense burning and stinging in skin with rapid swelling and redness, often oedematous; urticaria and erysipelas-like eruptions; bladder irritation with frequent urging and burning; uterine and ovarian tenderness with throbbing and heat; parts feel bruised, hot and swollen
Worse_From: Heat; touch and pressure; continued motion when parts are swollen; night; further stings or irritants
Better_From: Cold applications; cool air; rest with affected part elevated; avoidance of tight clothing or pressure
Notes_Sphere: Skin, urinary and pelvic sphere; stinging, burning swellings, urticaria and bladder or uterine irritation with rapid oedema and hornet-sting-type pains

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Apprehensive, nervous and easily startled; anxious before menses, fearing severe cramps; low-spirited, irritable and restless during pelvic pains
General_Themes: Acts on uterus and pelvic nerves; crampy, spasmodic pains before and during menses; tendency to threatened miscarriage from spasmodic contractions; often suited to teenage or young adult menstrual cramps
Key_Local_Symptoms: Severe cramping in lower abdomen and back, pains extend into thighs; menses may be delayed, scanty or suddenly suppressed with violent cramps; tendency to spasmodic pains and bearing-down as if menses would start but do not; sometimes cramps in early pregnancy with threatened miscarriage
Worse_From: Onset of menses; cold, especially damp cold; emotional excitement; getting chilled when feet or legs are bare
Better_From: Warmth; local heat over lower abdomen; lying with knees drawn up; gentle pressure and rest
Notes_Sphere: Uterine and pelvic sphere; spasmodic dysmenorrhoea and threatened miscarriage from crampy uterine contractions with radiating pains into back and thighs

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, nervous and easily vexed from constant itching and oozing eruptions; children fretful and restless, cannot bear having the head touched or combed
General_Themes: Acts chiefly on scalp and skin; moist, eczematous eruptions with copious offensive discharge; crusts and matting of hair; tendency to alopecia in affected areas
Key_Local_Symptoms: Oily, offensive moisture and thick crusts on scalp with hair matting together; raw, weeping eczema behind ears and on neck; oozing eruptions that soil linen and cause burning and itching; bare patches where hair has fallen out around affected spots
Worse_From: Heat of bed; warm rooms; scratching and washing with strong soaps; wearing tight headgear
Better_From: Cool air; gentle cleansing with mild applications; keeping scalp uncovered or lightly covered; avoiding irritation of eruptions
Notes_Sphere: Scalp and cutaneous sphere; moist eczema of head and behind ears with copious offensive discharge and falling of hair in irritable, sensitive subjects

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, timid and apprehensive; nervous and easily startled; children clingy and restless when pains or spasms come on
General_Themes: Acts on nerves, muscles and respiratory tract; left-sided rheumatism and sciatica; pains in neck, shoulders and upper extremities; catarrh of respiratory passages with cough
Key_Local_Symptoms: Neuralgic and rheumatic pains in left shoulder, arm and wrist, extending to fingers; sciatica and limb pains worse at night and on motion; tightness across chest with short cough and difficult breathing in catarrhal attacks; stiffness of neck and upper back
Worse_From: Night; motion and use of affected limb; cold and damp; lying on painful side
Better_From: Rest; warmth; gentle rubbing of painful parts; fresh but not cold air for chest symptoms
Notes_Sphere: Nervous, rheumatic and respiratory sphere; left-sided limb pains, especially shoulder and arm, with catarrhal chest symptoms in nervous, timid patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Fretful, peevish and sensitive, especially children; cannot be pleased, cries and frets continually; low-spirited from disfiguring skin eruptions and offensive odours
General_Themes: Acts markedly on skin and urinary organs; impetigo and milk-crust of children; moist eczema of face and scalp; urine often strong and penetrating like that of cats
Key_Local_Symptoms: Thick, yellow, crusty eruptions on face and scalp with oozing underneath; milk-crust in infants, especially behind ears and on cheeks; itching and burning, child rubs head on pillow; urine very strong, ammoniacal, smelling like cat’s urine; enuresis in some cases with offensive urine
Worse_From: Heat of bed; scratching; rich food, especially in nursing mothers; damp, cold air
Better_From: Gentle cleansing and exposure to fresh air; cool, bland applications; improvement of general nutrition; open air without chill
Notes_Sphere: Paediatric skin and urinary sphere; impetigo and milk-crust with offensive cat-smelling urine in fretful, sleepless children

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Anxious and extremely distressed by bursting pains in veins; restless and fearful when limb hangs down; mentally dull and prostrated in septic or varicose states
General_Themes: Acts powerfully on venous circulation and blood; phlebitis, varicose veins and ulcers; septic and haemorrhagic conditions; great tendency to oedema and bluish discoloration
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense bursting, tearing pains in varicose veins or inflamed limbs, so severe that limb must be kept elevated; veins swollen, bluish and sensitive; ulcers and cellulitis around ankles with dark, livid skin and oedema; septic states with low fever and great weakness
Worse_From: Letting limb hang down; standing or walking; warmth and pressure on inflamed veins; night
Better_From: Lying with limb raised high; cool applications; absolute rest; gentle handling only
Notes_Sphere: Venous and septic sphere; phlebitis, varicose veins and ulcers with intense bursting pain relieved only by elevating the limb, in weak, toxic patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Depressed, anxious and fearful about heart or stroke; gloomy and irritable, especially in cold, damp weather; feels weak and “old” before time
General_Themes: Acts on heart, vessels and nerves; hypertension and arteriosclerosis; cardiac weakness with dyspnoea; rheumatic and neuralgic pains, especially sciatica; tendency to vertigo and epistaxis
Key_Local_Symptoms: High blood pressure with vertigo, ringing in ears and tendency to nosebleed; dyspnoea and palpitation on exertion; rheumatic pains in shoulders and limbs, often worse in cold, damp; sciatica with tearing, shooting pains down limbs, sometimes alternating sides
Worse_From: Cold, damp weather; storms; exertion, especially climbing; night in bed when circulation is most sluggish
Better_From: Warmth; dry, mild weather; rest with head or affected limb supported; gentle, regular exercise in moderation
Notes_Sphere: Cardio-vascular and rheumatic sphere; hypertension, cardiac dyspnoea and rheumatic limb or sciatic pains worse cold-damp in prematurely aged, anxious subjects

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, restless and mentally tired from constant throat and palate irritation; anxious, feels suffocated or “choked” by dryness; children fretful and sleepless from itching deep in throat
General_Themes: Acts chiefly on naso-pharynx and larynx; intense dryness and burning of posterior nares and soft palate; constant desire to clear or scratch roof of mouth with tongue; hay-fever and chronic pharyngeal catarrh
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intolerable itching and burning in soft palate and posterior nares, compelling constant hawking or attempts to scrape with tongue; dryness of throat as if burned, with hoarseness and tickling cough; sensation as if uvula too long; hay-fever with dry, hacking cough and raw feeling in chest
Worse_From: Talking; singing; dry, heated rooms; dust and pollen; lying down at night when throat dryness increases
Better_From: Cool, moist air; cold water in small sips; gentle, warm steam inhalations; rest of voice
Notes_Sphere: Naso-pharyngeal and laryngeal sphere; hay-fever and chronic throat dryness with characteristic itching of soft palate and constant desire to clear the throat

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, depressed and over-sensitive; neurasthenic, tired yet sleepless; feels changed or “not oneself” since X-ray or radiation exposure; anxious about strange, shifting symptoms
General_Themes: Deep-acting nosode from X-ray exposure; acts on skin, glands, bone-marrow and nerves; chronic dermatitis, fissures and ulcerations; glandular and sexual disturbances; late effects of radiation
Key_Local_Symptoms: Dry, rough, fissured skin with itching and burning; chronic radiodermatitis and slow-healing cracks on hands and fingers; falling of hair and brittle nails; irregular menses or loss of sexual power after radiation; vague, wandering pains and numbness in limbs with great fatigue
Worse_From: Cold, dry air on affected skin; repeated or prolonged radiation; exertion in weakened state; mental strain and loss of sleep
Better_From: Warm, bland applications to skin; rest; gentle open-air activity without sunburn or further exposure; time and careful nutrition
Notes_Sphere: Constitutional and trophic sphere; late effects of radiation with chronic skin and gland trouble, fatigue and nervous disturbance, especially where well-chosen remedies fail to act fully

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous, excitable and anxious; low-spirited and easily discouraged, especially around menses; hypersensitive to pain with neuralgic shooting pains
General_Themes: Acts on nerves and female pelvic organs; neuralgic dysmenorrhoea; ovarian and uterine pains, often left-sided, radiating down thighs; rheumatic and neuralgic pains in limbs
Key_Local_Symptoms: Intense, shooting, neuralgic pains in uterus and ovaries, usually left-sided, extending down thighs and along sacral nerves; menses too early, profuse and painful, with burning and soreness in pelvis; numbness and tingling in extremities with rheumatic or neuralgic pains
Worse_From: Onset of menses; cold and damp; standing or walking; emotional strain in sensitive women
Better_From: Warmth; local heat to pelvis; rest with knees drawn up; gentle rubbing of numb limbs
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and female pelvic sphere; neuralgic dysmenorrhoea and ovarian pains radiating to thighs with numbness and tingling in nervous, easily-overstrained patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Nervous, anxious and depressed from repeated uterine bleeding and pelvic weakness; fearful of miscarriage or serious womb disease; mentally tired and irritable before and during menses
General_Themes: Acts on uterus and ovarian region; profuse or protracted uterine bleeding; threatened abortion; bearing-down pains with great pelvic weakness; some rheumatic back pains associated with uterine congestion
Key_Local_Symptoms: Profuse or too-frequent uterine bleeding with cramps in lower abdomen and back; sense of great weight and dragging in pelvis, must lie down; threatened miscarriage with backache and bearing-down; rheumatic sacral pains associated with menstrual or uterine troubles
Worse_From: Standing or walking; slightest exertion during menses or pregnancy; cold, damp exposure; sudden movements
Better_From: Rest lying flat; warmth to lower back and pelvis; firm abdominal support; cool room with minimal exertion
Notes_Sphere: Uterine and pelvic sphere; menorrhagia, threatened abortion and pelvic weakness with bearing-down pains and sacral backache

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Highly excitable, restless and sexually preoccupied; anxiety, irritability and sleeplessness from sexual frustration or excess; depressed and self-doubting when impotence appears
General_Themes: Acts on sexual organs, spinal cord and circulation; functional impotence and loss of libido from nervous exhaustion; premature or absent erections; palpitations, flushing and tremors from sexual over-stimulation or remedies
Key_Local_Symptoms: Erectile weakness with preserved desire; incomplete or short-lived erections; genital and prostatic irritation with dragging in pelvis; palpitations, flushing of face and scalp, trembling and sleeplessness after sexual excitement; nervous dyspepsia and headache following excesses or stimulants
Worse_From: Sexual excess or prolonged abstinence with mental dwelling on sex; stimulants such as alcohol and coffee; emotional excitement; night in bed thinking of sexual matters
Better_From: Moderation and regulation of sexual life; rest and quiet; avoidance of stimulants; outdoor exercise to divert and ground excess nervous energy
Notes_Sphere: Sexual and nervous sphere; functional impotence, sexual neurasthenia and palpitations in highly excitable, anxious men (and occasionally women) whose nerves are over-taxed by sexual strain

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, gloomy and dissatisfied; mentally dull and heavy when digestion and liver are sluggish; feels “bilious” and out of sorts with bad taste and offensive breath
General_Themes: Acts on liver, stomach and intestines; bilious headaches with vertigo; hepatic congestion and right-sided soreness; flatulent dyspepsia with great distension; alternating constipation and offensive diarrhoea
Key_Local_Symptoms: Frontal or temporal headache with weight at root of nose, worse on waking; bitter, soapy or greasy taste in mouth; thickly coated tongue with offensive breath; much gas with rumbling, fullness and cutting about navel; light-coloured, offensive stools or alternation with hard, knotty stools; soreness and dragging in right hypochondrium
Worse_From: Morning on waking; after rich or fatty food; overeating at night; lying on left side; mental exertion after meals
Better_From: Light, simple diet; warm drinks; passing flatus and stool; gentle walking after eating; warmth to liver region
Notes_Sphere: Hepatic and digestive sphere; bilious headaches, coated tongue, foul breath and gassy, alternately loose or constipated bowels with right-sided liver soreness

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Mentally exhausted, forgetful and over-sensitive to noise; restless, fidgety, especially feet cannot keep still; ailments after prolonged mental strain or suppression of eruptions and discharges; irritable and gloomy from nerve fatigue
General_Themes: Acts on brain, spinal cord and peripheral nerves; neurasthenia and spinal irritation; chorea, twitchings and restless legs; headaches from overwork; ill-effects of suppressed eruptions, menses or discharges
Key_Local_Symptoms: Constant fidgeting and trembling of feet and legs, worse at rest; jerking and twitching of muscles, especially eyelids and facial muscles; dull, pressing headaches from occiput to vertex, worse study and wine; burning along spine with great weakness; eruptions and discharges suppressed then followed by brain or nerve symptoms
Worse_From: Mental overwork; emotions; wine and stimulants; suppression of skin eruptions or menses; evening and at night in bed; noise and excitement
Better_From: Discharges or eruptions reappearing; gentle, continued motion; short rests between efforts; cool, quiet surroundings
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and spinal sphere; neurasthenia, restless-leg and choreic or twitching states from overwork or suppression of eruptions in over-sensitive, easily exhausted patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Highly nervous, excitable and easily over-stimulated; hysterical, tremulous, with alternation of depression and agitation; oversensitive to noise and emotion, yet quickly exhausted; anxious and sleepless from nerve tension
General_Themes: Combines Zinc’s nerve weakness with Valerian’s hysterical excitability; acts on brain and spinal cord; neurasthenia with choreic twitchings; hysterical palpitations and flushes; functional nerve disorders in sensitive women and children
Key_Local_Symptoms: Fine trembling and twitching of muscles, especially of face and hands; fidgety feet that cannot keep still; nervous headaches with tight band round head, worse noise and mental effort; hysterical palpitations and flushes with sinking at epigastrium; insomnia from racing thoughts and nerve unrest
Worse_From: Emotional excitement; noise and bustle; overwork; stimulants; evening and at night in bed when trying to sleep
Better_From: Quiet, dark room; gentle occupation of mind; moderate open-air exercise; regular routines without shocks or stimulants
Notes_Sphere: Nervous and hysterical sphere; neurasthenia with twitchings, restless legs, palpitations and sleeplessness in highly excitable, over-strained patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Timid, despondent and inclined to brood; anxious about health and digestion; mentally dull and heavy when stomach is disordered; easily irritated by slightest disturbance when dyspeptic
General_Themes: Acts on stomach and intestines; catarrhal and flatulent dyspepsia; sense of weight and fullness after eating; gastric and intestinal catarrh after cold drinks or damp; some sexual atony and weakness
Key_Local_Symptoms: Heaviness and fullness in stomach as from a stone, especially after eating; much flatulence with rumbling and colicky griping; sour or tasteless eructations; nausea and inclination to vomit after cold water or cold food; soreness and dragging in loins and pelvis with some sexual weakness
Worse_From: Cold drinks on warm stomach; overeating; damp, cold weather; riding in vehicles soon after meals
Better_From: Warm food and drinks; light, simple diet; gentle motion after eating; warmth to abdomen
Notes_Sphere: Gastric and intestinal sphere; flatulent, heavy dyspepsia with fullness, gas and colic after cold drinks or overeating in timid, low-spirited patients

Mental_Emotional_Themes: Irritable, anxious and depressed from chronic urinary or urethral burning; mentally dull and restless, cannot concentrate when bladder and urethra are painful
General_Themes: Acts on urinary tract, especially urethra and bladder; gonorrhoea-like catarrh; urethritis and cystitis with burning and tenesmus; pains radiating into pelvis and thighs
Key_Local_Symptoms: Burning, smarting pain in urethra during and after urination, sometimes extending to testes or thighs; frequent urging with scanty, hot urine; dull aching in bladder and perineum; dragging and soreness in pelvis; in males, gonorrhoeal-type irritation with radiating pains
Worse_From: Urination (especially at close); walking or standing; cold, damp; sexual excess or exposure in damp weather
Better_From: Rest; warmth to pelvis and perineum; bland, non-irritating fluids; lying with knees slightly drawn up
Notes_Sphere: Urinary and pelvic sphere; urethritis and bladder irritation with burning, radiating pains and frequent urging in sensitive, easily-irritated patients
